description.hltext_display: COMUNICADO: The Nordic Pharma Group Announces a Strategic Collaboration With Nippon Kayaku on Spanidin(R) (Gusperimus)
description.content:
/PRNewswire/ -- Nippon Kayaku (NK) and the Nordic Pharma Group (Nordic) have signed a licensing agreement under which NK grants exclusive rights to NORDIC for the development and commercialisation of Spanidin(R) (gusperimus) in selected territories outside of Japan, including Europe.
Spanidin(R) is an immunosuppressive agent developed and commercialised in Japan by NK in acute and accelerated rejection crisis after renal transplantation. The product has obtained promising results and orphan medicinal product status in Europe for the treatment of Wegener's Granulomatosis (WG).
Under this agreement, Nordic will design and execute the global clinical development of Spanidin(R), which includes a pivotal, comparative Phase III study for these patients suffering from WG relapse. Nordic will also be responsible for the regulatory filing and commercialisation of the product in the relevant countries. NK will ensure production of the active ingredient until registration and beyond.
Spanidin(R) has the potential to offer a treatment for relapsing WG patients, who currently have no approved drug to cure their disease.
With this new agreement, Nordic is actively pursuing its strategy to bring innovative drugs to the market in specialized therapeutic areas that have specific, unmet medical needs.
About the Nordic Group
The Nordic Group is a privately-owned, fast-growing, fully-integrated, pan-European Pharmaceutical Group that places strong emphasis on the development and commercialisation of niche hospital and orphan products and services that cater to the special needs of each client and patient. Nordic has 2 main platforms of core competencies:
- Marketing & Sales of Speciality pharmaceuticals throughout 13
countries in Europe (Nordic Pharma, Nordic Drugs)
- Specialised Pharmaceutical Services, which focus on Product
Development, Manufacturing, Supply Logistics and Regulatory activities
(Prague Clinical Services, QPharma, Disphar)
Since its creation, Nordic has enjoyed an average of 20% growth in revenues and pursues its expansion through organic growth and strategic collaborations.
Additional information can be obtained by visiting Nordic Group's Website at http://www.nordicpharmagroup.com
About Nippon Kayaku
Founded in 1916, Nippon Kayaku now focuses on pharmaceuticals, functional chemicals, and safety systems with over $1.7 Billion in revenues. In its Pharmaceutical Division, Nippon Kayaku manufactures and sells anti-cancer drugs, cardiovascular drugs, immunosuppressants, and other pharmaceuticals and diagnostics for prescription. In the anti-cancer drug field in particular, Nippon Kayaku offers a line up of 26 anti-cancer drugs and 6 supportive drugs, and is at the top level worldwide both in terms of technology and business performance. Nippon Kayaku works with cutting-edge technologies, and conducts clinical development for pharmaceutical DDSs (Drug Delivery Systems) with nanotechnology.
Additional information can be obtained by visiting Nippon Kayaku's Website at http://www.nipponkayaku.co.jp/english/
Contact:
Hans Schram, CEO & Managing Director, info@nordicpharma.com
Stéphane Altaba, Director Corp. Bus. Dev., busdev@nordicpharma.com
CONTACT: Contact: Hans Schram, CEO & Managing Director,info@nordicpharma.com. Stéphane Altaba, Director Corp. Bus. Dev.,busdev@nordicpharma.com. Tel: +33-153-63-22-70

description.hltext_display: Styron to expand SSBR capacity in Germany
description.content:
Styron has announced an expansion of its SSBR (solution styrene butadiene rubber) capacity with a new production line at its facility in Schkopau, Germany.
The additional capacity of 50,000 tonnes will allow Styron to help customers around the world meet the increasing demand for high performance tyres, the company said.
Construction of the new production line will start with the groundbreaking in May 2011. The new train will be built alongside existing trains and will focus on SSBR production, with the capability to produce all existing clear and oil extended Styron grades.
Production is expected to start in Q4 2012. The new production line will supply customers around the world.
Styron is the former Dow business sold to Bain Capital Partners in March, which owns PS and PC assets, as well as synthetic rubber and other lines.

description.hltext_display: Myriad opportunities to celebrate the new year
description.content:
| Loading…
Font Size:
Before the gifts we wrapped with pretty paper and bows are opened, while visions of sugar plums are still dancing in our heads, when we are not even done celebrating the current holiday, we already are considering how to ring in the next.
Maybe it is human nature. We are always taught to keep our eyes steady on the horizon, trudge forward even when reluctant to do so and continue with resilience and vigor toward all that lies ahead. As unnatural as it might seem, most cannot enjoy one day without thinking of their tomorrow and what it will bring.
Of course, exhaustion from preparing for weeks for only one day definitely plays into why we are ready for the holiday to be over before it really has begun.
In fact, you might be contemplating nothing more than ways to spend the next few weeks relaxing, catching up on sleep and recuperating from Christmas.
Your plans may revolve around going into reclusion, but if instead you are ready to say goodbye to last year and, like many, looking for how to celebrate the start of a new year, I have a few ideas for you.
You can watch the ball drop, and I am not talking about the one in the Big Apple. Instead, I am referring to our version right here. It might not have Dick Clark, but it has its own charm.
Homewood will have a celebration during the daytime Dec. 31 and will drop a giant balloon when the clock strikes 12 -- noon, that is. The event will have entertainment as well as snacks.
It will take place in the Homewood-Flossmoor Park District auditorium, 2010 Chestnut Road (no mistake in print, that is the address), and begins at 10:30 a.m. If you have any questions, you can contact Village Hall at (708) 798-3000.
It offers the perfect solution for parents whose children cannot make it to the real countdown but still do not want to miss out on the fun of celebrating.
If you are a young couple or you and your friends are interested in something a little more suited to your age group -- dancing, Champagne and going all out -- downtown will offer the best and biggest variety.
The New Year's Eve 2011 Crystal Gardens celebration at Navy Pier begins at 9 p.m. and goes until 2 a.m. The event includes all the stops: full premium bar, hors d'oeuvres, a Champagne toast at midnight, a private balcony to watch the fireworks, party favors and noisemakers, a countdown on the Ferris wheel, and official after-party wristbands for The Underground.
Along with bigger plans comes expensive tickets -- about $135 and rising -- but most places downtown do charge steep prices for New Year's Eve parties.
A low-key suggestion for New Year's Day comes from one of my family traditions. You can get together, drink hot cocoa, snack on cookies and cake, play board games and watch holiday movies. It amounts to lounging around and enjoying time with one another without the stress of crowds and without the worry of driving around in the often snow-trodden roads.
No matter what your plans are for bringing in the new year, make sure to be safe. We have a new beginning at our fingertips; let's all use it as the amazing opportunity it is to grow, change, and welcome new adventures.
The opinions are solely those of the writer. Nissa Yekich can be reached at nini85@sbcglobal.net.

description.hltext_display: Contador schon wieder in den Negativ-Schlagzeilen
description.content:
Dopingsünder Alberto Contador sorgt weiter für Wirbel. Ein spanisches Magazin brachte den Profi nun mit dem umstrittenen Radsport-Präsidenten Javier Fernandez Alba in Verbindung.
Dopingsünder Alberto Contador kommt aus den Negativ-Schlagzeilen nicht heraus. In einem Bericht des spanischen Magazins Interviu wird der dreimalige Toursieger mit dem Madrider Radsport-Präsidenten Javier Fernandez Alba in Verbindung gebracht, der sich selbst Doping-Anschuldigungen ausgesetzt sieht. Fernandez wird vorgeworfen, Senioren-Weltmeister Francisco Jose Prieto mit Dopingpräparaten versorgt zu haben. Dafür muss er sich auch vor einem Gericht in Asturien verantworten.
In dem Artikel heißt es, Fernandez Alba sei der Manager, Entdecker und Trainer von Contador gewesen. Diese Behauptung wies Contadors Pressesprecher umgehend zurück. Fernandez Alba sei weder Entdecker noch Manager des Kletterspezialisten gewesen. Beide seien zwar Mitglied im Madrider Radsport-Verein VC Portillo gewesen, allerdings nicht zur gleichen Zeit.
Gegen Contador läuft derzeit ein Disziplinarverfahren vor dem spanischen Radsport-Verband RFEC, nachdem er am zweiten Ruhetag der Tour de France positiv auf Clenbuterol getestet worden war. Der Madrilene hatte dies mit verunreinigtem Fleisch zu erklären versucht, die Welt-Anti-Doping-Agentur (WADA) schenkt dieser These aber nur wenig Glauben. Aller Voraussicht nach wird der Fall vor dem Internationalen Sportgerichtshof CAS in Lausanne landen.

description.hltext_display: Tax 'cuts' just postpone the inevitable
description.content:
I don't know why people don't get it, but they don't. For the past 10 years, your government has been spending money like crazy. (And you let them do it, so shame on you.)
Now we have this huge pile of debt to pay off. And how do we pay it off? With your taxes, of course!
But you are so lucky. Your government cares deeply about your welfare, and generously offers you a tax cut.
Oh thank you, my kind and benevolent government, and the politicians that run you so well.
But wait, what does this tax cut really mean? Does it mean I don't have to pay off that outrageous pile of debt? Of course not! All the tax cut means is that instead of paying off the debt now, I get to pay it off later (with interest).
How wonderful. I still get to pay off this enormous pile of debt, but now I get to pay off the interest, too. That is just great!
The tax cut buys you nothing. You still have the same amount of debt to pay off (plus interest). You're just paying it off later.
It is exactly the same thing as paying off the minimum balance on your credit card! You don't come out ahead. You come out way behind. You still have to pay off the original debt, but now you have to pay off the interest, too.
It's a fool's game. I don't do it. You don't do it. The politicians don't do it. So why should your country do it? (Especially since you're the one footing the bill!)
Wake up, people. A tax cut does absolutely nothing for you. And in the long run, it makes you pay even more (just like paying the minimum balance on your credit card).
So don't let anyone tell you that they're doing you a favor by giving you a tax cut, because they're not. And if you somehow think that a tax cut makes it OK for the government to spend even more, then you are a moron.

description.hltext_display: San Diego State slips past Dons
description.content:
Kawhi Leonard recorded a game-high 23 points and 14 rebounds as No. 7 San Diego State slipped past San Francisco, 62-56, in the Las Vegas Holiday Hoops Classic.
D.J. Gay donated 14 points for the Aztecs (13-0), who have the nation's second-longest winning streak -- they trail only No. 1 Duke, which has won 20 in a row dating back to last season. Malcolm Thomas chipped in 10 points for the victors.
Michael Williams had 16 points for the Dons (4-7), who have lost four of the last five. Perris Blackwell and Angelo Caloiaro both posted 14 points in the loss.
SDSU jumped to a 10-3 lead thanks to Leonard's five points, but with 8 1/2 minutes left in the first half, Williams made a layup to knot the game at 14 apiece.
The game remained tight when the teams traded points while San Francisco still held onto a slim lead, 23-21, with five minutes remaining.
The lead tilted toward the Aztecs thanks to an eight-point spurt capped by a Leonard lay-in. Thomas made two free throws with less than 30 seconds left, but Caloiaro again tied the game with a three-pointer for a 31-31 score at the half.
Neither team built a lead bigger than three in the second half until Thomas' tip-in gave the Aztecs a 55-50 edge with just under three minutes to play. Gay added a layup during SDSU's next trip to extend the advantage to seven.
But San Francisco answered with four straight points to keep it close.
It was a three-point game after Rashad Green's three-point play with 23 seconds left, but Gay made 4-of-4 free throws during the final 19 seconds as the Aztecs held on to win.
Game Notes
The Aztecs shot 51.1 percent from the floor, while the Dons shot 42 percent...Leonard was 10-of-16 from the field...The score was tied 13 times with 12 lead changes. SDSU's biggest lead was nine, which was during the first half...San Francisco won the battle on the glass, 32-30.

description.hltext_display: נועדה לבמה: ראיון עם סיגלית פוקס
description.content:
סיגלית פוקס לקחה פעמיים הפסקה מעולם המשחק, אבל גילתה שהיא לא יכולה בלעדיו. עכשיו היא חוזרת בהצגה "מחיר הכבוד"
תגיות: סיגלית פוקס
"מחיר הכבוד", ההצגה החדשה של תיאטרון חיפה העולה השבוע, היא מלודרמה יהודית סוערת בהשראת סיפורו המפורסם של טולסטוי "סונטת קרויצר" ויצירתו המוזיקלית של בטהובן בעלת אותו השם. המחזה, שכתב יעקב גורדין, אחד המחזאים החשובים של התיאטרון היידי ("מירל' ה אפרת"), מגולל את סיפור התפוררותה של משפחה יהודית שנאלצת להגר מרוסיה לארצות הברית על רקע אהבות אסורות, שידוכים כפויים ותאוות יצרים.
סיגלית פוקס ("מוכרחים להיות שמח"), המגלמת את בתו של הגיבור המשודכת נגד רצונה לגבר שנראה לאביה "מתאים לחתונה", מספרת שהדבר שהכי קסם לה בהצגה הוא הפשטות שלה ושל הדמויות. "זו הצגה על אנשים עממיים", היא אומרת, "הם פתאום נכנסים למשפחה אריסטוקרטית וזה יוצר סיטואציה גם קומית וגם דרמטית. חזרות יכולות להיות כיף גדול ויכולות להיות סבל גדול. פה היה כיף".
פוקס , ילידת 1970, בוגרת מכללת סמינר הקיבוצים, פרצה לתודעת הקהל לפני כמה שנים עם תפקיד מקסים בסרט "מוכרחים להיות שמח". אחר כך לוהקה מיד לטלנובלה המדוברת "בובות", שם גילמה את המאהבת של דודו טופז ("העבודה לצדו הייתה מקצועית לחלוטין").
אחרי "בובות" קצת נעלמת מהתודעה. מה קרה?
"המשכתי לעבוד בתיאטרון, אבל נכון שהורדתי פרופיל. נולד לי ילד ואחר כך תאומות, כך שהנמכתי הילוך. אני לא מצטערת או מתחרטת אפילו לשנייה".
זו לא הורדת הפרופיל הראשונה שלך. לפני עשור, אחרי לימודי המשחק, פרשת למעשה מהמקצוע ועבדת בחנות ספרים בירושלים.
"כן. היה לי מאוד קשה עם הפער בין המציאות של עולם התיאטרון ובין מה שדמיינתי שהוא יהיה וצריך להיות בזמן שהייתי סטודנטית. הצעה מחנוך לוין להשתתף ב'אשכבה', שבה אני משתתפת עד היום, החזירה אותי לעבודה בתיאטרון. בדיעבד, אני מבינה היום שאפילו אם העולם לא מושלם, רק בו אני יכולה לממש את הפוטנציאל שלי. מי שיש לו כישרון מסוים חייב להשתמש בו. הוא פשוט לא יכול להחליט שבגלל אידיאולוגיה מסוימת הוא מניח אותו בצד. אני, לפחות, לא יכולה".

description.hltext_display: Officials Warn SoCal Residents About Hitman Email Scam
Füchse erkämpfen Sieg - Löwen patzen
description.content:
In der Handball-Bundesliga haben die Füchse Berlin den SC Magdeburg mit 27:26 (10:15) besiegt. Die Rhein Neckar Löwen kamen gegen den TBV Lemgo nicht über ein 31:31 (17:12) hinaus.
Mit einer Energieleistung haben die Füchse Berlin einen überraschenden Rückschlag im Titelkampf der Handball-Bundesliga gerade noch verhindert. Der Tabellenzweite aus der Hauptstadt setzte sich nach einer schwachen ersten Hälfte und zwischenzeitlichem Sechs-Tore-Rückstand noch mit 27:26 (10:15) gegen den SC Magdeburg durch. Mit der Schlusssirene erzielte Bartlomiej Jaszka den Siegtreffer. Mit nun 29:5 Punkten bleiben die Füchse engster Verfolger des souveränen Tabellenführers HSV Hamburg.
Schlechter erging es den Rhein-Neckar Löwen, die gegen den TBV Lemgo nicht über ein 31:31 (17:12) hinauskamen. Die Badener verdrängten mit 26:8 Zählern den Titelverteidiger THW Kiel (25:7) zwar für mindestens 24 Stunden vom dritten Platz, drohen aber den Anschluss an den HSV zu verlieren. Die Hamburger spielen am Mittwoch gegen HBW Balingen-Weilstätten, Meister Kiel tritt bei TuS N-Lübbecke an.
Heinevetter hält Füchse in der Partie
In Berlin erwischten die Füchse eine rabenschwarze erste Halbzeit, in der Torwart Silvio Heinevetter die Gastgeber mit einigen Paraden vor einem noch höheren Rückstand bewahrte. Nach der Pause drehten die Gastgeber dann aber vor allem in Person von Mark Bult auf, der im zweiten Durchgang sieben Treffer erzielte.
In der Mannheimer SAP-Arena hatten die Löwen den TBV nach einer ausgeglichenen Anfangsphase zunächst klar im Griff und zogen bis zur Pause auf 17:12 davon. In der zweiten Halbzeit kam das Gästeteam von Trainer Volker Mudrow aber immer besser ins Spiel und führte sieben Minuten vor dem Ende sogar mit drei Toren (29:26). Grzegorz Tkaczyk mit seinem Treffer zum 30:30 eine Minute vor dem Ende sowie Torwart Henning Fritz mit zwei Paraden kurz vor der Schlusssirene sicherten den Löwen zumindest einen Punkt. Bester Werfer der Gastgeber war Olafur Stefansson mit acht Toren. Florian Kehrmann war beim TBV mit ebenfalls acht Toren am treffsichersten.

description.hltext_display: Petrobras Gets Nod To Buy Bolivian Assets
description.content:
Brazilian state-controlled oil company, , has won regulatory approval to purchase a stake in a Bolivian natural gas field, The Wall Street Journal reports. The oil companyâs local unit, , will buy a 30% stake in the Bloco XX-Tarija Oeste natural gas exploratory block in the Itau gas field.
Petrobras may pay about $3.2 million for the stake. The company will also reimburse the $50.6 million already invested by the previous owner of the stake, which will be paid out in stages.

description.hltext_display: Downstate Santa picked for Hall of Fame
description.author: Lisa Black
description.content:
At age 4, Phil Wenz was no bigger than an elf when he slipped on his dad's red flannel shirt and pajama pants and used safety pins to hold up a white kerchief beard. It was the beginning of what would become a full-time career as Santa Claus.
The payoff came this week when Wenz, 48, learned he has been selected as a charter member of the Santa Claus Hall of Fame (santaclaushall.com). His portrait, along with those of 13 other famous jolly old men, will be displayed in an exhibit at the Santa's Candy Castle tourist attraction in — you guessed it — Santa Claus, Ind. Of the inaugural group, Wenz is the only living member.
The downstate native has marched in parades, toured hospitals and held court for more than 20 years at Santa's Village in Dundee.
"I probably have had a couple million people crawl across me," said Wenz, of Crescent City, about 25 miles south of Kankakee.
With a daughter named Holly — she once joked that she could find him in any mall — Wenz takes this Santa stuff seriously. It takes two hours for him to make up his face and glue on a $1,500 beard and wig.
"To me, it's just normal," he said. "It's the only job I have ever had."
Asked what he would put on his holiday wish list, Wenz grew thoughtful.
He savors the history of St. Nicholas and Christmas past. Today he receives fewer "Dear Santa" letters and more electronic Tweets, which are difficult for his stubby fingers to master.
"There's too much commercialism," he said. "We need to slow down and look in our rearview mirror and see where we are going."

event_or_fact.property: I probably have had a couple million people crawl across me
To me, it's just normal; It's the only job I have ever had.
There's too much commercialism; We need to slow down and look in our rearview mirror and see where we are going.

description.hltext_display: New Zealand GDP to Dictate NZDUSD Price Action as the Pair Displays a Lackluster Performac
description.author: Daily Forex
description.content: Economic activity in New Zealand is expected to rise 0.1 percent in the third quarter after climbing 0.2 percent the quarter prior, while the annualized rate is forecasted to rise 1.8 percent, according to the median estimate of economists' surveyed by Bloomberg News.

description.hltext_display: Chicago Heights OKs tax levy
description.content:
CHICAGO HEIGHTS | The City Council on Monday unanimously approved an $18.2 million tax levy for 2010 — a nearly 15 percent percent increase over 2009.
Treasurer Joy Nardi said that despite the double-digit increase, homeowners will see an impact of only 8.79 percent because of the city's refinancing of certain bonds.
She estimated the owner of a $100,000 home would pay about $100 more in taxes because of the levy increase. The exact levy total is $18,231,834.
Nardi said past increases had been less than 5 percent but a growing deficit, pension payments and rising cost of insurance necessitated the higher levy.
"All communities are struggling," Nardi said. "Each year we're looking at a deficit of $1.5 (million) to $2 million."
Prior to the vote, Corporation Counsel T.J. Somer told the council approval of the increase was important in order to ensure necessary services continue to be provided in the city.
"We have to convey the message to the public that we really don't have much of a choice," Fourth Ward Alderman Joe Faso said. "We have to do something."
In other city news, the Council authorized Mayor Vincent Zaranti to execute a deed in lieu of a foreclosure agreement for the property at 601 Halsted St., the former site of Klawinski Heating and Cooling.
Somer said the action would allow the city to take title to the property so it can control its development.
"The deed in lieu process also will eliminate outstanding back taxes on the property, which will once again make it marketable," Somer said.

description.hltext_display: Safety on Lee Drive
description.content:
Date published: 12/22/2010 Thanks for reducing the speed limit on Lee Drive. I appreciate the beauty and convenience of using this roadway.
I have a lot of respect for the joggers and walkers who use this serene drive. However, I would like the joggers and walkers to have the same respect for the vehicular traffic.
Therefore, when jogging or walking in groups of two or more, please form a single-line procession, especially when near a curve. That way we can all enjoy the beauty, safety, and convenience of this beautiful area.
Elizabeth Eubank
Spotsylvania
Date published: 12/22/2010

description.hltext_display: UN bereichert sich im Südsudan: Danke für das Geld
description.content:
Danke für das Geld
Mit mehr als hundert Millionen Dollar finanzieren internationale Geber die Demobilisierung im Südsudan. Doch das meiste Geld bleibt in den Taschen der UN-Leute stecken. VON SIMONE SCHLINDWEIN
Wurden einst mit großen Hoffnungen begrüßt: UN-Mitarbeiter im Südsudan. Foto: reuters
JUBA taz | Gelangweilt hockt Alessio Akol im Klassenzimmer im Schulungszentrum in Südsudans Hauptstadt Juba. Der über 70-Jährige hat drei Monate täglich die Schulbank gedrückt. Der Lehrer hat ihm immer wieder das Alphabet heruntergebetet, die Zahlen von eins bis zwanzig wiederholt - Dinge, die der alte Mann von Kindheit an wusste. Er seufzt: "Dieses Training hilft mir kein bisschen weiter."
Akol diente 21 Jahre lang als Mediziner in Südsudans Rebellenarmee SPLA (Sudanesische Volksbefreiungsarmee), versorgte Verwundete und Kranke. Sein Spezialgebiet seien Leberkrankheiten wie Lepra und Typhus, sagt er. Vor zwei Jahren schickte ihn sein Offizier nach Hause: Er sei zu alt. Jetzt soll er lernen, ein ziviles Leben zu führen. "Ich brauche einen Mikrokredit, um Medikamente zu kaufen und in meinem Heimatdorf eine Apotheke aufzumachen, kein Analphabeten-Training." Doch man habe ihm gesagt, er müsse das Training absolvieren, das gehöre zum Programm.
Der alte Mann gehört zu rund 11.000 SPLA-Guerillakämpfern, die seit Juni 2009 im Südsudan demobilisiert wurden. Südsudans Demobilisierungsprogramm ist eines der umfassendsten in Afrika. Nach über 20 Jahren Bürgerkrieg verfügt die ehemalige Guerilla, die nun Südsudans offizielle Armee darstellt, noch über 140.000 bis 180.000 Soldaten. Davon sollen 90.000 entwaffnet werden. Die ersten 34.000 davon, deren Demobilisierung im Sommer 2009 anlief, sind ältere Männer wie Akol, Kindersoldaten, Krankenschwestern, Kranke und Kriegsversehrte. In der zweiten Phase werden ab 2011 rund 56.000 Kampftruppen nach Hause geschickt. Aber das UN-Programm dafür ist nach Recherchen der taz extrem ineffizient.
International finanzierte UN-Programme zur "Entwaffnung, Demobilisierung und Reintegration" (unter der englischen Abkürzung DDR geläufig) von Kämpfern gehören zum Standardprogramm von UN-Interventionen in Bürgerkriegsländern weltweit. Zuletzt gab es solche Programme neben Südsudan beispielsweis auch in den Ländern: Sierra Leone, Liberia, Kongo, Burundi, Haiti und Elfenbeinküste. Dabei werden die bisherigen Bürgerkriegsarmeen zusammengelegt und überschüssige Kämpfer können schließlich an UN-Sammelzentren ihre alten überflüssigen Waffen abgeben. Sie erhalten im Gegenzug dafür etwa Starthilfe in Form von Geld, Sachwerten und/oder Ausbildung für die Gründung einer neuen zivilen Existenz.
Eine erfolgreiche Demobilisierung ist wichtig für Südsudans Zukunft. Das Budget der SPLA verschlingt derzeit die Hälfte des Staatshaushalts. Der Sold steht seit drei Monaten aus. Die Regierung ist pleite. Die Armee zu verkleinern würde verhindern, dass bewaffnete Soldaten plündernd durch die Dörfer ziehen und sich nehmen, was sie zum Leben brauchen, oder Straßensperren errichten, um Schmiergelder zu erpressen.
Eigentlich hätte die Demobilisierung schon gleich nach dem Friedensabkommen 2005 anlaufen sollen. Damals erstellte die UN-Mission im Sudan (Unmis) eine Liste der zu demobilisierenden 90.000 Kämpfer. Nicht als Computerdatenbank, sondern handgeschrieben auf Papier. Diese Liste wurde mit der Gehaltsliste der SPLA abgeglichen. Die Aufgelisteten wurden von der SPLA entwaffnet und nach Hause geschickt - sie sollten auf das UN-Programm warten. Einer von ihnen war Akol.
Dann passierte jahrelang nichts. Die Entwaffneten blieben sich selbst überlassen. Die UN-Liste ist verschwunden. SPLA-Verbindungsoffiziere hetzen jetzt durch die Dörfer, um die Leute auf der Liste wiederzufinden. Diese frustrierten Exkämpfer sind ein gewaltiges Risiko für die Stabilität Südsudans.
Missmanagement der UN
Die Ungebildeten trainiert nun Morris Ruben, ein Grundschullehrer, der sich 1987 freiwillig der Guerilla angeschlossen hatte. Bis zum Rang des Hauptmanns stieg er auf. Im Jahr 2008 wurde auch er entlassen. Heute bringt er seinen ehemaligen Kameraden das Alphabet bei. Rund 200 Pfund bekomme er als Lehrer im Monat - in der Armee hatte er einst 1.000 Pfund erhalten.
Die ehemaligen SPLA-Kämpfer sind frustriert und enttäuscht. Er habe 20 Jahre im Busch für sein Land gekämpft, sagt Morris Ruben, und nun werde er mit einer Handvoll Zeug nach Hause geschickt: Eine Wolldecke, ein Moskitonetz, eine Schaufel, einen Eimer und einen Sack Mais - lauter Dinge, die er bereits besaß und deswegen auf dem Markt wieder verkauft hat. Plus 860 Pfund Startgeld, umgerechnet rund 260 Euro. Das reiche nicht einmal, um seine neun Kinder zur Schule zu schicken. "So behandelt man doch keine Helden!", sagt er.
William Deng, der Vorsitzende von Südsudans Entwaffnungs-, Demobilisierungs- und Reintegrationskommission (DDR), macht sich über all dies große Sorgen. Und er ist wütend, weil eigentlich genug Geld da sei. Viele DDR-Programme seien unterfinanziert. Dieses nicht. Doch das Geld werde "von der UN korrumpiert", so Deng.
Der großgewachsene Mann hat während des Kriegs in Kanada gelebt, anschließend in der UN-Mission in der Demokratischen Republik Kongo das Demobilisierungsprogramm für die Kriegsregion Ituri aufgebaut. Nun stellt er fest: Die UN habe im Südsudan ein Programm eingeführt, was auf Länder wie den Kongo zugeschnitten sei, wo nicht kongolesische Rebellen entwaffnet und in ihre Heimatländer zurückgebracht werden müssen. Diese Exkämpfer standen bei der Heimkehr mit leeren Händen da, sie brauchten Wasserkanister, Wolldecken, Maisrationen. "Doch unsere Leute sind schon seit Jahren zu Hause, haben wahrscheinlich eine viel bessere Wolldecke als die, die wir ihnen nun geben", sagt Deng kopfschüttelnd.
Ein ordentliches Programm müsse "effektiv, schnell und transparent ablaufen", sagt Deng und haut auf den Tisch. Doch genau an dieser Transparanz hapert es, und dafür macht Deng die UN-Entwicklungsagentur UNDP verantwortlich, die das Demobilisierungsgeld der internationalen Gemeinschaft verwaltet. Die UNDP hat zur Umsetzung des Programms internationale Nichtregierungsorganisationen als Vertragspartner beauftragt. Die Gesellschaft für Technische Zusammenarbeit (GTZ) führt das Trainingsprogramm im Bundesstaat Zentral-Äquatoria durch, auch in Juba. Die International Organisation für Migration (IOM) ist für Western Bahr El-Gazal zuständig und hat die irische "Concern" als Untervertragspartner angeheuert.
Wer sich hier welchen Teil des Kuchens abschneidet, sei völlig undurchschaubar, so Deng. Die Geberländer - unter anderem Italien, Japan, die Niederlande, Norwegen - haben bislang insgesamt 105 Millionen Dollar in den DDR-Fonds für Sudan einbezahlt, der auf 430 Millionen angelegt ist. Davon kommen 2,4 Millionen von der deutschen Bundesregierung. Der Wert des DDR-Pakets eines jeden Exsoldaten beträgt durchschnittlich 1.500 Dollar. Für insgesamt rund 200 Dollar werden Decken, Moskitonetze und andere Haushaltswaren für die ehemaligen Kämpfer gekauft sowie die Lebensmittelrationen für sie. Lehrer werden bezahlt, das Training durchgeführt, Transportkosten erstattet, Evaluationen unternommen.
Übrig bleiben danach für den einzelnen Exkämpfer dennoch nur rund 400 Dollar Startgeld. Der Grund: Die internationalen Organisationen müssen ebenfalls bezahlt werden. Schon die UNDP nimmt sieben Prozent Verwaltungsgebühr. "Weil das Programm komplex gestaltet ist, verlieren wir unterwegs in der Pipeline viel Geld", so Deng. Seine Kommission sei in die Verhandlungen mit den Vertragspartnern nicht einbezogen worden. Sein Einwand: "Es gibt nationale NGOs , die viel billiger sind als internationale NGOs." Dann würde am Ende viel mehr Geld für Leute wie Akol übrig bleiben.
Für Deng ist dieses Missmanagement eine Sicherheitsbedrohung. "Die Exkämpfer denken, wir klauen ihnen das Geld, das ihnen zusteht", sagt er.
Deng hat eine unabhängige Buchprüfung angefordert, um herauszufinden, wo das Geld versackt. Doch die UNDP hat nur eine interne Buchprüfung zugelassen, die von September bis Oktober stattfand. Das Ergebnis wurde nie veröffentlicht, auch Deng hat den Bericht nie erhalten. Der taz liegt nun dieser Bericht vor. Er ist vernichtend.
"Das Programm kann 2011 nicht aufrechterhalten werden", steht darin. Es gebe keine Strategie, wie die ausstehenden Teile des Budgets eingetrieben werden sollten, interne Kontrollen fehlten. Für die Durchführung des DDR-Programms in Nord- und Südsudan habe die UNDP 466 Mitarbeiter budgetiert, mit veranschlagten Personalkosten von rund 16,7 Millionen Dollar. Bislang hätten 328 Personen ihren Dienst angetreten, aber im Jahr 2010 schon über 20 Millionen Dollar bekommen. Rund 14 Millionen davon gingen an gerade 50 "internationale Fachkräfte".
Die Person mit der höchsten Gehaltsstufe, P6 im UN-Jargon, erhält dieses Jahr 370.216 Dollar; das ist ein Monatsgehalt von fast 31.000 Dollar - steuerfrei. Drei Angestellte, die im Kostenvoranschlag von 2008 gar nicht vorgesehen waren, erhalten die Gehaltsstufe P5, fast 28.000 Dollar im Monat für jeden einschließlich Ortszulagen. Die Buchprüfer haben sich auch die Einstellungsverfahren für diese Angestellten angeguckt, soweit es möglich war, da ein Großteil der Personalakten und Bewerberlisten nicht zur Verfügung standen. Ihr Ergebnis: "Das Einstellungsverfahren ist intransparent." Zahlreiche der hochbezahlten Angestellten erfüllen laut Bericht nicht die UN-internen Qualifikationsanforderungen.
Die UNDP geht davon aus, das Programm werde 20 bis 25 Prozent der früheren Kämpfer helfen, ein neues Leben aufzubauen. Vergleichbare Programme im Kongo gehen von mindestens 50 Prozent aus. Ein Gedankenspiel: Würde man jedem Exkämpfer die ihm zustehenden 1.500 Dollar bar in die Hand drücken, könnten viel mehr von ihnen einen Laden eröffnen, Land kaufen oder wie Akol Medikamente für eine Apotheke erwerben.
Auf taz-Nachfragen reagiert die UNDP verhalten. Es dauert Wochen, bis folgende Reaktion eintrifft: "Wir sind es den Leuten in Südsudan und unseren Gebern schuldig, dieses Programm so erfolgreich wie möglich zu gestalten, trotz der Schwierigkeiten. Wir überdenken nun, wie wir das Programm verbessern und die Zusammenarbeit mit der UN effizienter gestalten können." Auf die Frage mit der niedrigen Erfolgserwartung reagiert die UNDP: "Das Programm wird in einem Staat umgesetzt, der sich von einem langen Bürgerkrieg erholt. Das hat einen entscheidenden Einfluss auf die Ergebnisse."
Mehr zum Thema
Kommentar UN-Mission Südsudan
Fehler der UN gefährden den Frieden
Kommentar zur Spaltung des Sudans
Keine Seite kommt ohne die andere aus
Referendum über die Teilung des Sudan
Offene Hetze
Von den 105 Millionen gespendeten Geldern sind nach taz-Informationen noch rund 30 Millionen übrig. Und Südsudanesen wie der ehemalige Feldarzt Akol wird wohl nie genug Geld zusammenkriegen, um eine Apotheke zu eröffnen.

description.hltext_display: Slo County Proclaims Local Emergency
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Tuesday, December 21, 2010 9:12 PM EST
12.21.10
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY- Due to the damages resulting from the recent storms to both private property and public infrastructure that is beyond the ability of the county to control, and after consultation with County Counsel it seems necessary to make a Proclamation of Local Emergency and request the Governor to proclaim a State of Emergency for San Luis Obispo County and for him to request a federal disaster declaration.
Damages include flooding that has left homes unable to be occupied, primarily in the Oceano area, many areas of road damages such as landslides, a number of sewer system spills, and other storm damages, such as erosion. In addition to the physical damage there is the displacement of people from homes, potential ill effects from both flooding and sewer spills, and the potential in some cases for significant repairs to public infrastructure.
As a result, and in order to hopefully obtain assistance from any needed state and/or federal resources for recovery and damages from the recent storms and perhaps due to incoming storms it is deemed a Proclamation of Local Emergency is needed.

description.hltext_display: Südkorea kündigt neue Schießübungen an
description.content: Seoul (dpa) - Die Lage auf der koreanischen Halbinsel bleibt angespannt. Drei Tage nach Militärübungen nahe der umstrittenen innerkoreanischen Seegrenze hat Südkorea eine großangelegte Schießübung unweit der Landesgrenze zu Nordkorea angekündigt. Die eintägige Übung von Heeres- und Luftwaffeneinheiten soll morgen stattfinden. Es sei die bisher größte Übung dieser Art geplant, sagte ein Armeesprecher. Einen Monat nach dem Angriff Nordkoreas auf eine seiner Inseln im Gelben Meer will Südkorea damit erneut militärische Stärke demonstrieren.

description.hltext_display: Race to the Cup in Steamboat winds up with Canadians on top
description.content:
Blog about this Blog about this page on your steamboatpilot.com blog.
Photo Gallery
Race to the Cup parallel slalom
Steamboat Springs — Survival was the name of the game Tuesday afternoon at Howelsen Hill as a field of international snowboard racers faced tricky snow conditions and a course filled with speed bumps and death cookies.
“I wasn’t really pushing to win,” Canadian Matthew Carter said after capturing the parallel slalom title. “I just wanted to survive. The snow conditions made this race extremely difficult.”
The young Canadian said he avoided the soft outside lines, chunks of frozen snow and the bumps that formed as the race progressed. He knocked off Ryan Rosencranz, of the United States, in the opening round of the finals. Carter then moved past teammates Darren Gardner, Patrick Farrell and Steve Barlow en route to winning the parallel slalom title.
“It was a little bumpy out there,” Carter said. “I just tried to make a gameplan and stick to it. I’m really happy to get the win.”
Carter topped Barlow for the title in the men’s bracket of Tuesday’s event. Vic Wild, who trained in Steamboat Springs, placed third by beating Farrell in the small final. Wild was on track for the title in the slalom event, but a mistake in the first run of the semifinals was more than he could overcome.
“I’m a little frustrated with myself,” Wild said after the race. “I underestimated some of the younger guys, and I never should have. ”
Wild nearly overcame his mistake with an aggressive line that eroded much of the large lead Barlow held after the first run. But the effort fell just short, and Wild had to settle for the small finals to decide the third- and fourth-place finishers.
“I wasn’t giving it 100 percent,” Wild said. “But after losing in the semifinals, I decided to go all out.”
Americans Michael Trapp, Converse Fields, Rosencranz, Jack Taylor, Christian Allen and Michael Plachter qualified for the finals. Fields, Rosencranz and Taylor were beaten in the opening elimination round. Trapp advanced to the round of eight before losing to Wild. Trapp was seventh in the final results, and Allen was eighth.
The Canadians also picked up a victory in the women’s slalom race as Ekaterina Zavialova beat teammate Ariane Lavigne in the finals dual. Canadian Cora Fellows took third place after beating hometown favorite Madeline Wiencke in the small final. Wiencke won this race last year but was nonetheless happy with the fourth-place finish.
“Overall, I was really happy,” Wiencke said. “It’s been a pretty tough year, and even though I didn’t get on the podium, I’m hoping this race will give me some confidence.”
Wiencke is on the road to recovery after a series of concussions. The head injuries, one while training at Howelsen Hill in December 2009 and another from a competition in Canada in January, sidelined the Steamboat racer for most of the past season. It also impacted her training schedule this summer.
Tuesday’s race marked the end of this year’s Race to the Cup in Steamboat. Monday night’s slalom featured a tough international field that made it feel more like a World Cup than a NorAm. The field for Tuesday’s event wasn’t quite as tough after the teams from Austria and Switzerland elected to skip the event.
Several other riders from Steam­­boat Springs also ad­­­vanced to the finals Tuesday. Cass­­an­dra Wagar lost to Japan’s Shoko Miyatake in the first round. On the men’s side, Trapp lost to Wild in the quarterfinals.
— To reach John F. Russell call 871-4209 or e-mail jrussell@steamboatpilot.com

event_or_fact.property: after capturing the parallel slalom title

description.hltext_display: Pas de respect pour les techno pionnières
description.content:
Quel regard portent les écoliers d’aujourd’hui sur les anciens supports de données numériques ou les premières consoles de jeu?
Der TV-Player benötigt einen aktuellen Adobe Flash Player: Flash herunterladen
Ils y répondent dans une vidéo. On y voit par exemple des ados se demander si une disquette est un moyen de paiement.

description.hltext_display: Nowitzki lässt Bird in NBA-Punkteliste hinter sich
description.content: Orlando (dpa) - Superstar Dirk Nowitzki hat in der «ewigen» NBA- Punkteliste Basketball-Legende Larry Bird überholt. Zum 105:99-Sieg seiner Dallas Mavericks bei Orlando Magic steuerte Nowitzki 17 Punkte bei und kommt in seiner NBA-Karriere nun auf 21 798 Zähler. Damit belegt er den 25. Rang in der Bestenliste der nordamerikanischen Basketball-Profiliga.

description.hltext_display: "The Tree Angel," the New Book by TSI Artist and Author, Eliza Locke, is Available Today on Amazon.com
description.author: Tread Softly Ink
description.content: --(PR.com)-- TSI artist and author, Eliza Locke, has released her second book, a true and poignant winter's tale titled "The Tree Angel," just in time for the holidays. With this inspiring story, suitable for children, Locke has deviated from her signature exploration of the darker side of life, while still examining the familiar themes of redemption and hope, and the significance of the unlikely encounter with a stranger.Locke's first book, an intimate collection of poetry titled, "Kissing In Iceland," was very well received and is currently available at all major online booksellers.For all press inquiries, please contact, feedback@elizalocke.com.For more information on Eliza Locke, please visit her website at www.elizalocke.com.For more information on Tread Softly Ink, please visit www.treadsoftlyink.com.###"The Tree Angel," written by Eliza Locke and illustrated by internationally acclaimed artist, Gabriel Bishop, is a true and inspiring winter's tale suitable for children (8+) and adults alike. It is available now on Amazon.com and at other booksellers across the US.

description.hltext_display: Hard science
description.content:
Is the FDA's action on Avastin a prelude to heal rationing?
Date published: 12/22/2010
LAST WEEK, the Food and Drug Administration moved to revoke approval of the drug Avastin for metastatic breast cancer. Is it the first step toward health care rationing? Death panels? Or simply a logical, science-based decision?
Avastin (bevacizumab) is a new type of cancer-fighting drug. It starves tumors by limiting their ability to form new blood vessels. Approved in 2008 under a program that pushes promising drugs into the market quickly, Avastin has been used to stall lung, colon, kidney, and brain cancers as well as metastatic breast cancer.
But four studies, says the FDA, have shown that the drug has little beneficial effect against breast cancer, extending patients' lives by perhaps a month. And the possibilities of serious side effects--heart attack, extremely high blood pressure, and hemorrhage--are real.
An FDA panel, made up of officials "with experience in treating breast cancer," has therefore chosen to remove Avastin's approval for that one form of cancer. The ruling was not made lightly: The FDA's Janet Woodcock said, "Today's decision was a difficult one for the agency."
Some 17,500 breast cancer patients currently use Avastin, and the FDA's action means some insurance companies will probably disallow it. Sen. David Vitter, R-La., reacted, saying the "FDA has chosen to place itself between patients and their doctors by rationing access to a life-extending drug. We can't allow this government takeover of health care to continue any further."
This, of course, is political hyperbole. The FDA's mission includes ensuring the safety and effectiveness of drugs. While it's true Avastin is expensive (it can cost $8,000 per month), the FDA's action was based on testing, not economics.
Avastin's manufacturer, Genentech, is appealing the decision. Hopefully science, not hysterics, will guide the eventual outcome.

event_or_fact.property: Today's decision was a difficult one for the agency.

description.hltext_display: Leichte Entspannung am Frankfurter Flughafen
description.content: Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - Aufatmen auf dem Flughafen Frankfurt: Auf dem wichtigsten deutschen Airport sind am Morgen wieder alle Start- und Landebahnen in Betrieb. Das sagte ein Sprecher des Betreibers Fraport. Es deute alles darauf hin, dass sich die Dinge entspannen. Die Überhänge von gestern Abend seien fast abgebaut. Obwohl der Flugbetrieb «reibungslos» laufe, müssten 60 Flüge gestrichen werden. Den Tag über werde man versuchen, die etwa 3500 gestrandeten Passagiere zusätzlich zum normalen Passagieraufkommen in den Maschinen unterzubringen.

description.hltext_display: «Shake ton booty» sur «Dance Central»
description.content:
Le concept «Dance Central» est similaire aux autres jeux de danse: effectuer un rythme en chorégraphie. Sauf que dans ce jeu, difficile de tricher! A moins que vous ayez le rythme dans la peau ou que vous soyez le roi du Moonwalk, le défi n’est pas évident à relever. Les bras, les jambes, le bassin ou la tête, tous vos mouvement sont détectés par le périphérique Kinect.
Xbox360-Kinect. Harmonix.
Age pegi 12ans
****
Le mode miroir est idéal pour progresser et coordonner vos gestes mais aussi un peu frustrant. Un halo autour du danseur se remplit de couleurs (rouge, jaune, vert, bleu) en fonction de la réussite de votre mouvement. Si vous reproduisez mal les gestes de la personne au centre de l’écran, ses membres deviennent rouge.
Une danse réussie vous permettra de débloquer des personnages, des lieux ou encore des défis. Bien entendu, vous pouvez comparez vos performances de danseur avec les joueurs du monde entier.
Une playlist bien fournie
Avec une navigation intuitive où l’on passe d’un menu à l’autre d’un mouvement de la main, un design sympa et un gameplay réaliste, vous vous laisserez vite entraîner dans une expérience riche en émotion. Quelle que soit votre humeur ou vos préférences musicales, il y'en a pour tous les goûts. De Rihanna à Snoop Dog en passant par Benny Benassi, la playlist est bien fournie et variée.
Dans le mode «Freestyle», laissez libre cours à votre sens inné du rythme, la vidéo filmée par Kinect passe ensuite en accéléré. Fous-rire garantis !
Il existe un mode «Battle» qui permet à deux joueurs de s’affronter successivement. Mais pas de mode multi. Seul gros bémol. Dommage pour un jeu qui aurait pu être des plus conviviaux.
Plus de Hi-tech

description.hltext_display: FDP-Politiker fordern Ende der Debatte über Westerwelle
description.content: Berlin (dpa) - Die FDP erneut im Umfragetief: Jetzt versuchen führende Liberale, die Debatte über Parteichef Guido Westerwelle zu beruhigen. Entwicklungsminister Dirk Niebel mahnte, die FDP könne nur bestehen, wenn sie zusammenhalte. Der Chef der Jungen Liberalen, Lasse Becker, forderte Westerwelle aber auch zur Selbstkritik auf. Becker appellierte an den Parteichef, beim Dreikönigstreffen in Stuttgart «selbstkritisch den einen oder anderen Fehler zu benennen». In der jüngsten Forsa-Umfrage ist die FDP auf drei Prozent abgesackt.

description.hltext_display: Governor Declares SLO County State of Emergency
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Wednesday, December 22, 2010 2:54 AM EST
Video Gallery
2:07
12-21-10
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY -
A second storm is now pounding away at the Central Coast, and now San Luis Obispo County officials asked the State for help.
That help is on the way for Terri Boyd of Oceano, who was up to her ankles in water inside her home.
The house is severely flood-damaged and she feels neglected by local agencies.
Tuesday night, San Luis Obispo County declared a Local Emergency after unrelenting rains, and swollen waterways, washed out roads, ruined several houses, and tapped out local resources.
Hours later, the governor proclaimed the County a State of Emergency.
"We don't have the resources to help these people, we need the State declaration from the Governor and we've requested him to ask for a Federal Disaster Declaration, which is what we really need to help these folks," said Ron Aslop, Emergency Services Manager.
Now County agencies can get to work. They can get assistance straight from the State, which would otherwise be unavailable immediately.
That's good news for families in Oceano, as they return to their flood-damaged homes, and prepare for the next bout of heavy rain and wind.
"It helps streamline things like our purchase process," said Aslop. "Just an example- a dump truck- we can call up a vendor, and say 'Hey come help us.'"

event_or_fact.property: It helps streamline things like our purchase process

description.hltext_display: 日本發明萬能讀卡器
Etisalat Misr inks $1.2 bln financing for expansion
description.content:
DUBAI (Reuters) - Etisalat Misr, the Egyptian arm of UAE telco Etisalat on Wednesday signed a 7.2 billion Egyptian pounds financing deal, partly to fund local expansion.
The agreement was signed with a consortium of local and regional banks including state-owned National Bank of Egypt, Banque Misr and National Bank of Abu Dhabi, according to a statement on the Qatar News Agency website.

description.hltext_display: ETPs: Modest gains for PC and ABS
description.content:
Polycarbonate prices continued to climb in late autumn, but the upward price push finally ran out of steam as the year drew to a close.
Material availability gradually improved during the final quarter of 2010 as supply restrictions caused by maintenance work at major PC plants in the late autumn came to an end. Imports were reported as being at normal levels.
Order intake was good throughout the last quarter with some producers reportedly sold out and unable to meet demand for any additional material. Automotive industry polycarbonate demand was said to be significantly higher during the second half of the year than in the first six months.
Polycarbonate prices are expected to rise sharply in Q1 as producers announced planned price hikes ranging between €260-300/tonne, in most cases taking effect from 1st December 2010.
ABS suppliers refrained from announcing any fresh price hikes during the final quarter last year, following some sizeable price gains in Q3. ABS prices were nevertheless adjusted upward to reflect rising feedstock costs. Black/white grade prices were particularly affected by a surge in the cost of titanium dioxide.
ABS natural grade availability improved during the last quarter following completion of BASF’s annual maintenance programme at their Antwerp plant. Coloured and black/white grades were in tighter supply. Imported material, which had not been much in evidence for quite a while, started to reappear towards the end of the year.
ABS demand was relatively lively throughout the last quarter with particularly good order intake from the automotive and E&E sectors. Amid reports of restricted availability and rising Asian prices, converters are determined not to run short of material.
Tell us what you think

Your real name and email address are still required.

description.hltext_display: Auto parts store gets approval
description.content:
SOUTH HOLLAND | O'Reilly Auto Parts should be coming soon to South Holland.
The Village Board on Monday agreed to grant tax increment finance redevelopment for the property at 901 E. 162nd St. That property includes a 7,200-square-foot building that owner Ralph Edgar will lease to O'Reilly.
The tax break ordinance was needed to help bring in new business, and the board was happy to oblige.
The board also approved a motion to adopt a new emergency operations plan. The plan, which details what steps should be followed for various emergency situations, will go to the Cook County Board for approval.
An agreement was approved between the village and the Illinois Risk Management Trust for liability insurance for 2011.
The board also announced the South Holland Youth Commission will host Winter Break Camp from Dec. 27 through 31.
As in past years, children have the option to attend all or some of the activities. The fee for the week is $50. This year's Winter Break Camp will have field trips to Shedd Aquarium, the Field Museum, the Museum of Science and Industry, and the Hollywood Boulevard Movie Theater.
There will be a lock-in at the Community Center with fun activities from 10 p.m. Dec. 30 until 7 a.m. Dec. 31. Participation is limited to the first 100 paid participants. There is no registration deadline, but participants are accepted on a first-come, first-served basis.
Ed Stewart, deputy director of Parks and Recreation, said the program has been well-received by the community.
"It gives our parents and youth some options for the time kids are out of school and provides a positive environment for students to socialize with their peers," he said.
To register for the program, visit the Community Center at 501 E. 170th St. or call (708) 331-2940.

description.hltext_display: Indien testet atomwaffenfähige Rakete
description.content: Neu Delhi (dpa) - Einen Tag nach Pakistan hat auch Erzrivale Indien wieder atomwaffenfähige Raketen getestet. Die Starts seien erfolgreich verlaufen, sagte ein Sprecher des Verteidigungsministeriums in Neu Delhi. Zwei Boden-Boden-Raketen mit einer Reichweite von 350 Kilometern seien von einem Testgelände an Küste des ostindischen Bundesstaats Orissa abgefeuert worden. Pakistan hatte erst gestern eine atomwaffenfähige Rakete getestet.

description.hltext_display: Die Bahn lässt mehr Züge fahren auch im Rheintal
description.content: BERLIN (AFP). Wegen des Winterwetters setzt die Bahn von Mittwoch an mehr Züge ein. Dies gelte vor allem für die Ost-West- und Nord-Süd-Verbindungen, kündigte Fernverkehrsvorstand Berthold Huber an. Der neue Fahrplan soll bis Jahresende gelten. Da auf den Strecken Köln-Berlin, Hamburg-München und den Verbindungen von Hamburg über das Ruhrgebiet nach Stuttgart, Basel und München zusätzliche IC-Züge eingesetzt würden, müssten anderswo ersatzweise auch Regionalzüge fahren. Es könne sein, dass die Reisenden häufiger umsteigen müssten und länger unterwegs seien. Die Fahrplanänderungen stehen auf dem Internetportal der Bahn. Werbung

description.hltext_display: Parlament in Athen stimmt über Sparhaushalt ab
description.content: Athen (dpa) - Im griechischen Parlament geht die Debatte über den umstrittenen Sparhaushalt in die letzte Runde. Nach fünf Tagen hitziger Kontroversen soll unmittelbar nach Mitternacht die Abstimmung über den Haushalt 2011 beginnen. Das neue Budget sieht massive Sparmaßnahmen und Mehrbelastungen für die Bürger vor. Damit will die sozialistische Regierung über sechs Milliarden Euro zusätzlich aufbringen. Aus Protest gegen die harten Sparmaßnahmen legten Busfahrer und Zugführer in Athen heute erneut für 24 Stunden die Arbeit nieder.

description.hltext_display: Penjaga Malam Disekap, Perampok Gasak Isi?
description.content:
Berita Aktual » Daerah
Penjaga Malam Disekap, Perampok Gasak Isi Sekolah
Rembang, CyberNews. Belum juga kasus perampokan terhadap pasangan suami istri pedagang emas di Kecamatan Kaliori, Kabupaten Rembang, seminggu lalu terungkap, sekawanan perampok kembali berulah di wilayah hukum Polres Rembang.
Kali ini, para perampok berhasil membawa kabur berbagai peralatan elektronik seperti LCD proyektor, monitor layar datar, laptop hingga peralatan musik organ dan gitar petik, milik SMPN 3 Pamotan. “Total kerugian ditaksir mencapai lebih dari Rp 58 juta,” terang Mukhid SPd, Kepala SMPN 3 Pamotan, Rabu (22/12).
Peristiwa bermula saat Sutrisno (44), penjaga malam, tiba-tiba didatangi beberapa orang tak dikenal dari arah belakang sekolah, sekitar pukul 00.30 dini hari. Mereka yang sebagian besar mengenakan topi dan penutup muka itu, langsung menangkap dan mengikat Sutrisno. Selain mulut dilakban, ia kemudian disekap di ruang kepala sekolah.
Sekitar satu jam para pelaku yang diperkirakan sebanyak tujuh orang itu leluasa beraksi. Mereka juga mencuri kain sprei kasur di ruang UKS untuk membungkus layar monitor dan barang curian lainnya.
Sebuah pintu di ruang brangkas juga sempat dirusak. Namun, para pencuri tak sampai menguras isinya. Sutrisno sendiri tak sempat meminta pertolongan karena letak sekolahnya jauh dari pemukiman dan rumah terdekat berjarak sekitar 300 meter dari sekolah.
Setelah puas menggasak barang-barang milik sekolah, lanjut Mukhid, mereka kemudian melepas Sutrisno dan kabur ke arah timur menggunakan mobil. ”Penjaga kami langsung berlari menuju Mapolsek Pamotan untuk melaporkan kejadian pencurian ini,” jelasnya.
Terpisah, Kapolres Rembang AKBP Kukuh Kalis Susilo didampingi Kapolsek Pamotan AKP Eddy Pujiharto dan Kasi Humas Aipda Mohammad Zuhdi mengaku masih terus mengembangkan kasus perampokan ini. ”Kami hingga Rabu siang masih terus mengorek keterangan dari Sutrisno dan mencoba mengumpulkan bukti, serta kemungkinan adanya saksi lainnya,” katanya.
( Saiful Annas /CN26 )

description.hltext_display: Joanne Palmer: Advice for pets during the holidays
description.content:
Joanne Palmer's Life in the 'Boat column appears Wednesdays in the Steamboat Today. E-mail her atjpalmer@springsips.com
Steamboat Springs — Dear Bowser:
I am so glad you started an advice column for pets. I need help, pronto. It’s the holiday season, and I just can’t get into the spirit of things. I have done a terrible thing. I am mad at my owner. I have not wagged my tail or greeted her at the door for five days. I feel so guilty, but they left me. My entire pack left town for three days. They have never all left before and it was terrible. I was so lonely. The person who came to take care of me was very nice, but he forgot to put ice cubes in my water. I have to have my water chilled, or I just can’t drink it. I know I am a little high maintenance, but I am a poodle. After they got home, they had a party and I stole a chunk of expensive cheese right off the coffee table … karma!
— Holding a Grudge
Dear Grudge:
You better not pout, you-know-who is coming to town! That said, ’tis the season for high expectations and big disappointments — but don’t give into it. Think about all the times your owner has forgiven you. Perhaps you were a puppy and had an accident on the rug? Forgiveness is a road that travels in both directions, so I’d advise you to get on it. Immediately.
Dear Bowser:
I am an elephant writing to protest the phrase “white elephant holiday parties.” It’s no longer politically correct, don’t you agree? Besides, who wants a dopey gift like a toilet paper roll that sings?
— Trunk in a Knot
Dear Trunk in a Knot:
Excellent point! It never occurred to me, or to anyone else, I’m sure. However, this is the time of year to maintain a sense of humor, so find a reason to celebrate. Have an extra peanut or two!
Dear Bowser:
I have sniffed all over the house, and I can’t find one present for me. I have checked all the usual hiding places — under the bed, in the linen closet and in the pantry. Alas, there is nothing. I wanted a new dog bed and some Greenies, but from the look of things, I am going to end up with the proverbial lump of charcoal. I have been a good dog all year, guarding the house, barking at noisy snowblowers and keeping all pesky cats away.
— Neglected
Dear Neglected:
It’s not Christmas yet! Patience. I advise patience.
Dear Bowser:
I know most of your readers are dogs and cats, but I am a tarantula with a problem. My owners have moved me upstairs to make room for the holiday decorations, and I don’t like it up here one bit. It is dark, and I like the heat. My other spot had afternoon sunshine, which inspired me to do my spider aerobics. What can I do?
— Spidey
Dear Spidey:
Two words: Charlotte’s Web. Charlotte was able to spin words into her web. If that won’t work for you, try playing dead. Once your owner sees you on your back with all eight of your legs in the air, believe me something will happen.
Dear Bowser:
As a cat I never need or take advice, but just this one time I’m going to ask: Do you think it’s OK to climb the Christmas tree when no one is home?
— Rebel
Dear Rebel:
Well, I know cats are agile, but if just this once you lost your footing and the tree fell over you’d feel terrible. Wait until Dec. 26th.

description.hltext_display: Superrr!
description.author: Hutzanca
description.content:
Ca o cotofana trendy care se respecta, metropotamul (format in proportie de 80% din fete) adora accesoriile si zdranganelele frumos facute. Nu o data insa a cascat ochii (si a strans mai aproape de sine portofelul) in fata preturilor mari ale bijuteriilor si gablonturilor artizanale. Si atunci, desi respecta manopera si timpul artistului care face biju-urile respective, metropotamul s-a gandit ca isi poate face si singur accesorii simpatice, chiar mai valoroase, pentru ca ar fi rezultatul propriei inspiratii si transpiratii.
Pentru asta e nevoie insa de un furnizor de materie prima "semipreparata", adica de ate, sforicele, fire, margele, buline, inchizatori si alte unelte necesare ca sa iti poti face singura o bratara, un colier sau sa iti decorezi o geanta, spre exemplu.
Unul dintre magazinele (online) care ofera asemenea materiale este Maria Shop.
Iata ce am gasit acolo (click pe poze ca sa ajungi direct in pagina produsului):
Margele de sticla: 10 bucati / 2,4 lei; margele rasina 5 bucati / 2,6 lei; margele mici (4mm): 50 gr / 3,5 lei; stea de cristal: 1 bucata / 8 lei; margele de lemn: 20 bucati / 1,8 lei; cloisonne: 3 bucati / 3,4 lei
Pe langa acestea, in magazinul online mai gasesti si o colectie serioasa de margele din pietre semipretioase: coral, jad, ametist, turcoaz, si chiar perle naturale, portelan si sticla de Cehia, care se vand ori la sirag, ori la bucata (sau seturi de 3, 5, 10).
Zale steluta: 10 bucati / 2 lei; cilindru: 10 bucati / 3,2 lei; accesoriu: 4 bucati / 3,4 lei; inchizatoare: 10 bucati / 2,6 lei; inchizatoare frunza: 1 bucata / 1,8 lei; inimioare argintate: 5 bucati / 3,3 lei
In sectiunea de accesorii gasesti, desigur, si o gama larga de inchizatori si tije pentru bratari, cercei si coliere.
La capitolul sarme, snururi, fire am gasit ce cautam in copilarie (pentru lucru manual) fara succes prin mercerii: guta elastica de toate culorile (6 lei mosorul de 10-12m), lanturi de diverse lungimi si cu zale de toate marimile, ata cerata (1,5 lei mosorul de 5m), snururi din piele, panglici de organza, de saten, faux suede si sarme colorate.
Toate bune si frumoase, dar daca toata lumea poate sa insire margele pe ata, cu sarma e in schimb mai complicat. Pentru asta iti trebuie unelte: clestii costa 9-10 lei si gasesti acolo si suporturi pentru legat atele si firele in timpul procesului.
Pe site-ul mariashop.ro gasesti si o sectiune de bijuterii gata facute si paste de modelat (cernit, fimo). Comanda minima este de 50 de lei, expedierea se face in maximum 7 zile, se acorda reduceri la comenzi in valoare mai mare. Gasiti mai multe detalii la sectiunile Cum cumperi, Livrare si Utile.
Nu in ultimul rand, daca sunteti noi in bransa, puteti trage cu ochiul si pe forum, sa vedeti ce se mai discuta si acolo, poate mai "furati" niste meserie de la cei care se pricep.

description.hltext_display: Hochwasser in Los Angeles - Orkan im Anzug
description.content: Los Angeles (dpa) - Nach anhaltenden Regenfällen mit Überschwemmungen wird der Süden Kaliforniens auch von orkanartigen Stürmen bedroht. Das nationale US-Wetteramt hat für Los Angeles und die Region eine Sturmwarnung ausgegeben. Die Evakuierung besonders gefährdeter Regionen werde vorbereitet, berichtet die «Los Angeles Times». Durch die schweren Regenfälle drohe Flutgefahr auch in den ebenen Gebieten rund um die Millionenmetropole.

description.hltext_display: Council takes away mayor's hiring authority, wants city investigated
description.content:
CALUMET CITY | Amid Christmas merriment Tuesday night, the City Council approved by a 7-0 vote an ordinance that eliminates Mayor Michelle Markiewicz Qualkinbush's authority to hire and fire municipal employees.
The council also voted without opposition to approve a resolution asking the city clerk's office to get law enforcement entities to investigate city government because of a 2006 contract involving Lansing-based Tri-County Recovery & Towing Services.
Qualkinbush said she was given no notice either proposal would be on the agenda. She said she would veto the employment measure Jan. 13 when City Council has its next regular meeting.
"It is part of my statutory duty to hire and fire city employees," Qualkinbush said. "They (the City Council) don't have the authority. They can't do this. This is not something that the Council has any say over."
The resolution concerning an investigation says the clerk should contact the Cook County state's attorney's office, the Illinois attorney general's office, the U.S. Attorney's office for northern Illinois and the public corruption unit of the FBI based in Springfield.
It says those entities should investigate the hiring of Tri-County Recovery & Towing Services, looking into city employees who also were employed by the Lansing-based company.
"The city clerk is further directed to request criminal prosecution for failure to abide by the terms of the towing agreement and for the theft of $192,786 of monies due and owing the city," the measure states.
The investigation measure was approved with no discussion during the 12-minute meeting. Qualkinbush said she'd like to talk with aldermen regarding why they put the measure on the agenda.
She said she has her own documents related to the Tri-County contract that she will turn over to the city clerk's office.

description.hltext_display: 66 Pembina Pramuka Banyuurip Ikuti Kursus?
description.content:
Berita Aktual » Daerah
66 Pembina Pramuka Banyuurip Ikuti Kursus Mahir Lanjutan
Purworejo, CyberNews. Sebanyak 66 pembina pramuka siaga mengikuti kegiatan kursus mahir lanjutan (KML) yang diselenggarakan oleh Gerakan Pramuka Kwartir Ranting Banyuurip Purworejo di komplek kampus SMPN 33. KML ini berlangsung selama lima hari sejak Sabtu (18/12) dan baru berakhir Rabu (22/12).
Ketua Kwaran Banyuurip Kuntari Watini SPd didampingi Ketua Panitia KML Fatonah SPd menjelaskan, para peserta kursus itu merupakan guru pembina pramuka yang sebagian besar berasal dari SD/MI di wilayah Kecamatan Banyuurip. Namun, ada sebagian juga yang merupakan utusan dari Kwaran lainnya.
"Kwaran Banyuurip sendiri membawahi 30 SD, 5 SLTP, dan 6 SLTA. KML ini diperuntukkan bagi guru pembina pramuka siaga yang ada di sekolah tingkat dasar," katanya.
Dalam KML tersebut, lanjutnya, peserta tidak hanya mendapatkan materi pembelajaran di dalam kelas dalam bentuk teori-teori saja. Tapi langsung dilakukan praktik, sehingga kemasan kegiatannya dilakukan dengan berkemah bersama di halaman kampus SMPN 33.
Kuntari menjelaskan, KML dilaksanakan dengan tujuan memberikan bekal pengetahuan lanjutan dan pengalaman kepada pembina pramuka guna meningkatkan kemampuan dan profesionalitasnya.
"Harapan kami, setelah KML ini ada perkembangan positif dalam mengelola gugus depan dalam satuan pramuka tingkat siaga. Sehingga gerakan pramuka di Kabupaten Purworejo benar-benar eksis," katanya.
Terpisah, Ketua Panitia Fatonah SPd menambahkan, peserta mendapatkan materi pelatihan lanjutan berkaitan dengan dunia kepramukaan sekaligus disertai dengan praktiknya. Peserta juga mendapatkan materi ISQ dari tim outbond Pemkab Purworejo di bawah pimpinan Drs Pram Prasetya Achmad MM.
( Nur Kholiq /CN26 )

description.hltext_display: Frauenfotos zeigten keine Opfer von Serienmörder
description.content: LOS ANGELES (AFP). Die Polizei der US-Metropole Los Angeles hat 20 Frauen aus einer Liste von 180 möglichen Opfern eines mutmaßlichen Serienmörders identifizieren können. Die meisten von ihnen seien wohlauf, der Rest eines natürlichen Todes gestorben, teilten die Ermittler mit. Sie hatten vergangene Woche 180 Frauenfotos veröffentlicht, die sie im Haus des Verdächtigen Lonnie Franklin gefunden hatten. Der Mechaniker war im Juli festgenommen worden. Er soll zwischen 1985 und 2007 elf Frauen vergewaltigt und ermordet haben. Werbung

description.hltext_display: 80 milionë për Opera Mini
description.content:
Opera Mini vazhdon të rritet dhe s’ka të ndalur. Është njoftuar se gjatë nëntorit këtë shfletues mobil e kanë shfrytëzuar 80 milionë njerëz.
Sipas të dhënave të Operas, shfletuesi i tyre mobil gjatë nëntorit është shfrytëzuar nga 80 milionë njerëz. Krahasuar me një muaj më parë, kjo shifër paraqet rritje për 3.7 milionë.
Shfrytëzuesit e Opera Minit në nëntor kanë hapur gjithsej 44.6 miliardë faqe, e qarkullimi i përgjithshëm i internetit i shpenzuar në to është 677 milionë megabajt që krahasuar me muajin e njëjtë të vitit kaluar paraqet rritje prej 137.6 për qind.
Nëntë prej dhjetë modeleve më të popullarizuara në të cilët shfrytëzohet Opera Mini janë prodhuar nga Nokia. Në vendin e pestë është futur edhe iPhone. /Telegrafi/

description.hltext_display: Владельцев типовых «двушек» и 6 соток освободят от налога
description.content:
Минэкономразвития предложило новые натуральные вычеты при уплате единого налога
Минэкономразвития РФ предложило установить два вида натуральных вычетов при уплате единого налога на недвижимость. Они составят 55 квадратных метров для жилья и 6 соток для земельных участков. Это означает, что собственники недвижимости такой или меньшей площади будут освобождены от налога.
Предполагается, что граждане смогут самостоятельно распределять этот вычет между объектами имущества. Кроме того, чиновники предлагают ввести денежный вычет в 3 млн. рублей, что примерно соответствует средней стоимости квартиры в России.
По мнению чиновников, вычет в 55 квадратных метров должен распространяться только на одну квартиру, а не способствовать приобретению небольших долей в нескольких квартирах. Денежный вычет, в свою очередь, задуман как дополнительная мера поддержки социально незащищенных слоев населения. Чиновники предлагают ввести налог с рыночной цены квартир сразу же после того, как закончится массовая оценка недвижимости (в 2012 году), передает Лента.Ру.
Задача по введению в России единого налога на недвижимость была поставлена правительством еще в 2000 году. Однако его введение неоднократно откладывалось из-за отсутствия единого кадастра жилой и нежилой недвижимости, а также методики ее массовой оценки. По мнению чиновников, переход к новому налогу, который будет основан на оценке рыночной стоимости недвижимости, позволит значительно упростить систему налогообложения в интересах налогоплательщика.
В сентябре 2010 года Минфин подготовил поправки в законодательство, предусматривающие введение единого налога. Ведомство предложило установить базовую ставку в размере 0,1% от рыночной стоимости недвижимости с возможным ее уменьшением в регионах. Окончательный размер ставки будет зависеть от результатов массовой оценки. В ноябре Минэкономразвития утвердило федеральный стандарт оценки кадастровой стоимости объектов.
Налог на недвижимость, который заменит налоги на имущество и землю, появится не раньше 2013 года. В настоящее время налог на имущество граждан и организаций рассчитывается от среднегодовой стоимости имущества по оценке бюро технической инвентаризации, которая существенно ниже рыночной. Налог на землю также рассчитывается от стоимости участков по оценке БТИ.

description.hltext_display: Judge refuses to release George Ryan
description.author: Andy Grimm and Joel Hood
description.content:
Ex-governor sought early release to be with terminally ill wife
George Ryan Jr., son of former Gov. George Ryan, helps his mother, Lura Lynn, into the family's Kankakee home Tuesday after a federal judge denied the ex-governor's request for early release from prison. (Zbigniew Bzdak, Chicago Tribune / December 20, 2010)
Related
George Ryan through the years
Stories
X
Text Size
ct-met-george-ryan-ruling-1222-20101221
The federal judge who sentenced former Gov. George Ryan to 61/2 years in prison in 2006 refused Tuesday to release him early from custody, saying that while she was saddened by his wife's terminal illness, Ryan was to blame for his own plight.
Ryan's wrongdoing "has exacted a stiff penalty not only for himself but also for his family," U.S. District Judge Rebecca Pallmeyer concluded near the end of her 58-page ruling.
Coming a few days before Christmas, the decision is a bitter blow for Ryan's family. The former governor's son and namesake, George Ryan Jr., paused to keep his composure as he started to address more than a dozen reporters and photographers in front of the family's Kankakee home and then in a shaky voice ripped the ruling as "heartless and cruel."
"Is this what American justice is now?" he said.
As he spoke, other family members took Lura Lynn Ryan, 76, to begin radiation therapy for what lawyers last week said was a newly diagnosed aggressive, incurable cancer. Her son said she was "devastated" by the judge's ruling and "in a lot of pain."
"He's devastated as well, and he's just worried sick about my mother," he said of his father, 76, who has spent more than three years in prison, mostly at a federal prison camp in Terre Haute, Ind.
The bulk of Pallmeyer's lengthy decision dealt with a bid by Ryan's lawyers to throw out the former governor's convictions tied to "honest services" fraud after the U.S. Supreme Court limited the scope of the controversial law. She rejected the request, saying Ryan's conduct amounted to accepting bribes and kickbacks, as required by the high court.
In the opinion's final two pages, the judge shot down releasing Ryan from prison to be with his wife, who according to her doctor has three to six months to live "at best."
Pallmeyer referred to "the sad news" of Lura Lynn Ryan's terminal illness. But she noted she had "the painful duty" to rebuff even more compelling requests for freedom, including by those who are the sole supporters of children or the lone caregivers for disabled relatives.
"Any sensitive judge realizes that a lengthy prison term effectively robs the convicted person of what we all value most: months and years with loved ones, some of whom will no longer be there when the sentence has been served," she wrote. "Mr. Ryan, like other convicted persons, undoubtedly wishes it were otherwise. His conduct has exacted a stiff penalty not only for himself but also for his family."
Pallmeyer, considered among local attorneys to be a compassionate judge, presided over Ryan's six-month trial in 2006. Her 61/2 -year prison sentence was less than prosecutors had sought and near the low end of federal sentencing guidelines, said Patrick Collins, a former federal prosecutor who led the case against Ryan. A jury convicted Ryan of racketeering, fraud and other charges for accepting gifts for himself and his family in return for lucrative state contracts and leases.
"I don't think anyone in the prosecution is rejoicing about the decision, but Judge Pallmeyer made the right decision," Collins said.
Ryan's attorneys pledged to appeal Pallmeyer's ruling and to petition the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to release Ryan on "compassionate grounds."
Standing beside Ryan's son in Kankakee, attorney Andrea Lyon leveled a harsh critique of Pallmeyer's ruling as "wrong on the facts and wrong on the law." Lyon, too, became emotional, stammering when a reporter asked if the ruling would be "more ammunition" for an appeal.
"I certainly hope so," she said, pausing briefly. "I, I just … I just hope we can do it in time."
In addition to the recent cancer diagnosis, Lura Lynn Ryan has chronic lung disease as well as other ailments and has attended recent court hearings with a tube trailing from her nose to an oxygen tank in her purse.
Pallmeyer's decision is the latest setback to efforts by Ryan's lawyers to keep him out of prison while he appealed his conviction, and then to win his release after he surrendered to prison in November 2007.
Within days after the U.S. Supreme Court declined to review Ryan's appeal in May 2008, Ryan's lawyer, Jim Thompson, also a former Illinois governor, declared he would seek clemency from then- President George W. Bush. At that point Ryan had served only about seven months of his sentence. At the time, Thompson cited Ryan's years of public service and health in seeking his release.
Ryan's wife made a personal appeal to Bush's mother, former first lady Barbara Bush, and penned a letter to the president that was hand-delivered to White House aides by then-U.S. Rep. Ray LaHood, R-Peoria. President Bush never acted on the request.
Ryan since has made a clemency request to the Obama administration.
About a month after his first clemency petition to the Bush administration, Ryan, who had maintained his innocence since his 2006 conviction, wrote an apology for "mistakes" he made in office and for the first time acknowledged the "unimaginable pain and loss" of Scott and Janet Willis.
The deaths of six of the Willis children had come to symbolize the licenses-for-bribes scandal during Ryan's tenure as secretary of state before his election as governor. Their minivan erupted in flames when it struck a piece of debris that fell from a truck whose driver had paid a bribe for his license.
Reached Tuesday at his home in Tennessee, where the family moved several years ago, Scott Willis said he and his family pray for the Ryans but try not to dwell on the case.
"It's the Christmas season, and it's hard for us," said the retired Baptist minister. "I'm 63 myself. I know I'm not long from seeing (his six children) again. ... There is no sense of vindictiveness. We don't go that way.
"I think he should abide by the decision the judge made," Willis said. "If she had said he can go free, we would not have made an outcry. That's not our decision to make. It's not about what I want."
