description.hltext_display: 中铁十八局集团石武客专主体工程完工
description.content:
[用户网]2010年度工程机械行业"企业品牌指数"调查
日前，中铁十八局集团在河南省驻马店市召开石武客专主体工程完工总结表彰大会。铁道部工程管理中心副主任朱海燕，河南省驻马店市委常委、市委秘书长武国定，市政府副市长刘金志，京广客专河南公司副总经理李松报，中铁十八局集团董事长兼党委书记郝趁义，集团公司工会主席赵心昭等出席了会议，集团公司常务副总经理兼石武线总指挥邓中才主持会议，这标志着该集团石武客专主体工程胜利完工。
中铁十八局集团石武客专指挥长杨国良介绍，该集团承建的石武客专八标段，北起驻马店市刘阁乡，南至信阳市明港镇，总投资32.9亿元，总长 56.1公里。2008年10月18日上场后，集团公司石武指挥部认真落实建设单位客专公司“快上场、快开工、快施工”工作要求，全力打造“石武速度”，多次掀起了“百日大战”。各参建单位服从局指统一调度组织，线下施工分部确保了南北向架梁通道的畅通无阻，一公司驿城梁场提前一个月完成全部箱梁预制任务，五公司铺架分部创造了单日最高架梁6孔的高产纪录，2010年5月25日较客专公司节点工期目标提前完成预制梁、架梁、现浇梁、连续梁施工。
无砟轨道施工集中体现了高速铁路建设的新材料、新技术、新工艺、新水平。四公司轨道板厂共担负58231块轨道板预制打磨任务。板厂2009年 4月29日成功生产第一块轨道板，2010年9月20日完成轨道板预制，10月25日完成轨道板打磨，实现最高日生产243块，日打磨333块的全国纪录。在生产过程中，先后攻克了高性能混凝土配合比、预应力张拉、自动温控、混凝土工作性能与抗裂性能之间关系的特性等技术难题，填补了多项技术空白。其中《CRTSII型轨道板打磨技术与精度》获国家级优秀QC成果奖。
五公司无砟轨道工程公司担负II型轨道板铺设任务，这是最后一项控制工期的关键项目，为此他们组建了6个架子队，上场6套CA砂浆设备，安排6 个工作面进行轨道板铺设。他们通过精心组织、精细施工，创造了平均每套设备日铺板40块，最高日铺板82块持续稳定的高产纪录，于10月26日在全线率先完成无砟轨道板铺设任务，成为石武客专名副其实的排头兵。
该集团石武客专指挥部在京广客专河南公司组织的三次铁路质量信誉评价中，连续两次在全线19家参建单位中荣获第一名，一次总分并列第一；项目部先后荣获中华铁路总工会火车头奖杯、天津市总工会工人先锋号、天津市委规划建设系统先进党组织、中铁建股份公司先进劳模集体、京广客专河南公司标准化项目部、集团公司劳动竞赛综合杯、“四好”领导班子等荣誉称号；指挥长杨国良、总工周大勇等三名同志荣获铁道部火车头奖章。

description.hltext_display: 07:41 Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content:
memberLogin('cpUserInfo', '.goreyguardian.ie', 'my.goreyguardian.ie'); You are here: Home Nicolas Anelka
Sport Home
Wednesday December 22 2010
Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires.
The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.
Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."
He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out.
"The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar." ©Goreyguardian.ie

description.hltext_display: صفير تلقى رسالة من الحريري عن اجواء المرحلة واتصالاته
Letters to the editor for Wednesday, December 22, 2010
description.content:
I am constantly amazed at anti-development groups in the Hudson Valley. They silently live among us fertilizing their lawns and talking on their cell phones. They love the open space and the impressive views. I mean that's why they bought that house. It was the views.
Life was easy. No one worried about the bog turtle, chemicals, road salt and whatever else that might be impacting that "view" right now because it belongs to someone else and that makes it their problem.
Fast-forward to now. Someone wants to sell or develop "the view," and all the weekend scientists come out of the woods crying "my property values, my free view" (remember that is why they live here), "oh, and the bog turtle."
Honestly I will have some respect for them when they admit they are angry that their "free view" will be changed and keep the disingenuous angst for the environment out of it.
The simplest way to preserve "the view" is to buy it, before it becomes an issue.
Now, call each other on your cell phones to discuss how bad the coverage is and how to stop that tower going up near you. Can anyone say bog turtle?
Carole Davidowsky
Today I read that 11 of our state legislators, including Nancy Calhoun and William Larkin, are among numerous state government officials who are exploiting an asinine pension-law loophole. This loophole allows them to double-dip into the state's depleted bankroll by collecting an annual retirement pension while still working and receiving their base salaries and stipends.
Calhoun rationalized her decision to file for the benefit by pointing out that any government official in New York can do this. "I'm not the only person doing it," she said. Nancy, that's a lame excuse. Reminds me of a child who gets caught doing something wrong and whines to his parents, "But everyone else is doing it."
Larkin was even more defiant, saying that people who are opposed to the loophole should try to change the law. Ding, ding, wake up, Bill! Honestly, what state legislator is going to want to change the law in this era of greed and corruption?
The only people who don't think it's right for government officials to double-dip are the taxpayers who vote you into office and pay your salary. We can't change the law ? that's supposed to be your job!
Shame on you all.
Peggy Gavan
The Dec. 16 story in the Record revealing that state Sen. William Larkin and Assemblywoman Nancy Calhoun have decided to take their pensions while still "full-time legislators" is a new chapter in the arrogance of elected officials.
While they are apparently within their rights to take their pensions now, I think we all would agree that if you want your retirement pension, you should retire. What message does this send to the unemployed and underemployed constituents in their districts?
To remedy this, legislation should immediately be introduced in Albany to outlaw this greedy double-dipping into the pocketbooks of New York state taxpayers.
Lawrence M. Delarose

description.hltext_display: Expensive Electric Heaters Revealed
description.content:
Author : David Nelmes
Who doesn't want to save money on their heating bills? I know I do, so when an ad said their money saving electric heater would cut my heating bills in half, I took a closer look You can't imagine what I discovered
The answer to the practicality of money saving electric heaters as compared to less expensive electric heaters turned out to be rather simple, yet, to share this answer requires that you have some background information so that you understand why the answer is what it is, in lieu of simply taking my word for it
To begin, we need a solid base from which to make an even evaluation When it comes to using electricity, it's simple We turn to OHM's Law and its formula P=ExI which means WATTS = VOLTAGE x CURRENT, which basically means, the electric power you use is based upon the voltage applied and the amperage consumed
A standard electric space heater that runs on 120 volts generally provides an output of 1500 watts of heat The current can be found with the formula I=P/E or CURRENT = WATTS divided by VOLTAGE, which equates to 12 5 amps = 1500 watts divided by 120 volts
Since your electric company charges you for power or watts, it doesn't matter if you use 120v or 240v to provide 1500 watts of heat If your utility company charges 14 cents per kilowatt hour, this means you pay 14 cents for every hour where you consume 1000 watts or 1KW If you used the 1500 watt (1 5 KW) heater for one hour, that is equal to 1 5 KW x 14 = 21 cents per hour
Next, let's calculate the room size that 1500 watts can heat The BTU (British Thermal Unit) is the accepted heating unit When determining the BTU's provided by any electrical heating source, simply multiply the watts by 3 413 and the resulting number is the BTU's In our case 1500 watts x 3 413 = 5119 5 BTU's
There is no set level of how many BTU's are needed to heat your room For example, if you live in a northern state, winter temperatures can easily stay in the teens or single digits for days on end You need to add up to 60 degrees of heat to maintain a 65 to 70 degrees in the room Alternatively, if you live in a southern state, winter temperatures can easily stay in the thirties or forties most days You would need to add only 30 to 40 degrees of heat to the air to maintain a 65 to 70 degree room temperature
To resolve issues with temperature variations, we'll introduce a temperature zone multiplier of 40 for cold climates, 25 for moderate climates and 10 for warmer climates Add 10 more if the house is poorly insulated and add 10 more if there are bad seals on the windows and doors
To begin calculating the BTU's required for any space, you first need to obtain its square footage by multiplying the rooms length by its width A ceiling height of 8 feet is assumed To compensate for taller ceilings, increase the square footage by 12% for each additional foot of ceiling height For example, a 12 x 12 room is equal to 144 square feet If the ceiling height were 9 feet we would multiply 144 x 1 12 for a total of 161 square feet
Now, depending upon your temperature zone, multiply your square footage by your temperature zone multiplier Using our example, if we were living in a northern state, we would multiply 144 square feet x 40 for a total requirement of 5760 BTUH's for that room This falls short of the 5120 BTU provided by a 1500 watt electric heater, but it will still handle most instances If the house isn't insulated well and has issues with air leakage, a second or larger heater would be required
Meanwhile, any claim by an electric heater manufacturer that says their heater will heat 300 to 1000 square feet means nothing if there is no reference to the outside temperature or condition of the room The current version of the money saving electric heater says it can heat 1000 square feet, but it uses less than 1500 watts Our previous example shows how this could be marginal even for a 144 square foot room, let alone 1000 square feet Using our same example, a 1000 square foot room at 40 BTUH per square foot would require approx 40,000 BTU of heat To determine the watts, we divide that by 3 413 to get 11720 watts, which is almost eight times greater in size than the wattage provided by the money saving heater
OK, so now we know how and why a 1500 watt electric heater will heat an average room size of 12 x 12 by providing 5120 BTU's of heat energy using approx 6 25 amps while plugged into a 120 volt outlet
If your $400 to $600 heater says it provides 1500 watts, it will do absolutely nothing different than what a $60 heater can do by providing the same 1500 watts If you set either heater in the room that also includes the thermostat for your whole house heating system, you will reduce your houses overall fuel consumption because the thermostat will not sense the need to activate the heating system This can save money, but the rest of the rooms in your home could freeze
As an experiment, let's say we operated a $60 1500 watt electric heater 16 hours a day, for 4 months in winter, what would you pay? 16 hours x 7 days x 4 25 weeks per month x 4 months = 1904 hours x 1 5 KW per hour = 2856 KWH At 14 cents per KWH, the total cost for power would be $400 plus another $60 for the heater for a total of $460 in all
Now, let's say we ran a $500 1500 watt electric heater 16 hours a day, for 4 months straight, what would this cost? 16 hours x 7 days x 4 25 weeks per month x 4 months = 1904 hours x 1 5 KW per hour = 2856 KWH At 14 cents per KWH, your total cost for power would be $400 plus another $500 for the heater for a total of $900 in all
Here's the simple answer
If you take the $900 spent to heat a room with a 'money saving' heater and then minus the $460 you really only needed to spend by using a typical heater, you were overcharged by $440 which you have unknowingly donated to Amish farmers or to Bob and his sponsors It's an American tradition to make donations, but if you are going to make a donation, you should be informed that it is a donation
What Else Could You Do With $440 00 Dollars?
If you purchase a basic $60 portable electric heater instead of a 'money saving' electric heater, what could you do with your extra money?
- Buy 170 gallons of fuel oil at $2 60 per gallon and heat your house for 30 days
- Buy 21890 cu ft of natural gas at $2 01 per ccf and heat your house for 30 days
- Heat you home for 3 months with 3 tons of coal at $146 per ton
- Buy a second $60 1500 watt heater and heat an another room for 4 months
- Hire a company to insulate and weatherize your home, saving 15% to 25% on all heating and cooling costs forever
Electricity is already 100% efficient By combing electricity with heat pump technology, you could extract heat from the ground or air and use electricity to gather heat from these other sources, but the electricity itself cannot mutate into more than what it is There is no magic way to make pure electrical power provide more watts than what the laws of physics allow
For now, the best thing you can do to conserve energy is to spend your money on insulating and sealing your home so that the energy you do consume is used more effectively A couple hundred dollars spent on home weatherization can save thousands of dollars as the years pass, regardless of what method you use to heat and cool your home Be smart, be green and conserve what you are already using and you'll save more energy and money than any money saving heater sponsor can ever hope to convince you of otherwise
David Nelmes - David is the author of 'The Rewards of Making Energy-Efficient Choices'. He enjoys writing and developing helpful web sites. Visit his websites at http://www.energyefficientchoices.com and http://www.weatherizeamerica.com

description.hltext_display: Entre ARIL Intérim et Cambrésis emploi : « Il s'agit de renforcer notre partenariat »
description.content:
a été signée par Pierre Deceukeleire, président d'ARIL Intérim (Association des Réseaux d'Initiative Locale), une entreprise de travail temporaire d'insertion, et Jean-Raymond Wattiez, président de Cambrésis Emploi. Cette dernière structure sert en fait de support juridique au Plan local pour l'insertion de l'emploi (PLIE) qui couvre les cent seize communes de l'arrondissement et suit près de sept cents personnes
Les objectifs dela convention
Dans le cadre de leurs activités respectives, portant sur l'insertion sociale et professionnelle du public en difficulté (peu ou pas de diplômes, problème de mobilité...), les deux parties ont ainsi décidé de « développer un partenariat visant à favoriser le retour à l'emploi des demandeurs d'emploi longue durée. » Et pour préciser le rôle de chacune d'elles, trois objectifs ont été déterminés dans le préambule du contrat. Il s'agit d'abord de « favoriser la continuité des parcours des personnes connues et suivies par les structures d'accueil » ; puis de « renforcer l'accompagnement par un encadrement adapté sur le lieu de travail » ; et enfin de « mettre en oeuvre et financer des formations ». Par ailleurs, il est également indiqué que « le PLIE veille à assurer un emploi d'insertion qualifié, une formation adaptée, un accompagnement social et professionnel individuel, ainsi qu'un accès à l'emploi durable. »
Une conventionen neuf points
Ensuite, neuf articles détaillent cet accord. On y trouve successivement l'objet de cette convention, les interlocuteurs (Valérie Delay, directrice et Daniel Legoeul, chargé de relation entreprises pour le PLIE du Cambrésis ; Carlos Louro, responsable de l'agence ARIL' Intérim), les modes opératoires du partenariat, la durée (du 16 décembre 2010 au 31 décembre 2012), le suivi et l'évaluation annuelle, la communication et la publicité, la propriété intellectuelle, la transparence et la concurrence, la déontologie et les responsabilités, ainsi que le règlement d'éventuels litiges.
Zoom sur ARIL...
ARIL' Intérim.- 95 salariés, dont 11 femmes, 45 000 heures de travail et des mises à disposition dans 57 entreprises ; un chiffre d'affaires de quelque 848 600 E.
ARIL' Plus.- Petits dépannages, travaux de rénovation et de jardinage à destination des particuliers, entreprises, artisans... : 171 salariés, dont 89 femmes, 39 800 heures de travail ; un chiffre d'affaires de 623 943 E. •

description.hltext_display: John Mayer, Rob Thomas perform at Blythedale
description.author: Candice
description.content:
VALHALLA ? What tops rockin' around the Christmas tree? Try rockin' around the hospital. Hundreds of patients, their families and medical staff of Blythedale Children's Hospital jammed Tuesday to live performances by John Mayer, Rob Thomas of Matchbox Twenty and John Rzeznik of the Goo Goo Dolls.
For the children, many of whom use wheelchairs and some who are severely ill, it is an exciting event that is talked about for weeks. With pizza, ice cream, photos and autographs from famous musicians, it's hard not to be excited.
"It's so fun and uplifting for them. A lot of them don't get to go home for Christmas, so this is really their celebration," said Linti Paul, a nurse in the adolescent unit who attended the show after her overnight shift ended.RelatedThe production is hosted by WPLJ's Scott Shannon and Todd Pettengill, who broadcast their popular "Scott & Todd in the Morning Show" from Blythedale.
The four-hour event began at 6 a.m. and included an online auction. Santa and Mrs. Claus and Ronald McDonald toured the crowd and greeted children while Holiday Express, a New Jersey-based volunteer group, sang holiday songs.
Juliette Delisser of Garnerville danced and laughed with her son, Chaz Gordon, 12, who uses a wheelchair as he recovers from a recent surgery for a brain condition he's had since he was 13 months old.
The family was hoping to be home for Christmas but "we'll be here. This is our life, and we celebrate the holidays wherever we are. We are just so grateful to have him in our lives," Delisser said.
The family celebrated a major milestone in Gordon's recovery two days ago when he was able to walk unassisted for the first time since October. "That was my Christmas present," said his mother.
Peter Steinberg, 5, of Croton-on-Hudson, clapped his hands and wore a red Santa hat that hung over his face. He beamed with joy as he watched the rock stars and his mother, Carol Steinberg, 42, also pretty excited to see John Mayer.
Peter, who has been going to the hospital for physical therapy after spine surgery over the summer, will complete his outpatient therapy tomorrow. "When anyone asks 'how do you do it?' I say, 'He did it, not me,' " his mother said.
In the last 19 years, the event has raised nearly $4 million for the children's hospital, said hospital president and chief executive officer Larry Levine.
The money goes toward projects and programs at the hospital, which treats children with complex medical and rehabilitative needs. Many are referred there from the intensive care units of other hospitals.
The hospital is in the middle of a $65.3 million modernization project that includes adding a new 56,000-square-foot building to its campus off Knollwood Road.
While Blythedale will reduce the number of beds to 86 from 92, hospital officials say the updates to the 40-year-old facilities are needed to accommodate a sicker and younger population of patients who are staying a shorter time but need more intense care.

we'll be here. This is our life, and we celebrate the holidays wherever we are. We are just so grateful to have him in our lives

description.hltext_display: DJ Metminco Limited Unit Starts Drilling At Los Calatos Peru
description.content:
LONDON (Dow Jones)--Pathfinder Minerals PLC (PFP.LN), an investment company in mining exploration and development, said Wednesday it is in advanced negotiations with a third party to acquire that company's issued share capital in a deal that would constitute a reverse takeover. MAIN FACTS: -However, a reverse takeover hasn't been completed within the prescribed timeframe and therefore trading in the Company's shares will be temporarily suspended with effect from Wednesday. -In the event the Company doesn't complete an acquisition constituting a reverse takeover by June 23, 2011, the Company's shares will be cancelled from trading on AIM.
-Company expects to make a further announcement shortly. -Shares suspended at 6.88 pence valuing the company at GBP3.41 million. -By Ian Walker, Dow Jones Newswires; 44-20-7842-9296; ian.walker@dowjones.com (END) Dow Jones Newswires December 22, 2010 02:38 ET (07:38 GMT)Copyright (c) 2010 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.

description.hltext_display: Mollie Roland: Thanks for care after accident
description.content: On a recent trip to Steamboat, I had the misfortune to fall and fracture my shoulder while attempting to break the speed record for middle-aged women on the ski mountain, at least in my own mind. However, the pain of the break was mitigated by the quick action and wonderful kindness of Matt from Steamboat Powdercats and his lovely girlfriend, Holly, who stayed with me and fetched the Ski Patrol, respectively.

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content: The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said. Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause".Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force.He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced."He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time."We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation."On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence."He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."Copyright (c) Press Association Ltd. 2010, All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Цифровое вещание начнется в 2012 году
description.content:
Тюменская область находится в очереди на реализацию федеральной целевой программы "Развитие цифрового телерадиовещания". Об этом на пресс-конференции заявили исполнительный директор филиала ФГУП "РТРС" "Урало-Сибирский региональный центр" Евгений Дроздинский и технический директор Дмитрий Добродеев. Они отметили, что благодаря цифровому формату ТВ в России можно будет принимать не менее восьми каналов: Первый канал, четыре канала ВГТРК, детский канал, НТВ и "5" (Петербургский канал).
Федеральную программу по внедрению цифрового ТВ приняли в конце 2009 года, разбив на четыре очереди. В течение полутора лет велись подготовительные работы, оформление земельных участков. Окончание этих работ запланировано на май 2011 года, в четвертом квартале закончится монтаж и установка оборудования. Начало 2012 года предполагаемое начало цифрового вещания.

description.hltext_display: 中铁四局把好六关 确保项目管理赢在起点
description.content:
[用户网]2010年度工程机械行业"企业品牌指数"调查
今年以来，为使项目管理有章可循，中铁四局从源头这个重要环节入手，在项目起始阶段把好六关，使项目管理有章可循，实现了生产有序可控、效益显著增强的良好局面，成为全路唯一一家铁路信用评价中连续十次获得A类企业称号的单位。为抓好项目管理，中铁四局在组建项目时严把了六关。
一是把好营销取舍关
在项目营销中，中铁四局坚持以效益为导向、以质量为取舍，自始至终把项目内在质量当作市场营销的立足点和出发点，按照“规模与质量同等并重、营销与生产密切协同、一次经营与二次经营相辅相成”的指导思路，突出效益，注重取舍，在营销工作中坚持做到“三选”，即同等规模选单价、同类业务选高端、同一项目选标段，坚决放弃条件苛刻、费用短缺、环境恶劣以及倒卖资质的“带病工程”，严格控制小标、低价标、垫资标，积极选取造价高、单价好、项目区域集中以及设备资源能够重复利用的优质标，通过严把营销源头关，使中标项目平均毛利率较以往增长了2~3个百分点，全局在建项目由高峰期的500多个，降低到目前的260个左右，实现了压缩项目总数、减少管理跨度、优化资源配置和推进集约发展的目标，过去点多线长、疲于应付、到处救火的问题得到有效缓解。
二是把好模式选择关
该局按照“规模与能力相匹配、工程跨度与组织结构相匹配、管理深度与责任分解相匹配”的指导思想，努力使管理幅度和管理层次得到最佳契合，广泛推行“两级机构、三级管理”的项目运行机制，大力推行代局指模式，明确了公司为利润中心，经理部为成本中心，架子队为核算中心，界定各级职责，合理安排分工，提高运行效率；根据规模大小和难易程度，将项目划分为直管、代管和自管三个层次，实行项目分级管理，确保局和成员企业各有侧重、各尽其责、各有所归。
三是把好人员配备关
中铁四局突出项目经理在项目管理中的核心地位，坚持把思想品德过硬、专业基础扎实、经营手段灵活的骨干人才配备到重点项目；主动摒弃机构简单拼凑、资源依赖市场、生产受制于人的粗放式管理，坚持“重心向一线转移，资源向一线倾斜”的政策，把一大批业务扎实、年富力强的骨干人员充实到生产一线，并把好项目书记、总工程师以及技术、工经、物资、财务等关键岗位的人员配备关，构建“专业对口、优势互补、分工有序、形成合力”的项目团队，以高规格的人员配备，建设高标准的不朽工程。
四是把好制度交底关
为确保项目管理基本流程不断链、制度传递不阻隔、工作执行不打折，该局广泛开展项目管理交底制度，兵马未动，制度先行，项目开工之初，局和公司主要领导亲临现场进行开工动员和总体部署，技术、工经、物资、财务等有关部门随即开展一对一专项交底，确保现场管理人员全面领会制度精髓和工作要领。近年来该局先后对石武客专、集包铁路、杭长铁路、南宁枢纽等所有重点工程逐一进行制度交底和业务交接，使规章制度成为项目实施者的行为准则，避免了制度边缘化、执行随意化和管理松散化混乱局面的出现。
五是把好队伍选配关
按照“谁推荐谁负责、谁使用谁负责”的原则，中铁四局积极构建协作队伍公平竞争机制，推行准入审批制度，及时纠正少数经理部私招滥聘行为，逐步解决了企业资源私有化和资源调配个人化问题，着力防止资质、实力、信誉等方面不具备条件，甚至上了“黑名单”的劳务队伍进入现场，把一大批实力强、作风硬、口碑好的队伍输送到生产一线。
六是把好方案优化关
中铁四局为顺应大干快上的市场环境，极力倡导 “方案决定工期，方案决定安全，方案决定效益”的思想，将实施性施工组织和方案优化列为开工前的头等大事，按照“便于施工生产、降低建设成本、确保安全质量”的原则进行合理优化，并且要求把80%以上的方案优化放在现场实施，以局总工程师为总牵头人，对重点项目、高难度项目、高风险项目逐一调查现场、逐一审核方案、逐一监控过程，确保方案编制不走形式、方案执行不打折扣。今年以来，共对28个项目实施性施工组织、67项施工方案进行了优化和评审，努力降低方案通用化、技术简单化和施工随意性带来的不良后果，以严谨的作风和稳妥的措施确保项目的有序可控。
项目管理的不断推进，极大地提升了企业的实力，推动了企业的快速发展，企业的营业额、营销额不断创出新高，今年有望实现营业额和新签合同额“双超500亿元”目标。

description.hltext_display: ”Juonipaljastus”: Näin Top Gear kosti The Stigille
description.author: Uusi Suomi
description.content:
Brittilehti auto-ohjelma Top Gearin juontajat ovat kostaneet The Stigin tunnetulle testikuljettajalle ohjelman eilen esitetyss jaksossa. The Stig on paljastanut henkilllisyytens ja kirjoittanut elmkerran, josta Britannian yleisradioyhti BBC suuttui. BBC yritti est kirjan julkaisun oikeusteitse, muttei onnistunut. Stigin esiintyneelle Ben Collinsille annettiin kenk. Eilen esitetyss jaksossa Top Gearin juontajat Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond ja James May ampuivat tuliaseilla kohti Stigin nkisi pahvimiehi ajaessaan ohi autoillaan.
Eilinen jakso oli ensimminen, jossa The Stig ei esiintynyt.

description.hltext_display: Joran van der Sloot zocht op laptop naar vluchtroute
description.author: Redactie Aworaki
description.content:
Joran van der Sloot zocht vanuit de hotelkamer in Peru, waar Stephany Flores is vermoord, naar een vluchtroute. Dat blijkt uit onderzoek van zijn computer, meldden Peruaanse media dinsdag 21 december.
Van der Sloot googlede op zijn laptop welke landen geen uitleveringsverdrag met Peru hebben en waar hij het beste de grens over kon gaan. De 23-jarige Van der Sloot bezocht ook de pokersite Pokerstars in de hotelkamer waar hij met Flores verbleef.
Ook zou Joran contact op hebben genomen met kennissen in Nederland om geld te lenen voor zijn vlucht. Hij ging uiteindelijk naar Chili, waar hij een kleine week na de moord werd aangehouden. Chili leverde hem uit aan Peru.
Informatie over Natalee
Op de laptop van de Nederlander, die sinds begin juni in Peru vastzit voor de moord de 21-jarige Peruaanse, is verder onder meer gezocht naar informatie over Natalee Holloway. De 18-jarige Amerikaanse verdween precies vijf jaar voor de moord op Flores in Aruba. Van der Sloot is nog altijd verdachte in die zaak.
Een Peruaanse politiechef liet eerder weten dat Van der Sloot zou hebben bekend dat hij Flores vermoordde omdat ze op zijn computer naar informatie over Holloway keek. Hij zou haar gewurgd hebben. Later trok Van der Sloot zijn vermeende bekentenis overigens weer in.

description.hltext_display: Android 2.3 für Nexus One steht in den Startlöchern
description.content:
Googlewird sein erstes eigenes Smartphone Nexus One auf die Anroid-Version 2.3 (Codename Gingerbread) aktualisieren. Das hat des Nexus Team per Twitter angekündigt.
Das Update soll in den kommenden Wochen zur Verfügung stehen. Details oder einen konkreten Zeitpunkt für die Veröffentlichung nannte Google nicht.
Wer nicht auf das Gingerbread-Update warten will, muss sich derzeit an den Nexus-One-Nachfolger Nexus S halten. Es ist das erste Smartphone, das ab Werk mit der neuen Betriebssystemversion ausgeliefert wird. Allerdings ist das Gerät bisher nur in den USA und in Großbritannien erhältlich.
Vor rund zwei Wochen hatte Google Android 2.3 vorgestellt. Zu den wichtigsten Änderungen gehören eine neue Texteingabe, Schnittstellen für Internettelefonie, Verbesserungen für Spieleprogrammierer, der Application Control Manager sowie Support für Googles Multimedia-Codecs. Darüber hinaus unterstützt das Betriebssystem auch Near-Field Communication (NFC).
Besitzer von Android-Smartphones anderer Hersteller werden vermutlich noch eine Weile auf ein Update warten müssen. Beispielsweise laufen Samsungs Galaxy-S-Smartphones nach wie vor unter Android 2.1.
Dieses ZDNet-Special bietet alle wichtigen Informationen rund um das Google-Betriebssystem für mobile Geräte. Neben Nachrichten, Blogs und Praxistipps finden sich dort auch aktuelle Tests von Android-Smartphones.

description.hltext_display: Zhang says Bale to start in Nanjing film
description.content:
BEIJING -- Zhang Yimou says Christian Bale will star in the Chinese filmmaker's latest project about 13 young prostitutes struggling to survive during the attack by Japanese soldiers on Nanjing in 1937.
Zhang said Wednesday that Bale, the star of the boxing drama "The Fighter," will play an American priest in Nanjing during the Japanese invasion.
Zhang says shooting is to start Jan. 10. He says he hopes to tell the story of war atrocities in Nanjing, especially to younger people in Western countries.
Historians say the massacre, known in the West as the "Rape of Nanking," resulted in the slaughter of at least 150,000 civilians. China puts the number killed at 300,000, making it one of the worst atrocities of the World War II era.

description.hltext_display: 中铁一局中标广州市轨道交通六号线6.9亿工
description.content:
[用户网]2010年度工程机械行业"企业品牌指数"调查
该工程包括植物园站、龙洞站、龙洞站～植物园站～长?站，及海珠广场冷站，两站两区间土建工程，工程总价6.92亿元。计划2010年12月31日开工，2013年2月28日竣工，总工期791天。
其中，植物园站为六号线二期工程第一地下站，为六号线与预留线的坼解站，车站全长302.1米，主体标准段宽40.8米；龙洞站位于凤凰宾馆附近，车站主体位于广汕路道路中心线上的地下站，车站全长206米；长?站～植物园站区间右线全长1717.894米，左线全长1709.855米，区间设置一段明挖和一段盾构；植物园站～龙洞站区间右线全长1190.684米，左线全长1217.666米，该区间为盾构区间；海珠广场冷站为新建集中供冷站，冷站采用珠江水直流冷却，其水泵房位于海珠广场东广场内，为地下一层钢筋混凝土框架结构，围护结构采用0.6米厚地下连续墙。
该标段工程主要穿越砂质粘土、粉质粘土，砾质粘土局部地段夹砂层地层。区间工程量大、结构工法多、工期紧；周边环境复杂，制约因素多；地质条件复杂，施工风险大；环保、水保、文明施工要求高。该工程由中铁一局集团城市轨道交通工程有限公司（城轨公司）与深圳分公司共同施工。

description.hltext_display: Starbucks-Angestellte bekommen Aktien als Anreiz

description.hltext_display: Online petition urges Iran to free filmmaker Jafar Panahi
description.content:
London - An online petition that is expected to signed by filmmakers and actors from across the world calls for the release of dissident Iranian director Jafar Panahi who has been sentenced to six years in prison and banned for directing films for 20 years.
The online petition claims that "Jafar is innocent and his only crime is wishing to continue to freely exercise his profession as a film-maker in Iran ... Through this sentence inflicted upon Jafar Panahi, it is manifestly all of Iranian cinema which is targeted", The Guardian reported.
Panahi won the Camera d'Or award at the Cannes film festival in 1995 for "The White Balloon" and the Golden Lion prize at the 2000 Venice festival for "The Circle". His other movies include "Offside" and "Crimson Gold".
A group of European film organisations, including the Cannes film festival and the magazine Cahiers du Cinema, prepared the petition.
It has sought the signatures of writers, filmmakers and actors, "as well as every man and woman who loves freedom and for whom human rights are fundamental".
Jafar Panahi is a critic of the Ahmadinejad regime who supported the protests that followed 2009's disputed Iranian elections, the media report said.
He was convicted of "propaganda against the system".
The Iranian director in his plea to the court said: "My imprisonment and that of those I work with symbolises the kidnapping by those in power of all artists in the country."

description.hltext_display: Un trentenaire agacé par la justice tend un piège aux policiers
description.content:
C'est dans cette artère, en pleine nuit, que les policiers de la BAC ont été amenés à intervenir.
| GUET-APENS |
Ce week-end, un Cambrésien a, semble-t-il, tendu un piège aux policiers de la BAC, qu'il a enfermés et menacés. Il a fini par être maîtrisé, et transféré en psychiatrie. Le matin même, cet homme était présenté devant le tribunal de Cambrai.
cambrai@lavoixdunord.fr PHOTO « LA VOIX »
Lien de cause à effet ? Vendredi matin, ce Cambrésien de 34 ans devait répondre devant le tribunal de conduite sous l'empire de stupéfiants. Le soir, les policiers de la brigade anticriminalité se sont retrouvés nez à nez avec lui, chez lui. Dans ce qui ressemble à un guet-apens, au vu des éléments en notre possession. Aurait-il mal vécu la condamnation dont il a fait l'objet le matin même (un mois de prison ferme et une amende de 50 E) ?
Cet homme, livide en sortant du tribunal, se serait montré très agité, vendredi soir, devant les policiers qu'il est soupçonné d'avoir menacés et enfermés.
Avait-il ruminé toute la journée sa rancoeur ? C'est en tout cas, peu après minuit, que son « guet-apens » est entré en vigueur.
Dans la nuit de vendredi à samedi, les policiers ont reçu un coup de fil certifiant qu'un voleur rôdait rue des Capucins, et avait trouvé refuge chez un habitant de cette artère. L'appelant a précisé le numéro du domicile, avant de raccrocher.
Les policiers de la brigade anticriminalité se sont donc rendus sur les lieux, et n'ont rien remarqué de suspect. Deux des trois enquêteurs se sont dirigés vers un logement dont la porte était entrouverte. Ils se sont retrouvés face à ce Cambrésien, qui a expliqué être l'auteur du coup de fil. Par la même occasion, il a invité, puis séquestré, les fonctionnaires à l'intérieur de son logement. Selon les éléments de l'enquête, le trentenaire aurait condamné immédiatement la sortie en verrouillant la porte, avec un comportement étrange. Il aurait forcé les policiers à se rendre dans sa chambre (ce que les fonctionnaires ont refusé) et a fini par insulter la justice, le procureur, les juges. « Je vais vous planter », a-t-il lancé aux policiers avant de tenter de les frapper. La tension est montée d'un cran lorsqu'il a hélé son berger allemand. Aussi, ayant jusqu'ici fait usage de techniques traditionnelles pour maîtriser le Cambrésien, les policiers ont opté pour une autre tactique. En voyant poindre la menace du berger allemand, l'arme de service a été dégainée. C'est alors que la compagne du Cambrésien, enfin réveillée, est itnervenue pour maîtriser l'animal. Pas de quoi pour autant calmer l'homme qui, dans la foulée, a ordonné à son amie « d'aller chercher le fusil à pompe ». Fusil qui, les policiers l'apprendront plus tard, n'existait pas.
Reste qu'à cet instant, au vu du danger, les policiers ont appelé par radio leur collègue demeuré à l'extérieur. Quelques secondes plus tard, le policier faisait irruption dans l'appartement cadenassé, et maîtrisait le trentenaire prêt, dit-on, à se saisir d'un couteau.
C'est ensuite la compagne qui a détaillé les intentions du suspect. Il lui aurait demandé d'appeler la police en vue de « planter » les fonctionnaires. Deux autres couteaux auraient été dissimulés à cte effet dans le logement. Pourquoi ce piège apparemment tendu à la BAC ? « Il n'y a jamais eu de litige entre les unités de la brigade et ce Cambrésien », précise le capitaine de police Pascal Desseint.
Pour l'heure, les motivations profondes n'ont donc été éclaircies, car aucun dialogue n'a abouti avec le suspect. De même, aucun dépistage (alcool, drogue) n'a pu être pratiqué. L'homme a dû être orienté vers le service psychiatrie de l'hôpital, chargé d'effectuer une expertise et de déterminer s'il était, ce vendredi soir, pénalement responsable. La procédure est donc toujours en cours. Deux policiers ont été légèrement blessés pendant cette intervention. Une plainte a été déposée. •

description.hltext_display: 07:41 Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content:
memberLogin('cpUserInfo', '.goreyguardian.ie', 'my.goreyguardian.ie'); You are here: Home Christopher Samba
Sport Home
Wednesday December 22 2010
Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce.
The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought.
"If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun.
"As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam.
"We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"
Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement.
"I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.
He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?" ©Goreyguardian.ie

description.hltext_display: Sullivan makes tough choice
description.content:
Lots of officials talk about making tough decisions, but few actually do. That's what makes the vote by Sullivan County legislators something that others in the state will be watching.
Having listened to taxpayers and concluded that taxes have to stay where they are in the coming year, legislators voted to freeze wages even though the contracts with county workers call for a raise. Legislators warn that it's either no raise or lots of layoffs; unions representing the workers say they will go to court.
Sullivan is confronting the reality that others will have to. With salaries, benefits and pensions making up the bulk of any budget, there is no way to stick to the contracts and stop tax increases. Lots of taxpayers have had to do more with less in recent years; the board is making a reasonable request by asking county workers to join them.

description.hltext_display: Roche vertraut im First Level Support auf ITSDONE
description.content:
) - Die Roche Diagnostics GmbH in Wien vertraut seit rund einem Jahr in dem Bereich des 1st Level Supports für die Produktserie cobas IT 1000 auf die . Dazu hat ITSDONE einen Single Point of Contact (SPOC) definiert, der Applikations- und Systemanfragen bearbeitet. Die gesamte Erst-Betreuung wie zentrale Problementgegennahme, Anfragen-Verwaltung, Bereitstellung von Lösungen und Informationen an die Kunden von Roche Diagnostics wie Spitäler, Privatlabore und Mitarbeiter liegt seitdem in der Verantwortung der ITSDONE Dienstleistungs GmbH. Was ist cobas IT 1000?
cobas® IT 1000 ist eine offene Softwarelösung von Roche Diagnostics, mit der sich Point of Care (POC)- Messgeräte in das Krankenhaus-Netzwerk integrieren lassen.
Mit cobas® IT 1000 Software erhält der Anwender im Zentrallabor die Möglichkeit, von zentraler Stelle aus eine effiziente POCT-Qualitätssicherung zu leisten. Er wird damit seiner Verantwortung für die patientennahe Sofortdiagnostik im Sinne von zukünftigen gesetzlichen oder freiwilligen Richtlinien gerecht.
Kritische Qualitätskontroll- und Patientenergebnisse können automatisch herausgefiltert und bevorzugt bearbeitet werden. Durch diese Automatismen wird der Zeitaufwand der Qualitätsüberwachung für das Labor deutlich reduziert. Gleichzeitig führt die Vernetzung der POC-Messgeräte mit der Anbindung an das führende Informationssystem zu einer zeitgerechten Integration der POC-Ergebnisse in den Kumulativbefund des Zentrallabors. Die medizinische Dokumentation wird verbessert und die Kostentransparenz erhöht.
"Unser Anspruch ist es, exzellenten After Sales Support zu leisten und unsere Kunden optimal zu betreuen. In der Erreichbarkeit des First Level Supports von cobas® IT 1000 sahen wir noch Verbesserungspotenzial. Hier galt es zum einen die notwendigen Ressourcen für unsere Experten im Rahmen der zunehmenden Kundenprojekte zu schaffen und zum anderen unseren Kunden schnelle und kompetente Hilfestellung zu bieten. Daher freue ich mich, dass wir mit ITSDONE einen zuverlässigen und professionellen IT-Partner für diese Aufgaben gefunden haben", sagt Dipl.-Ing (FH) Marco Recktenwald, Leiter Technischer Sevice von Roche.
"Mit der erfolgreichen Betreuung von cobas® IT 1000 hat ITSDONE bewiesen, dass dank unserer prozessgetragenen Arbeitsgestaltung auch branchenspezifische Speziallösungen schnell "erlernt" und dann auch laufend supported werden können. Für uns ist es wichtig, für unsere Kunden in allen IT-Belangen als Partner bereitzustehen, der sich nicht scheut, auch unbekanntes Terrain zu betreten. Servicequaltiät war immer unser Steckenpferd, ich bin froh das wir auch dieses mal unser Versprechen als verlässlicher Servicepartner halten konnten", erklärt Harald Kilian, CEO von ITSDONE GmbH.
Über ITSDONE:
ITSDONE ist ein österreichischer Mittelstands-Spezialist für IT - Dienstleistungen mit den Schwerpunkten Infrastruktur-, HelpDesk-, Applikation- und Consulting Services. Diese Service Lines werden in Form von Consulting Support, bei Projektabwicklung oder im Outsourcing angeboten.
ITSDONE wurde von den beiden Geschäftsführern Harald Kilian und Mag. Rudolf Stuprich 2003 mit Sitz in Wien gegründet. Seit Dezember 2007 gibt es eine weitere Niederlassung in Bratislava.
Dank zufriedener Kunden wie z.B. Hutchison 3G Austria ("3"), Tageszeitung Österreich, Orange, atms Telefon- und Marketing Services, Vienna Communications, ÖAMTC, Hohe Brücke, Energiecomfort, ARBÖ, T- Mobile/Telering, etc., ist es ITSDONE gelungen, zu einem der führenden, mittelständischen IT - Dienstleistern Österreichs mit derzeit knapp 100 Mitarbeitern zu wachsen. (Ende) Aussender: Ansprechpartner: Mag. (FH) Lotte Wenzl / Head of Marketing & Sales

description.hltext_display: Goudstaven uit kluis op Hato gestolen
description.author: Kelly van der Kwast
description.content:
Goudstaven met een vermoedelijke waarde van zes miljoen euro zijn afgelopen weekend verdwenen uit een kluis van SwissAirport cargo (AeroCargo) op vliegveld Hato op Curaçao.
Goud wordt gemeten in 'troy ounces'. Bij deze diefstal is voor ongeveer 4285 troy ounces ontvreemd. De dagprijs van een troy ounce is momenteel 1400 dollar. Dit houdt in dat de diefstal bijna 137 kilo goud betreft.
Swissport General Manager Gerhard Goselink wil overigens geen commentaar, nadere uitleg of details geven van de ontvreemding, zolang het onderzoek nog bezig is. De waarde van de buit wordt door Goselink bevestigd noch ontkend.
Wel zegt het Cargobedrijf intensief mee te werken aan het onderzoek. Swissport heeft intussen alle luchtvaartmaatschappijen, klanten en belanghebbenden geïnformeerd.
Inside job
Maurice Adriaens, directeur van Curaçao Airport Holding (CAH), stelt dat betrokkenen vermoeden dat het om een ‘inside job’ gaat: “Misschien dat iemand zich in de kluis zou hebben opgesloten, omdat de kluis van binnenuit geopend kan worden. Er is volgens Adriaans geen sprake van braak of andere schade aan de buitenkant. Maar," zo stelt de directeur, "de vrachthandelaar zal wel verzekerd zijn.
Adriaens stelt nadrukkelijk dat Hato weinig klachten heeft met bettrekking tot criminaliteit. “Curaçao heeft een goede naam wat dat betreft. Maar als het mis gaat kan het goed mis gaan”, aldus Adriaens.
Goud nu
De staven goud waren onderweg van een Zuid-Amerikaans land richting Europa en zouden vervoerd worden met de KLM naar Amsterdam. Volgens deskundigen staat de goudprijs momenteel historisch hoog. Dit zou komen door een grote vraag naar goud in Azië en geen of weinig vertrouwen in de Euro en de Dollar.
Goud broodjes worden gewoonlijk in staven van één of vijf kilo vergoten. Iedere staaf wordt van een nummer of code voorzien. De staven kunnen echter weer omgesmolten worden, waarna all herkenpunten verdwijnen. Omsmelten en verkopen is volgens de deskundigen ook op Curaçao mogelijk, hoewel het waarschijnlijk is dat de buit naar Miami of Europa wordt gesmokkeld.

description.hltext_display: Microsoft launcht HTML 5 Labs
description.content:
Microsofthat unter der Bezeichnung HTML 5 Labs eine Testplattform für künftige HTML-5-Spezifikationen gestartet. Entwicklern stehen dort Vorabversionen der HTML-5-Technologien Web Sockets und IndexedDB zu Verfügung, deren Spezifikationen dem World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) und anderen Standardisierungsgremien schon vorliegen.
Die Testplattform richte sich an Entwickler, die schon vor Verabschiedung der Standards mit den neuen Technologien arbeiten wollten, erklärte Jean Paoli, General Manager des Interoperability Strategy Team bei Microsoft, in einem Interview mit ZDNet. "Wir erhalten viele Anfragen von Leuten, die wissen wollen, wann HTML 5 fertig sein wird", sagte Paoli. "Unsere Antwort ist, dass HTML 5 schon jetzt mit Internet Explorer 9 verwendet werden kann."
Die experimentellen Features seien nicht für den Einsatz in Unternehmen geeignet, da sich die Spezifikationen noch verändern könnten, so Paoli weiter. Manchmal dauere es Monate bis Jahre, bis die Entwicklung eines Standards abgeschlossen sei.
HTML 5 Labs ist Paoli zufolge aber nicht nur für Entwickler gedacht, die Websites für den Internet Explorer 9 entwerfen wollen. "Es ist wichtig, die Vorabversionen zu haben, weil sie auch denjenigen helfen, die in den Standardisierungsgremien sitzen und versuchen, den besten Standard für eine bestimmte Technologie zu finden. Sie können mit Software experimentieren, die das implementiert, was sie auf dem Papier entwerfen."
Die Testplattform steht ab sofort mit den Vorabversionen von Web Sockets und IndexedDB zur Verfügung. Weitere Webtechnologien sollen im Lauf des kommenden Jahres folgen. Microsoft hofft, damit die Entwicklung unfertiger Spezifikationen voranzutreiben.

description.hltext_display: Kastuvai - paskutinė Klaipėdos viltis
description.content:
Uostamiesčio meras Rimantas Taraškevičius į kovą su žiemos žabangais metė paskutinį "rezervą". Klaipėdiečius jis paragino, kad patys nusikastų sniegą. Tačiau išvežti suverstus sniego kalnus merija pinigų neturi, rašo "Lietuvos žinios".
Pagrindinės Klaipėdos gatvės kol kas valomos patenkinamai, tačiau vidinės kvartalų gatvelės ir skersgatviai palaidoti po storu baltu patalu. Didžiausias galvos skausmas - daugiabučių namų kiemai. Į juos gyventojai savo mašinomis dar sugeba įvažiuoti, bet greitosios medicinos pagalbos, kitų specializuotų tarnybų automobiliai to daryti nedrįsta.
Nematydamas kitos išeities, meras pasiūlė miestiečiams čiupti kastuvus ir gelbėtis patiems. Jis teigė esąs priverstas prašyti visų Klaipėdos gyventojų, daugiabučius namus administruojančių įmonių ir bendrovių, turinčių atitinkamos technikos, vadovus bendromis pastangomis vaduoti miestą nuo sniego.
reklama:
TagsInfo
Visa portale VZ.LT esanti medžiaga priklauso UAB „Verslo žinios“, jeigu nenurodyta kitaip. Draudžiama ją platinti kitose žiniasklaidos priemonėse, internetiniuose tinklalapiuose be išankstinio UAB „Verslo žinios” sutikimo. Cituojant būtina aiški nuoroda į VZ.LT kaip informacijos šaltinį

description.hltext_display: 小泽称菅直人“不是同路人”
description.content: 【共同社12月22日电】日本民主党前代表小泽一郎21日夜间在东京同约20名支持自己的议员进行了恳谈。他对要求其到国会说明政治资金问题的菅直人首相和民主党干事长冈田克也提出批评，称“不觉得他们是同路人”。 据出席恳谈的人士透露，在提到自己和菅直人的会谈最终不欢而散一事时，小泽称“菅直人非常情绪化，第一次看到他那种� �子。我表示既然是同路人就该冷静地讨论问题，但他情绪很激动，没法进行对话。” 小泽还说：“会谈时我曾问菅直人，如果我出席政治伦理审查会，国会的问题就能解决吗？他没有给出回答。”（完）

description.hltext_display: 中國明年重點擴大內需[16:39]
description.content:
中國商務部部長陳德銘周三稱，務部明年繼續把擴大內需作為部門工作重點之一。陳德銘今日在2010年中國全國商務工作會議上指出，商務部明年的其中一個工作重點，仍是刺激內需，擴大居民消費，完善鼓勵消費政策。
他表示，明年將繼續家電下鄉，以舊換新的政策，大力促進電子、通信產品和服務消費，增加以舊換新產品品種，提高中標產品能效和排放標準。
陳德銘稱，明年要促進國際收支基本平衡，完善進口促進政策；積極擴大進口、保障市場平穩運行，並將對鐵礦石和鉀肥等重點商品建立進口協調機制。
商務部稱，要把跨境貿易人民幣結算這一政策用足用好，並通過發展保單融資等政策措施，加大對出口企業尤其是中小企業出口融資的支持力度。
(中通社、路透社)

4、其他要求：外地建安企业在合肥招投标中心投标并中标后必须在合肥市注册子公司，以子公司名义与业主单位签订合同
三、报名或领取招标文件和资格审查文件方式及时间：
1、报名时间：2010年12月16日--2010年12月22日 (上午：08:00--12:00 下午：14:30--17:30)
2、报名方式：网上报名
3、领取方式：网上下载
4、招标文件价格：400元整（招标文件售后不退）
四、联系方式：
单位：合肥招标投标中心
地址：合肥市阜阳路17号（原合肥市委）一楼
本项目联系人：贺皖芳
电话：2692029
邮编：230001
五、重要说明：
1、本项目只接受合肥招标投标中心会员库中已审核通过会员报名，未入库的投标人请及时办理入库手续栏目中“合肥招标投标中心会员注册流程”，联系电话：0551-2692111，联系人：徐工 因未及时办理入库手续导致无法报名的，责任自负；
2、会员报名程序请登陆合肥招标投标中心网办理（具体操作步骤和程序请参见“办事指南”栏目--“会员报名操作手册”）；
3、会员报名成功后直接采用网上支付系统支付标书费用，直接下载招标文件及其它资料（含澄清和补充说明）。如无网上银行帐号，请及时前往银行办理（本系统目前支持以下银行网上支付服务：中国农业银行、中国工商银行、中国建设银行、交通银行、招商银行、光大银行、浦发银行、徽商银行）；
4、图纸、光盘等资料按成本费收取，该项资料接通知后到合肥招标投标中心一楼服务大厅缴纳费用后现场领取。
六、其它事项说明：
投标人网上报名后，必须在报名截止日期前完成网银在线支付，否则逾期系统自动关闭，报名不成功。

description.hltext_display: 江若琳即場學跳華爾滋[16:35]
description.content:
江若琳（Elanne）為中央電視台跨年綜藝晚會表演，更即場學跳華爾滋。Elanne當晚無懼寒冷天氣，以露肩黑白條紋長裙出席於深圳舉行的跨年綜藝晚會。她跟表演拍檔莫少聰更一同大跳華爾滋，Elanne表示自己無接觸過社交舞，今次是即場學跳，覺得非常得意，慶幸自己沒有出醜。
（即時娛樂）

description.hltext_display: Indiana takes aim at Vegas championship
description.content:
of The News-Sentinel
BLOOMINGTON – Championship opportunity finds the Indiana Hoosiers pumped.
Granted, winning the Las Vegas Classic won’t rate with say, the Maui Invitational title IU won in 2002. That was its last non-conference tourney championship.
Still it would be another sign the Hoosiers (9-2) are back from the debacle of NCAA sanctions.
IU opens with Northern Iowa (7-3) tonight. It will face either New Mexico (9-1) or Colorado (7-3) on Thursday. All games will be played at 7,471-seat Orleans Arena.
“A championship would be huge as a stepping stone process for our program,” guard Verdell Jone said. “We have a great chance. We’re playing really well. We’ll play two great teams in Las Vegas. Hopefully we can bet them both.”
IU last reached a non-conference tourney title game in 2007 when Eric Gordon was a high-scoring freshman and Kelvin Sampson was a soon-to-be ex-college coach. The Hoosiers lost to Xavier 80-65.
“This is a great opportunity,” guard Matt Roth said. “It’s something we’ve been working toward all year and offseason. It will be a great test.”
For forward Christian Watford it will be a chance to show the program is regaining its championship-winning ways.
“It would be very big in bringing this program back to how it was,” he said. “That’s what we plan on doing.”
Watford is glad the easy part of IU’s non-conference schedule is over. He wants to prove losing to Boston College and Kentucky toughened the Hoosiers for Big Ten battles. That will only come by playing – and beating – quality opponents.
“I’m looking forward to it,” Watford said. “I can’t wait to get it rolling. It’s about time we started playing some real competition.”
IU has cruised to a 9-0 home record, with every victory by at least 16 points. It won by 34, 34 and 42 in its last three Assembly Hall games.
While those did little to prepare the Hoosiers for Big Ten competition, they did boost a program trying to bounce back after consecutive 20-loss seasons.
“It helped us gain confidence,” Watford said. “Players who wouldn’t have the confidence when we played tough teams early on have picked up some. It will help us in the long run.”
Indiana leads the Big Ten and is fourth nationally in field goal percentage (51.3 percent) and is second in the conference in field goal defense (37.7 percent).
Northern Iowa has won three straight games. It’s led by Anthony James (11.4 points), Kwadzo Ahelegbe (10.6 points) and Jake Koch (10.0). It averages just 10 turnovers a game. Three-point shooting has been a problem. The Panthers shoot 29.8 percent beyond the arc.
They’ve lost at Syracuse, at Iowa and at Wisconsin-Milwaukee.
Coach Ben Jacobsen is 96-46 in his four years at Northern Illinois, including last season’s 30-5 record.
New Mexico is coached by former Hoosier All-America Steve Alford. He’s 85-27 in four years with the Lobos. He has a 392-210 record overall with stops at Iowa, Missouri State and Manchester. His 2,438 career points rank second in school history behind Calbert Cheaney’s 2,613.
IU assistant coach Steve McClain was an assistant coach at Colorado last season.

description.hltext_display: Les allocataires du RSA du Cambrésis invités à prendre la parole
description.content:
De Caudry au Cateau P. Laby et L. Chevalier veulent restaurer la «confiance» entre allocataires et institutions
| ON EN PARLE |
Les allocataires du revenu de solidarité active (RSA) représentent 10 % de la population du Cambrésis. Soit 8 078 personnes, à qui le conseil général du Nord souhaite donner la parole. Hier en mairie de Beauvois, il était de nouveau question de ce « Forum permanent de l'insertion du Cambrésis » qu'on voudrait mieux connu. PAR HÉLÈNE HARBONNIER
caudry@lavoixdunord.fr
« Ça bouillonne... » Hier matin, à Beauvois, en retenant une bonne partie des participants chez eux, la neige a causé le report de la désignation des deux allocataires du Revenu de solidarité active (RSA) appelés à représenter les bénéficiaires du Cambrésis. Mais elle n'a pas refroidi l'ardeur à s'exprimer des personnes présentes. Le débat est vivace, mais les problèmes évoqués sont « concrets ». C'est ce que sont venus chercher Pascal Laby, responsable de l'association d'Avesnoise-les-Aubert Action, et Laurence Chevalier, responsable du pôle lutte contre l'exclusion et promotion de la santé à la Direction territoriale de prévention et d'action sociale (DTPAS) de Cambrai.
Mais, Pascal Laby aura l'occasion de le répéter au cours des deux heures vingt de réunion, « la démocratie est exigeante » et son rôle d'animateur au sein de ce « forum permanent de l'insertion du Cambrésis » d'un genre nouveau n'est selon lui « pas une place enviable ».
Car les griefs énoncés par les allocataires présents sont nombreux, tout comme les sources possibles d'incompréhension entre les bénéficiaires du RSA et la collectivité chargée de sa gestion depuis 2009 (1), le conseil général du Nord.
Au coeur de la discussion hier, un enjeu : la communication. « Si l'on ne connaît pas nos droits, comment ensuite savoir quels sont nos devoirs ? », interroge Catherine, Caudrésienne « pas au RSA, mais susceptible de le devenir ». Gérard, de Caudry lui aussi, ne comprend pas que l'on n'ait pas donné suite au courrier par lequel il proposait la création d'une « épicerie fraternelle » regroupant les distributions des différentes associations d'aide alimentaire à Caudry, pour éviter « les files d'attente dans le froid » qui comprennent souvent des poussettes... D'évoquer aussi ce « jargon social difficile à assimiler ».
Les quatre personnes présentes hier font partie des quinze allocataires volontaires pour siéger au sein d'une « instance consultative » prévue par la loi dans le cadre du dispositif du RSA. Allocataire depuis six mois, un Gouzeaucourtois disait son envie d'« exprimer des idées et (d')essayer de représenter les gens » au sein du forum mais « encore faut-il que les gens nous parlent pour les représenter... » « J'en attends quelque chose de concret », ajoute-t-il, déjà satisfait à de cette « possibilité de parole ». « Et d'écoute », complète Laurence Chevalier.
À chacune des questions posées hier, elle-même comme Pascal Laby ont tenté d'apporter des éléments de réponse. Tâchant aussi de « canaliser » le « bouillonnement », afin de rester « constructifs ». Même si le dialogue peut sembler musclé, car « nouveau », « il se construit, sourit Catherine c'est une naissance un peu lente, mais il se fait ». Et tous semblent espérer qu'il ne fasse que commencer. •
(1) Dès décembre 2004, le conseil général a été chargé de la gestion du Revenu minimum d'insertion (RMI).

description.hltext_display: Kommentar UN-Mission Südsudan: Fehler der UN gefährden den Frieden
description.content:
Über die Demobilisierung der Soldaten im Südsudan
KOMMENTAR VON DOMINIC JOHNSON
Wenn ein bitterarmes Land aus Jahrzehnten des Bürgerkriegs erwacht, bedeutet der Aufbau von Frieden viel mehr als nur, dass die Waffen schweigen. Es geht darum, das Lebensumfeld der Menschen behutsam zu stabilisieren, ihnen neue Perspektiven jenseits der Gewalt zu eröffnen und verlässliche Institutionen zu schaffen, die der Gesellschaft Halt bieten.
Frühere Kämpfer müssen sich aus alten Abhängigkeiten von Warlords lösen und einen selbstbestimmten Beitrag zur Sicherung ihrer Familien und Gemeinschaften leisten können: Das ist die größte Herausforderung.
In diesem Kontext ist es immer eine heikle Angelegenheit, wenn ausländische Experten mit fetten Jeeps und außerirdisch anmutenden Gehältern anrollen und bitterarmen Kriegsüberlebenden erklären, wie sie ihre Probleme zu lösen haben. Längst haben die Krisen der Welt eine globale Helferelite gezüchtet, die quer über den Globus von einem gut bezahlten Posten zum nächsten hüpft und sich alle Widrigkeiten mit Dollarbündeln vom Leib hält.
Allzu oft ignoriert sie lokale Expertise, marginalisiert lokale Friedenskräfte und lässt lokale Stabilisierungsprozesse mangels Finanzierung und Anerkennung scheitern, während sie für hundertmal so viel Geld eigene Ideen ausprobiert und damit neue Konflikte produziert.
Die Unabhängigkeit Südsudans, Ergebnis eines jahrzehntelangen Freiheitskampfes, müsste eigentlich ein lichter Moment im Kampf um das Selbstbestimmungsrecht der Völker sein. Dank der Kapriolen, die sich die UNO derzeit mit ihrem Demobilisierungsprogramm leistet, wächst aber nun bei jenen, die dem Südsudan überhaupt erst die Freiheit beschert haben, der Frust und die Enttäuschung.
Die Gefahr ist, dass sich frustrierte Exguerilleros neuen Warlords zur Verfügung stellen, wie es einst Saddam Husseins Soldaten nach dem Irakkrieg getan haben. Es gibt im Sudan genügend Konfliktpotenzial und Kriegstreiber. Und vor allem nehmen in Sudans Hauptstadt Khartoum in der etablierten Elite sehr viele die Abspaltung des Südens nur widerwillig hin.
Die UNO ist ursprünglich nach Südsudan gekommen, um den Frieden zu sichern und dafür zu sorgen, dass ein stabiler neuer Staat entsteht, sofern die Südsudanesen ihn wünschen. Sie sollte sich schleunigst darauf besinnen, dieses Ziel zu erfüllen - und nicht durch ihre eigenen Fehler zu untergraben.

description.hltext_display: 維園阿哥任亮憲到警署報到[16:35]
description.content:
因涉嫌非禮及強姦案被捕、目前正保釋候查的社民連成員、「維園阿哥」任亮憲，今日到馬鞍山警署報到，協助調查。陪同任亮憲到警署的另一名社民連成員李偉儀表示，任亮憲今日的手續已完成，但沒有透露是否參與認人手續。
另外，任亮憲日前再被另一名女事主X小姐報警指控他非禮。警方暫列案件為非禮案，暫沒有人被捕。
（即時新聞）

description.hltext_display: Toshiba lanceert brilvrije 3D-televisie
description.content:
TOKIO (ANP) - Het Japanse elektronicaconcern Toshiba heeft woensdag in Japan de eerste driedimensionale televisie gelanceerd waarbij kijkers geen gebruik hoeven te maken van een speciaal brilletje. Dat heeft Toshiba woensdag bekendgemaakt.
De Japanse consument moet een bedrag van 119.800 yen (1089 euro) neertellen voor de nieuwe 3D-televisie. Kijkers hoeven daarbij geen gebruik te maken van een speciale bril die het mogelijk maakt om diepte te creëren.

description.hltext_display: AVG Free 2011
description.content:
, eigenlijk gewoon AVG Free 10, was net te laat voor onze vergelijkende antimalwaretest. We nemen deze vernieuwde populaire scanner alsnog onder de loep.
AVG heeft kleine, doeltreffende verbeteringen aan de interface doorgevoerd die gebruikers zullen waarderen. Donkere kleuren en een nieuwe slimme scan moeten helpen met betere prestaties en snellere navigatie. De installatie is teruggebracht van dertien naar vijf schermen, al vinden we dat nog altijd overbodig zwaar. Wel merken we dat de vernieuwde scanner ons systeem minder vertraagt dan AVG Free 9.
Zeer opdringerig We zijn niet gecharmeerd van de opdringerigheid waarmee AVG zijn betaalde product aan ons wil slijten. Naast de standaard banners moet je tijdens de installatie goed opletten dat je geen trialversie installeert. Installeer je ook de LinkScanner-browserwerkbalk, dan scant AVG je Facebook- en MySpace-links automatisch, maar het voegt dan wel een lelijke promotietekst toe in de boodschappen.
AVG Free 2011 scoort erg goed in recente onafhankelijke virustests. We ondervinden zelf dat het uitstekend is in het verwijderen van infecties. Vergeleken met andere gratis producten als Panda Cloud Antivirus is het echter minder goed in het herkennen en afstoppen van malwareaanvallen. En hoewel de LinkScanner-werkbalk goed reageert op websites met besmettende code, slaat het nauwelijks aan bij phishingsites. Er zijn extras, zoals een systeemschrobber en identiteitsbescherming, maar die kun je maar tijdelijk gratis gebruiken. Al met al heeft AVG een gestroomlijnder en beter product afgeleverd, maar onze voorkeur gaat nog steeds uit naar Panda Cloud Antivirus of Avast Free Antivirus.
AVG Free 2011 Prijs: gratis (januari 2011)
PRO: razendsnelle virusscan; bepaal zelf hoeveel systeemdruk AVG uitoefent; veel opties; verwijdert malware vakkundig. CONTRA: veel nieuwe functies blijken probeerversies; opdringerige reclame; slechte antiphishing; teleurstellende malwareverdediging.
bron: PC Magazine

description.hltext_display: Choir emphasizes teens' ability to sing
description.author: Tara Malone
description.content:
At New Trier, High Five welcomes singers of all abilities and disabilities
1
| single page
Students Meredith Shaw, center, and Michael Matsas rehearse with New Trier's High Five Choir. Two facilitators or buddies partner with each special needs student to help navigate lyrics and melodies. (Chris Walker, Chicago Tribune / November 29, 2010)
Related
Video: New Trier's High-Five Choir
Photos: The choir prepares, performs
X
Text Size
ct-met-school-disability-choir-20101221
A slight boy with glasses, Chris Choe walked to the front of the choir room and raised his hand to signal for attention. The 16-year-old junior needed silence and support to rehearse the lines he would repeat in a week before an auditorium packed with students at New Trier Township High School.
For him, it wasn't just about nerves.
Choe has Noonan syndrome, a genetic disorder that can complicate speech and vocal articulation, among other symptoms. Introducing himself in a loud, clear voice to hundreds of his peers would be a challenge, but Choe knew he could rely for support on the High Five Choir, where students with special needs perform alongside general music students.
On the recent morning, with the big performance days away, Choe practiced his part of the introduction.
"Hi, I'm Chris," he said in a faint voice, a dimpled grin dancing across his face as he turned to his student facilitator, Jennifer DelMonaco, who helps him navigate lyrics and melodies.
They explained why "'Different' does not mean 'less than'" and how people of all abilities can find a voice in music.
"Hit it, please," Choe hollered to the pianist as he high-fived DelMonaco, and the music began.
The song described a child picked last on the playground and a bespectacled boy who got teased. DelMonaco traced her finger along the lyrics, but Choe hardly needed the prompt. He knew the words by heart.
Don't laugh at me
Don't call me names
Don't get your pleasure from my pain
Deep inside, we're all the same
"Don't Laugh at Me" is the choir's hallmark. Its words reinforce the group's mission.
The High Five Choir has never performed this song — or any other — without receiving a standing ovation in the five years since the group began.
The choir that has become a model of music education across the state got its start during lunch.
New Trier music teacher Susan Vaughan for years had included in her choirs students with special needs, many of them unable to speak. But the interactions didn't tap into the musical talent of every student.
"We walked away feeling like we did a disservice to kids of all abilities. … There was socialization, but as far as figuring out what their music potential was, we didn't even go there," Vaughan said.
So Vaughan, special education teacher Jane Che, and a team of speech therapists and music teachers kicked around ideas for better integrating students with disabilities. They researched ways to make the music accessible to all teenagers, whether that meant using sign language and drawings or instruments; one young man, for instance, preferred to play the harmonica. Those who could not speak could use electronic switches, which students could tap to play back a prerecorded song.
The result was a lunchtime choir that drew teens with special needs ranging from autism to Down syndrome, along with choral students who were trained as peer tutors. Two facilitators or buddies partnered with every special needs student.

Help with videos
Streaming media
Websites in the Fairfax Digital Network offer streaming video and audio in the Flash format. Streaming media allows you to watch video on a website as a continuous feed, as opposed to waiting for an entire audio or video file to download to your computer before you can use it.
Download the software
To play a video or multimedia clip, you need to have the Flash player installed. You can download one for most systems (including Mac OS X) for free if one is not already installed on your system.
Which Speed?
Our automated system will test your connection speed and send the best video stream so it plays smoothly and continuously.
Alternatively, you can manually choose the speed setting that corresponds most closely with your network connection. We produce clips in a range of speeds to deliver the best quality possible-- the better the quality the faster connection you'll need.

description.hltext_display: MBK·코세어·동양증권 등 하나금융 FI로 참여제안
description.content: [하나금융지주, KEB 에쿼티투자자 � �수 결과 6개사 참여...1조2000억원 모집 예� �]더벨|이 기사는 12월22일(17:00) 머니투데이가 만� 에 출� 된 기사입니다.하나금융지주가 추진중인 외환은행 인수자금 모집에 칼라일, 어피니티, MBK, 코세어캐피탈 등 해외 사모투자펀드(PEF)와 동양종합금융증권(동양증권), 리딩투자증권 등 국내 증권사들이 인수의향서(LOI)를 � �출한 것으로 나타났다.하나금융지주가 외환은행 인수자금 마� �을 위해 실시한 에쿼티 투자자 인수의향서(LOI) � �수결과 이같이 나타났다.MBK는 국민연금(NPS)을 비롯해 국내외 연기금을 � 동성공급자(LP)로 하는 사모펀드를 조성해 외환은행 투자자로 참여하� 다는 의사를 밝혔다. MBK가 � �안한 투자 규모는 1조5000억~2조원 수준으로, 하나금융이 실시� � 상증자와 회사채 발행에 참여하� 다는 것. MBK는 다른 펀드와의 차별성을 꾀하기 위해 투자기간도 5년이상으로 � �안했다는 후문이다.최근 국내에서 뚜� �한 투자실� �을 올리지 못하� 있는 칼라일과 어피니티는 � �극� �인 구� 를 펴� 있는 것으로 알� �졌다. 이들 펀드도 1조원대이상의 투자를 � �안한 것으로 알� �졌다.이들 외에 미국계 사모펀드인 코세어캐피탈도 입찰에 참여했다. 반면 딜 초반 관심을 보였던 콜버그 크래비스 로버� (KKR)는 아직 의향서를 내지 않았다.해외 PEF에 맞서 국내 투자자로는 동양증권과 리딩투자증권이 도� �장을 냈다. 최근 동양증권은 현대그룹의 현대건설 인수합병(M&A)에 재무� �투자자(FI)로 참여해 풋백옵션 등의 문� �로 논란에 휩싸이기도 했다. 이번에도 LOI를 � �출했지만 동양증권이 자체� �으로 물량을 장기 보� 하기 보다는 구조화금융 등을 통한 지분 재매각(셀다운)에 나설 가능성이 높아 하나금융이 투자자로 � � �� 지 여부는 불확실하다. 리딩투자증권 역시 동양증권과 비슷한 성격의 투자자라는 평가를 받� 있다.하나금융측은 이들 FI 외에 중국계 은행 등 � �략� �투자자(SI)와 해외 국부펀드 등과 � �촉해왔다. 업계 관계자는 “다양한 투자자들이 � �안한 내용을 검� 한 뒤에 투자기간이 좋은 우량 투자자 위주로 에쿼티 물량을 배� �� 것으로 보인다”며 “하나금융 경영진이 � �촉중인 � �략� �투자자(SI)의 투자여부도 LOI� �수결과와 함께 같이 검� � 것이다”� 말했다.김승� 하나금융지주 회장은 외환은행 인수자금(4조6888억원)의 � �반은 내부 배당금으로 나머지25%는 채권, 25%는 � �3자배� �의 증자(보통주)와 � �환우� 주 발행으로 조달하� 다� 밝힌 바 있다.인수금의 � �반을 차지하는 배당금 2.3조원은 하나은행이 1.9조원을 하나대투증권이 4000억원을 각각 분담� 예� �이다.이에 따라 현재 1조2000억원을 목표로 추진중인 에쿼티투자자 모집결과에 따라 채권발행 규모(1조원)도 확� �� � �망이다.[김민열기자 mykim@]� �작권자 ⓒ `돈이 보이는 리얼타임 뉴스` 머니투데이

description.hltext_display: Oh Hey, X.Org 7.6 Is Finally Release For Christmas!
description.content:
The past few days I've been wondering whether or not X.Org 7.6 would make it out in 2010 or not. After all, this X.Org katamari update was supposed to be here in August after X.Org 7.5 was released in October of 2009 and the 7.6 release was delayed to November. The release of X.Org 7.6 didn't come in November, but there was one release candidate but not much information since. This afternoon, however, Alan Coopersmith has announced the final release...
Read more at Phoronix

description.hltext_display: توقعات بموافقة مجلس الشيوخ على معاهدة "ستارت"
description.content:
من المتوقع أن يصادق مجلس الشيوخ الأميركي الأربعاء على معاهدة "ستارت الجديدة" الخاصة بخفض الأسلحة النووية مع روسيا.
وكان مجلس الشيوخ قد تمكن الثلاثاء من تمرير لائحة لإنهاء النقاش حول المعاهدة التي نالت 67 صوتا، وهو نفسه عدد الأصوات الذي يحتاجه الديمقراطيون للمصادقة على المعاهدة، بعد انضمام تسعة جمهوريين إلى المؤيدين لها.
وكان الرئيس أوباما قد حث مجلس الشيوخ على ضرورة المصادقة على المعاهدة في أسرع وقت ممكن خدمة للمصلحة القومية للولايات المتحدة، بينما تحفّظ غالبية الجمهوريين عليها.
واعتبر السناتور الديموقراطي جون كيري رئيس لجنة الشؤون الخارجية الذي قاد المناقشات داخل مجلس الشيوخ حول المصادقة على ستارت، في بيان بث بعد التصويت "نحن على وشك كتابة الفصل المقبل في تاريخ مكافحة تهديد الأسلحة النووية".
ويسيطر الديموقراطيون حاليا على 58 مقعدا من 100 في مجلس الشيوخ الأميركي. ومن ثم ينقصهم أصوات تسعة جمهوريين للتوصل إلى الأصوات الـ67 اللازمة للتصديق، أي ثلثي المجلس.
وبعد هذا التصويت الأول يبدو أن التصديق أصبح محسوما. وبالفعل، فإن ما مجموعه 11 سناتورا جمهوريا صوتوا لصالح المصادقة على المعاهدة.
وتعارض روسيا أي تعديل في المعاهدة، كما أعلن الاثنين وزير الخارجية سيرغي لافروف. ولن يصدق البرلمان الروسي على المعاهدة إلا بعد تصديق مجلس الشيوخ الأميركي.
وكان أعضاء مجلس الشيوخ الأميركي يعتزمون الثلاثاء تعديل "قرار المصادقة" وهو وثيقة داخلية في مجلس الشيوخ بهدف الرد على هواجس الجمهوريين حول مصير نظام الدفاع الأميركي المضاد للصواريخ. وإن مثل هذا العمل لن يكون له تأثير على المعاهدة بحد ذاتها بما أنه لن يلزم سوى الأميركيين.

description.hltext_display: Suspendidas por mal tiempo las conexiones por catamarán y la flota pesquera se queda amarrada a puerto
description.author: EUROPA PRESS
description.content:
EUROPA PRESS El Consorcio de Transportes de la Bahía de Cádiz ha informado de que las conexiones marítimas por catamarán entre las localidades de Cádiz, El Puerto de Santa María y Rota continúan suspendidas a causa del mal tiempo, motivo por el que la flota pesquera tampoco ha salido este miércoles a faenar. El Consorcio de Transportes de la Bahía de Cádiz ha informado de que las conexiones marítimas por catamarán entre las localidades de Cádiz, El Puerto de Santa María y Rota continúan suspendidas a causa del mal tiempo, motivo por el que la flota pesquera tampoco ha salido este miércoles a faenar.
Según detalla el Consorcio de Transportes en su página web, consultada por Europa Press, se dispondrá un servicio alternativo de autobús, que es directo y parte desde las propias terminales marítimas.
Según la previsión de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología, consultada por Europa Press, en aguas costeras de Cádiz sopla el viento de componente suroeste y fuerza seis a siete, rolando al final a oeste y fuerza seis a siete. Hay visibilidad regular o mala por aguaceros, siendo el estado de la mar de fuerte marejada a mar gruesa con mar de fondo del oeste de tres a cuatro metros.

description.hltext_display: Pınar Karşıyaka Saat 13.45'te İzmir'de Olacak
description.content:
'nde çirkin saldırılara maruz kalan Pınar Karşıyaka Basketbol Takımı, Türkiye'ye dönmek üzere ayrıldı. Kafilenin, saat 13.45 sıralarında Adnan Menderes Havalimanı'nda olacağı öğrenildi. Pınar Karşıyaka, Basketbol FIBA Erkekler EuroChallenge (G) Kupası'nda, dün (21 Aralık) Apoel ile yaptığı maçtan sonra taraftarların çirkin saldırılarına maruz kalmıştı. Pınar Karşıyaka Kulübü yetkilileri, kafilenin havayoluyla Atina'ya hareket ettiğini, oradan saat 13.05'te ayrılarak İzmir'e geleceğini açıkladı.
Saldırıyla ilgili olarak Pınar Karşıyaka'nın internet sitesine de bir açıklama koyuldu. Açıklamada, şu görüşlere yer verildi: "Son günlerde art arda yaşadığımız büyük üzüntü ve stresin ardından, dün akşam 'nde yaşanan olaylar nedeniyle mahsur kalan takımımızı karşılamak üzere tüm Karşıyakalıları, İzmir Adnan Menderes Havalimanı'na davet ediyoruz. Pınar Karşıyaka Basketbol Takımı ve Karşıyakalıların tek yumruk olduğunu göstermek adına, saat 13.45 sularında alana iniş yapması beklenen takımımızı karşılamak üzere saat 13.00'te, Karşıyaka İskele'de taraftar konvoyu oluşturulacaktır.'' (Cihan Haber Ajansı) 12 dakika önce.. [2430117]

description.hltext_display: 北塘区无锡总部商务园一期招标公告
description.content:
[用户网]2010年度工程机械行业"企业品牌指数"调查
项目名称：无锡总部商务园项目详情
拟招标标段及工作范围简述：
工程简介：无锡总部商务园项目详情
项目是由北京联东投资（集团）有限公司与无锡市北塘区政府共同投资开发的总部经济综合体项目，该项目坐落于无锡市北塘区，是聚合总部独栋商务楼、甲级研发办公楼、LOFT商住办公楼、中高端住宅、商业街、酒店等业态于一体的国际化新型产业园区。
项目总占地850亩，规划建筑面积120万平方米，共分3期开发建设；一期开发90亩，建筑面积约14万平方米，约2012年06月交付使用。业态包括：18栋总部独栋商务楼；1栋16层LOFT商住办公楼；1栋地标性甲级写字楼；2区域1~3层底层商业配套；人防和非人防地下车库。
招标范围：1.无锡总部商务园一期消防安装工程
2.无锡总部商务园一期智能化安装工程
招标单位资格要求：1.消防工程具有施工一级资质。
2.智能化工程具有设计甲级资质，施工一级资质。
联系方式：无锡市凤宾路100号无锡总部商务园三楼成本管理部

description.hltext_display: Malawi Nov inflation slows to 6.4 pct yr/yr
description.content: JOHANNESBURG, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Malawi's headline consumer inflation slowed to 6.4 percent year-on-year in November, compared with 6.7 percent in October, the National Statistics Office said on Wednesday.

description.hltext_display: "디지털콘텐츠-기존 사업간 충돌 우려 극복이 큰 과제"
description.content: [이데일리 류준영 기자] "디지털콘텐� 로 � �환하는데 가장 큰 부담은 기존 오프라인 출판물과의 충돌에 대한 내부 우� �입니다"3년� �부터 디지털출판 콘텐� 사업을 강화해 온 두산동아 이인 마케팅본부장은 최근 이데일리 IT동영상뉴스 Digital쇼룸에 출연해 "초반 내·외부의 우� �가 많았으나 디지털콘텐� 사업자로 � �환하길 잘했다"� 했다.두산동아는 공격� �인 스마트폰 및 태블릿PC � 플리케이션 � �책으로 내년까지 총 500여종 앱을 확보하게 된다. `국내 최� 규모의 앱 생산공장`을 목표로 꾸준히 추진한 결과다.오프라인 중심 출판기업이던 두산동아는 앱스� 어란 � 통라인을 통해 17개국에 돈 한푼 들이지 않� 브랜드마케팅을 펼� 수 있었다. 또 이를 기반으로 내년 아시아시장에도 진출하� 다는 계획이다.앱스� 어에서 가장 잘 팔리는 `효자 앱`은 � �자사� �과 � 아용 � 플리케이션이다.이 본부장은 "엄마나 아� 목소리로 동화를 더빙해 들� �주� , 동화책 읽는 동안 동요도 삽입해 들을 수 있는 앱(APP)은 기존 이북 콘텐� 와는 차별된다"며 "특히 태블릿의 주요 구매층인 30-40대의 경우 미취학 아동을 둔 부모들이 대부분이라 비즈니스와 아이들 놀이용으로 활용하는 경우가 많다"� 설명했다.매년 30%대 성장을 보이는 디지털콘텐� 사업은 � 객 타깃이 분명했기에 가능했던 성과라는 설명이다.이인 본부장은 "보수� �인 언� 사나 출판기업이 디지털콘텐� 에 � �근� 때 가장 큰 벽은 기존 오프라인 출판물과의 충돌"이라며 "두산동아도 조직체계를 개� 하며 3년간 조직원의 인식변화 노� �을 해왔다"� � �했다.또 "회사의 강� �과 � 객 타깃을 � �확히 해야 한다"며 "갖� 있는 최대 강� �을 파악하� , � 객들이 사용 가능한 범위에서 차근차근 디지털화를 시도해야 한다"� 설명했다.그는 "IT기� 트� �드를 � 심히 관찰� 경우 새로운 비즈니스 기회를 맞을 수 있다"며 "디지털콘텐� 사업자 � �환을 � 민하는 출판기업은 장기� �인 로드맵을 만들어 당장 실행하라"� 강조했다.이인 본부장과의 대화는 ▲Digital쇼룸 홈페이지(http://showroom.edaily.co.kr/) ▲스마트폰(갤럭시S 등 안드로이드폰 디지털쇼룸 앱) ▲태블릿PC(갤럭시탭 및 아이패드 디지털쇼룸 앱)에서 볼 수 있다. � �목은 [연말기획� ] `두산동아 변� 또 변� ..무죄!`볼 수 있다.＜ⓒ종합 경� �� �보 미디어 이데일리 - 무단� �재&재배포 금지＞

description.hltext_display: Letiště Praha kvůli počasí dnes zatím zrušilo tři lety do Londýna
description.content:
Praha - Aerolinky pro dnešek z pražského ruzyňského letiště zrušily kvůli přetrvávajícím potížím se sněhem v Evropě tři lety na londýnské letiště Heathrow, jeden večerní přílet z tohoto letiště prozatím zrušen není. Problémy ve spojení s jinými destinacemi zatím nejsou hlášeny, řekla ČTK mluvčí Letiště Praha Michaela Lagronová.
Mluvčí upozornila, že situace se během dne může měnit. Na samotném ruzyňském letišti je provoz plynulý.
V úterý ruzyňské letiště kvůli potížím se sněhem na jiných evropských letištích zrušilo 25 až 30 letů ze zhruba 400. Dotklo se to spojů na Heathrow, problémy měla i letiště ve Frankfurtu nad Mohanem, Dublinu, Lyonu a v Bruselu.
Problémy na letištích způsobuje sníh a také námraza, která se musí z letadel odstraňovat, dodala mluvčí.
Autor: ČTK
Témata: Evropa, počasí, letectví, Letiště Praha,

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
AMSTERDAM (ANP) - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Kort na de opening noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent hoger op 356,40 punten. De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen was onveranderd en stond op 634,10 punten. Ook in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden de graadmeters onveranderd.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,3 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent.

description.hltext_display: Осуждена банда "скинхедов", нападавших иностранцев в Башкирии
description.content: В Башкирии судом города Уфы вынесен приговор в отношении 7 жителей, признанных виновными в нападениях на иностранных граждан по мотивам расовой, национальной ненависти и вражды. Об этом 21 декабря сообщили в пресс-службе Башпрокуратуры. "Установлено, что подсудимые являлись активными членами неформального движения "скинхедов", - рассказал сотрудник пресс-службы. - В середине мая 2008 года, действуя группой лиц, во дворе дома по проспект Октября, осужденные совершили нападение на иностранных граждан, в ходе которого нанесли множество ударов руками и ногами по голове и различным частям тела двум иностранцам, 21 и 22 лет. Кроме того, в ходе избиения 17-летний уфимец умышленно нанес ножом удар в спину одному из иностранцев, чем причинил последнему тяжкий вред здоровью. Они же, в конце мая 2008 года возле развлекательного комплекса "Огни Уфы" напали на иностранца и двух граждан России, ошибочно приняв их за иностранцев, которым нанесли множественные удары руками и ногами по различным частям тела. Кроме того, 23-летний житель Уфы нанес ножом удар в грудную клетку гражданину РФ, похожему на иностранца". Суд назначил наказание 17-летнему участнику банды в виде 4,5 лет лишения свободы с отбыванием наказания в исправительной колонии общего режима, 23-летнему - 4 года 2 месяца лишения свободы с отбыванием наказания в исправительной колонии общего режима, арестовав их в зале суда. Остальным подсудимым назначено наказание в виде лишения свободы условно.

description.hltext_display: Schweiz betreibt Risikomanagement auf Basis österreichischer Standards
description.content:
gab die Schweizer Bundespräsidentin Doris Leuthard die Implementierung eines Risikomanagementsystems auf Basis des in Österreich entwickelten Regelwerks ONR 49000 bekannt. Das Regelwerk, das weltweit als "State of the Art" gilt, fasst alle notwendigen Prozesse und Schritte zusammen, die für die Einführung und praktische Umsetzung eines umfassenden Risikomanagements notwendig sind - von der Risikoerkennung bis zur Ausbildung hochqualifizierter Risikomanager und Risikomanagerinnen. An seiner Entstehung haben seit 2004 unter österreichischer Federführung mehr als 100 Experten und Expertinnen aus nahezu 50 Nationen mitgewirkt.
Schweiz: Risikopolitik bringt Sicherheit
"Die ONR 49000 ist für uns eine wertvolle Leitplanke, wir müssen die Themen nicht neu erfinden", umreißt Nicole Heynen, die das Risikomanagement der Schweizer Bundesregierung koordiniert, den großen Vorteil des Systems, das nun sukzessive in der Bundeskanzlei, den sieben Departementen, die in etwa unseren Ministerien entsprechen, und den rund 60 Bundesämtern eingeführt wird. Insgesamt sind 36.000 Mitarbeiter und Mitarbeiterinnen des Bundes involviert.
Dass die Schweizer Regierung die ONR 49000 übernommen hat, sieht man bei Austrian Standards als wichtiges Signal mit Vorbildwirkung und ist zuversichtlich, dass sich viele Unternehmer und öffentliche Stellen daran orientieren. Austrian-Standards-Geschäftsführer Ing. Dr. Gerhard Hartmann: "Die Implementierung des Regelwerks durch die Schweizer Regierung ist eine großartige Anerkennung der Arbeit, die bei uns geleistet wurde, und bestätigt, dass der Weg, eine Grundlage auf Konsens aller Beteiligten zu schaffen, richtig war."
Lesen Sie mehr dazu unter
http://www.as-institute.at/themencenter/fuer-unternehmen/success-stories/risikomanagement-schweiz/ (Ende) Aussender: Ansprechpartner: Dr. Johannes Stern
email: johannes.stern@as-institute.at
