description.hltext_display: 高新区草堂产业基地11项目集中开工 预计
description.content:
[用户网]2010年度工程机械行业"企业品牌指数"调查
华商网讯（记者 杨毅）12月21日，地处秦岭北麓的户县草堂镇彩旗飞舞、锣鼓喧天，西安高新区草堂科技产业基地11家企业集中签约和开工典礼在这里隆重举行。市委常委、高新区党工委书记、管委会主任岳华锋等领导出席了开工典礼。
这次参加集中开工的企业包括西安宝德自动化、陕西坚瑞消防、西安西元电子、西安华晶电子、西安兴仪、西安西驰电气、西安前进电器、西安利雅得电气、西安威盛电子、西安市政设计院、西安高新区草堂基地污水处理厂。此次开工的11个项目总投资17亿元，预计产值48亿元，涵盖了电力电子信息、新能源及现代服务业等行业。这是继比亚迪汽车、企业加速器、海航置业开工后规模最大的一次项目集中开工。截至目前，草堂科技产业基地累计引进项目22个，开工15家，总投资82亿元，预计产值300亿。
2010年是草堂基地大配套、市政路网等基础设施建设和招商引资工作飞速发展的一年。先进制造、电子信息、生物制药三大产业从容布局，十个项目的入区签约及十一个项目的集中破土开工，昭示着高新区草堂基地在进入了“基础建设与产业布局同步快速推进”的新阶段。宝德自动化、西元电子、兴仪电子、西驰电器、前进电器、利雅得电气、威盛电子等项目的开工建设，对于推动草堂基地形成电力电子信息产业集群，将起到推波助澜的作用；随着华晶电子、勤上光电等新能源业项目的入区，体现出草堂基地在新能源产业布局上趋于完善，也为西安高新区的发展起到了提供空间、完善功能、完整产业链的作用。
草堂基地项目的入区开工带动了园区各项配套建设。市政路网建设、市政设施建设全面启动；征地拆迁、土地报批等工作都取得了突破性的进展；基础设施配套日趋完善，投资环境逐步优化，服务意识逐步提升，均为后续的招商及项目开工奠定了良好的基础。
据了解，草堂基地作为高新区“两带四区七园”中的重要板块，是高新区创建世界一流科技园区的重要组成部分，将在拓展空间、完善功能、延伸产业链等方面发挥重要的作用，也必将对促进户县产业结构升级，以工业化带动城镇化，为西安城郊区县经济结构调整优化和城市化建设发挥重要的示范作用。根据规划，草堂基地占地20平方公里，分为南区和北区，是高新区与户县的合作共建区，是高新区“总部+基地”合作发展模式的重要功能区域，与高新区功能互补、错位发展，是高新区建设世界一流园区的重要组成部分。基地产业基本定位：以“高新区主导产业配套”为指导思想，重点发展电子信息技术制造、生物医药等产业的配套产业，培育发展一系列核心竞争力强、能参与高新区产业分工，实现与高新区产业的梯度转移，为高新区主导产业提供配套的产业集群。

description.hltext_display: Education goes on no matter the place
description.content:
Parents fighting to save neighborhood schools are starting to feel that the odds are against them. And they're right.
First they face the double obstacle of a stagnant economy and a state budget deficit. Even if the economy turns around quickly, and there are few predictions in that direction, there is little likelihood that significant amounts will filter through to the local school districts in time to reduce the pressures most districts are feeling. The new balance of power in Congress means there will be no more federal stimulus money; the new balance of power in Albany means that closing the growing gap between revenue and expenditure will take priority over any increase in aid.
Then the parents have to confront the local balance of power. While those who face the prospect of having their schools close are the ones who show up at the first meetings, board members know that others in the district are not about to chip in and solve the problem. It if comes down to it, those with other priorities will fight to keep their schools open and their programs intact. And the boards know where the population is stable or growing, where it is declining and which buildings cost more to keep open.
Much of the talk centers around effects beyond education, on those who might move out if a building closes or on the hole a shuttered school leaves. As sad as that prospect is, when a school district does not have the money to keep every building open, then perhaps it is time for those who live nearby to start thinking about other ways to use the real estate for the good of the community.
School boards have to balance two concerns on top of their lists ? what is best for students and what the community can afford. As one parent put it in a recent article, the children tend to adapt to these changes better than their parents do. Parents have to keep that in mind and realize that the time is coming in most of these situations where the good of the children will mean consolidation so that the district can spend the money it has on real education, not tradition or other legitimate but secondary concerns.

description.hltext_display: 県内大荒れの天気に
India Today Arunachal survey
description.content:
83% FEEL CHINA IS NOT JUSTIFIED IN SHOWING ARUNACHAL PRADESH AS ITS PART
The Chinese Government ignores the McMahon Line and claims Tawang as a part of Tibet even though the Dalai Lama has said that Arunachal Pradesh is part of India. Sixty seven per cent people feel only Arunachal Pradesh has rights over the waters of the Brahmaputra and China must not build dams on the river.
95% WANT TO BE WITH INDIA
Arunachal Pradesh is an integral part of Indian democracy and there is an elected government in the state. The people of the state want to be part of the great Indian economic boom. For youngsters, Bangalore and Delhi are the places to be in, not Beijing.
80% WANT HINDI AS THE STATE LANGUAGE
Hindi is the medium of expression for the young Arunachalis. And they don't feel it's imposed. It's the language preferred even over English. Aaj Tak is the most watched news channel and 92 per cent prefer Bollywood over Hollywood.
89% FEEL PART OF INDIA
The McMahon Line declared it in 1950, and for the people of the state, that remains the ultimate fact. Eight out of 10 Arunachalis feel India cares about them. Contrary to the common perception, they don't feel neglected and 86 per cent think India has done enough for them. There are problems of infrastructure and education, but 70 per cent respondents blame it on state politicians.
78% DISLIKE CHINA
Eight out of 10 people in Arunachal look at China with suspicion. Not a single respondent wants to be part of China. The scars of 1962 are still fresh. The constant claim on its territory is not only annoying, but also a reminder of the invasion five decades ago.
44% FEEL INDIA IS NOT STRONG IN FACING UP TO CHINA
The Chinese troops reached Tezpur in Assam in 1962. China has now built railway lines, roads and helipads right up to the Indian border. There has been diplomatic posturing from India, but nothing much has happened on the ground.

description.hltext_display: 逛日本朝市體驗當地生活文化
description.content:
據說日本各地的朝市超過1,000個之多，日本最著名的三大朝市分別為岐阜縣的高山朝市、石川縣的輪島朝市，以及千葉縣的勝浦朝市。勝浦朝市每天都營業，從東京乘坐JR特快車大約只需1個半小時即可抵達。雖然販售的大多是當地農家栽培的蔬菜、水產及乾貨，但絕對是既新鮮又美味的產品。有些大規模的朝市，除了出售新鮮的食品之外，也販售有服飾、紀念品、手工藝品、以及各種雜貨，是體驗當地特色及飲食、生活文化的最佳去處。
逛朝市的樂趣在於即便是語言不通，也可以比手劃腳來溝通，因為這些攤販大多是純樸的當地人，可讓遊客感受到不一樣的旅行樂趣。 除了在朝市外，在充滿朝氣活力的市集購物，也可感受到當地日常生活和飲食文化。例如，北海道札幌的二條市場、札幌場外市場、石川縣金澤的近江市場、京都的錦市場，以及被稱為是「大阪廚房」的黑門市場等都是不可錯過的好地方。

description.hltext_display: Danske sømænd er storrygere og for fede
description.content:
Mange skibskokke bruger Frk. Jensens Kogebog, og det gør sømændene fede. Det skal forskningsprojekt ændre på. 120 kilo og 40 smøger om dagen. Det skal være fortid for danske sømænd via et forskningsprojekt, der frem til 2012 skal forbedre sundhed og trivsel på havene, skriver Nyhedsbrevet 3F.
- 70 procent af sømændene er overvægtige. Samtidig ryger de mere end gennemsnittet. Rederierne har dels haft et ønske om at fremme sundheden, dels et ønske om at forebygge sygefravær.
- Derfor er de gået ind i projektet, siger projektkoordinator, Lulu Hjarnø, Center for Maritim Sundhed og Sikkerhed, til Nyhedsbrevet 3F.
Når besætningen er på under 10 mand, er der ingen krav til kokkens uddannelse, og det er ikke godt for sundheden.
- Nogle af de uuddannede kokke, vi har talt med, ved ikke engang, hvad en artiskok er. De bruger Frk. Jensens Kogebog, og den er jo ikke ligefrem kalorielet, siger Lulu Hjarnø.
Projektet gennemføres af Center for Maritim Sundhed og Sikkerhed i samarbejde med de to danske rederier, Royal Arctic Line og Esvagt A/S samt Søfartens Arbejdsmiljøråd og Crecea A/S.
/ritzau/

description.hltext_display: CES 2011 - Microsoft pourrait dévoiler une version de Windows adaptée aux processeurs ARM
description.content:
- Microsoft pourrait dévoiler une version de Windows adaptée aux processeurs ARM Selon l'information obtenue par Bloomberg, cette adaptation de Windows serait optimisée pour les terminaux mobiles tels que les tablettes. Microsoft a renforcé sa licence ARM en juillet dernier.
Prenons d'un côté l'information du New-York Times selon laquelle Microsoft dévoilera plusieurs lors du CES (6-9 janvier à Las Vegas). Prenons de l'autre, Bloomberg qui dit savoir que la firme de Redmond a dans ses cartons une version ARM de Windows qu'elle prévoit aussi de révéler à Las Vegas. Mixons les deux et l'on obtient une tablette Internet Windows 7 optimisée pour les architectures ARM qui créerait une vraie surprise. Mais aussi séduisante que soit cette supposition, il est assez probable qu'elle ne soit pas crédible. Car comme le rappelle notre consoeur de , il existe déjà une version qui supporte l'architecture ARM. Il s'agit de Windows CE alias Embedded Compact dont la version 7 doit sortir au premier trimestre 2011. Bloomberg ne livre aucune précision si ce n'est que cette version adaptée de Windows supporterait également les processeurs Intel et AMD. Une chose est sûre, Microsoft a passé un avec ARM en juillet dernier dont les termes sont demeurés confidentiels. (Eureka Presse)

description.hltext_display: Cáritas intensifica la recogida de alimentos para apoyar en Navidades a los necesitados
description.content:
El economato se encuentra desbordado por causa del gran apoyo que está teniendo por parte de diferentes entidades alcoyanas
VOTE ESTA NOTICIA
Los colaboradores de Cáritas se han visto desbordados ante las donaciones masivas de alimentos registradas. información
C. SERRANO
La recogida de alimentos se intensifica con la llegada de las fiestas navideñas. Cáritas Alcoy está llevando a cabo esta labor gracias a la colaboración de algunos de los colegios y todas las parroquias de Alcoy, así como de multitud de entidades locales. En este sentido, el economato se encuentra desbordado, según ha indicado su responsable, Rafael Tortosa, debido "al gran apoyo que estamos teniendo". Por ello, 226 familias necesitadas se beneficiarán de dichas aportaciones. Además, en el economato se están encargando de comprobar las fechas de caducidad de los alimentos, así como de su clasificación para su posterior donación.
Cáritas Alcoy emprendió el pasado lunes 13 de diciembre una campaña de recogida de alimentos para ayudar en estas fechas tan señaladas a las familias más necesitadas.
En esta línea, la institucón esta recibiendo el apoyo de muchos colegios, así como de todas las parroquias de Alcoy. Además, son varias las entidades que también están colaborando en la aportación, en su mayoría, de alimentos y otros productos, como son la Asociación de Amas de Casa, algunas filaes y empresas de comunicación.
Todos los productos que se están recolectando se están destinando al abastecimiento de el economato que regentan las Cáritas Parroquiales de la localidad. Tal y como ha asegurado el responsable del almacén de comida, Rafael Tortosa, "estamos desbordados gracias al gran apoyo que estamos recibiendo", así como también ha indicado que están dedicando muchas horas a revisar cada alimento y, por supuesto, clasificar todos y cada uno de los productos donados.
Asimismo, los centros educativos que están colaborando con Cáritas Alcoy en la recogida, principalmente, de alimentos, están acudiendo por grupos al economato, donde se les explica cómo revisan los productos y bajo qué criterios llevan a cabo la clasificación. Además, según ha matizado Tortosa, cuando alguno de los colegios no puede acudir hasta la sede, "somos nosotros los que vam0s hasta allí y les explicamos todo cómo funciona todo". Además, Rafael Tortosa ha manifestado su agradecimiento a todas aquellas personas y entidades que están colaborando "de manera desinteresada en esta recogida de productos".
Con todo, un total de 226 familias que se encuentran en una mala situación económica recibiran unas bolsas dotadas con productos de primera necesidad, así como objetos típicos navideños, como puede ser un árbol, para que celebren las fiestas lo mejor posible.
En este sentido, la campaña de recogida finalizará este miércoles, por lo que la entrega de las bolsas se llevará a cabo el jueves 23 de diciembre, según Tortosa. De este modo, las familias tendrán un surtido de alimentos en vísperas de Nochebuena.
Cáritas ha querido trasmitir a los alcoyanos y alcoyanas que es importante que la gente esté unida se ayuden los unos a los otros, sobre todo, en momentos tan complicados para "tantas personas ante los efectos sociales de la crisis". Este va a ser el mensaje para empezar la campaña que ponen en marcha cada Navidad.
CONTENIDO
Preparada una
amplia variedad
de productos
Todas y cada una de las 226 familias que pasarán el próximo jueves por el economato, recogerán tres bolsas, cada una de ellas con productos totalmente diferentes. Por un lado, una de las bolsas contendrá arroz, fideos, macarrones, leche y piña o melocotón. Además, en otra de ellas habrá tomate, atún, turrón, aceite, un pollo entero, cacahuetes y avellanas. Finalmente, la última de las bolsas en vez de contener alimentos llevará otro tipo de productos, algunos de ellos también necesarios, como son: juguetes, un árbol de Navidad, mantas de viaje, colchas, ramos de flores -para adornar la casa- y un maletín de herramientas.

description.hltext_display: McNabb feels 'disrespected' by Redskins
description.content:
Making his first public comments since his demotion last week, McNabb said he strongly disagreed with the decision, but he has a bigger problem with the way he says the organization leaked the news to the media before informing him. "Because of the timing and because of all the leaks and everything that was put out there, and no putting out the fire, so to speak," McNabb said, "I'm hearing everything through the media." Shanahan waited until Thursday evening to tell McNabb that Rex Grossman would be the starter for the rest of the season, even though rumblings of a possible switch had been circulating all week. "I was pulled back by it," McNabb said. "All of a sudden you get this news a couple of days before the game, you do feel somewhat disrespected. You could have told me earlier or at least prepared me for it . . . The term I did use was professional. You would like to hear it early, and if you hear it late, it kind of throws off the preparation for a lot of guys." McNabb said he wasn't even aware that he was being demoted to No. 3 quarterback for the final two games of the season until Shanahan announced the move to reporters the next day.
As for the benching, McNabb conceded he's had a tough year, but he said he felt he had made enough progress in his first season in the Redskins' offense to give the team something to build on. Shanahan said he benched McNabb because the team had been mathematically eliminated from the playoffs and he wanted to evaluate the two other quarterbacks, Grossman and John Beck. "The way this whole thing went down to me was 'off' and one that I strongly disagree with because I've always believed that if you start something you finish it," McNabb said. "I wanted to be out there with the team . . . Other quarterbacks have struggled a little bit, but I'm the one that's got to go through this 'evaluation process.' " McNabb was asked if he felt demeaned by serving as the third-string quarterback. "Yeah, I don't think too many guys go from 1 to 3," he answered. "That's an unfortunate situation that I guess I'm one of a few to be a part of." The Redskins signed McNabb to a contract extension last month, but it contains a clause that allows the team to release him before next season without further financial obligations. McNabb said he did not think his relationship with Shanahan is permanently damaged and that he hopes to return to the team next season. "I love the fans here . . . I've enjoyed myself here," he said. "I think we can do some good things here." Noteworthy
* Cincinnati placed Terrell Owens on season-ending injured reserve a day after the receiver had surgery to repair cartilage in his left knee. Owens hurt the knee a couple weeks ago but kept playing.
ESPN.com, citing a league source, reported that the Bengals are not expected to re-sign Owens, who agreed to a 1-year deal at the start of training camp.
* Dallas placed quarterback Tony Romo on season-ending injured reserve. Romo broke his left collarbone Oct. 25 and hasn't played since. Owner Jerry Jones had hoped Romo could return from the broken bone on his non-throwing side, but the Cowboys have two games left and can't make the playoffs.
In other news, strong safety Gerald Sensabaugh and backup linebacker Sean Lee, who both suffered concussions in Sunday's win over the Redskins, said they have passed the neurological tests needed to practice.
* Pittsburgh coach Mike Tomlin concedes the Steelers were mistakenly awarded a first down on a 9-yard run by Rashard Mendenhall during their 22-17 loss to the Jets on Sunday.
On first-and-10 from the Jets 35 early in the second quarter, Mendenhall gained 9 yards to the 26 yard line. After momentary confusion as the chain crew began moving the sticks, referee Peter Morelli's crew put the ball down at the 25 and signaled a first down.
The statistics crew hastily awarded Mendenhall a 10-yard carry - an extra yard that wound up giving him a 100-yard game. The Steelers went on to score a touchdown on Ben Roethlisberger's 9-yard pass to Matt Spaeth.
Tomlin said the Steelers benefited in that situation, but added that the spotting of the ball is always tricky.

description.hltext_display: 기대작 육성 게임 ‘아이돌 마스터2’ DLC도 모두 출시
description.content: [지디넷코리아]인트라링스와 반다이남코파트너즈코리아에서 협약해 내년 2월 경 국내 정식 출시를 예정하고 있는 X박스360용 육성 시뮬레이션 게임 ‘아이돌 마스터2’(The Idol Master2)의 자세한 내용이 공개됐다. 반다이 남코 게임스에서 개발한 육성 게임 ‘아이돌마스터’(The Idol Master)의 후속작인 ‘아이돌마스터2’(The Idol Master2)는 전작의 특징을 계승하면서 다양한 모션 및 복장, 음악, 그리고 여러 가지 신규 시스템을 도입했다. 아이돌 육성 게임 `아이돌 마스터2`의 게임 화면이번 신작은 하루 단위로 스케줄을 설정하는 방식에서 일주일 단위로 진행, 전체적인 게임 진행 속도가 빨라졌으며, 미니 게임 위주의 연습 진행은 더욱 다양해지고 참신해졌다. 또한 100여종의 신규 모션과 함께 최대 5인이 함께 할 수 있는 집단 군무가 다행해져 다채로운 볼거리를 제공한다. 특히 프레임 자체가 매우 부드러워져 자연스러운 영상미를 보여준다. 국내 정식 출시되는 ‘아이돌 마스터2’는 일본어 버전에 매뉴얼만 한글화가 될 예정이고, 다운로드 콘텐츠(DLC)는 일본과 출시일이 동일할 수 없지만 비슷한 시기 내에 모두 출시가 될 것으로 알려졌다. 다양한 악세서리로 자신의 아이돌을 만들어낼 수 있다.인트라링스의 한 관계자는 “국내에서도 많은 팬들을 보유하고 있는 게임이기 때문에 정식 출시를 결정했다”며 “DLC 등의 추가 요소들도 빠짐없이 출시해 즐겁게 게임을 할 수 있도록 지원하겠다”고 말했다. 하지만 기대를 사고 있는 초회 한정판이나 국내 전용 한정판 출시는 미정이다.김동현 기자 (dhkshj@gamespot.co.kr)▶ 글로벌 IT의 중심 언론 메가뉴스▶ IT뉴스는 , 게임트렌드는 게임스팟코리아▶ 스마트폰으로 읽는 실시간 IT뉴스 모바일지디넷[저작권자ⓒ메가뉴스 & ZDNet & CNET. 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Чиновники повысили квалификацию
description.content:
материал размещен 22 декабря 2010 в 09:21
500-часовую программу профессиональной переподготовки завершили в ТюмГУ чиновники администрации Тюмени.
Дипломы о переподготовке Института дополнительного профессионального образования ТюмГУ получили заместитель главы города, главы административных округов, руководители департаментов и подразделений.
В программе переподготовки нашли место самые разнообразные актуальные дисциплины — профессиональная культура и этика государственных и муниципальных служащих, управление проектной деятельностью, разработка и принятие управленческих решений, управление общественными отношениями и др.

description.hltext_display: Daley: Dad was better mayor
description.author: John Byrne
description.content:
History will remember Richard J. Daley as Chicago's greatest mayor, his son said Tuesday as he approached the day he will surpass his father's record of more than 21 years in office.
Asked about the significance of the fact he will take the crown for mayoral longevity on Dec. 26, Mayor Richard M. Daley pointed out it wouldn't even be a question if his father had lived to the end of his term.
And the amount of time holding the position isn't the most important thing, anyway, Daley said.
"It's not the time you put in, it is the passion you have given to your years of service," Daley said after an event to dedicate a DePaul University building in the Loop in honor of himself and his wife, Maggie, the first of what is likely to be many buildings in the city to bear his name.
But the more subjective argument about greatness will tilt in his father's favor, Daley predicted.
"My father, the son will always say it's the father," Daley said when asked who would win in a debate about which mayor was the city's greatest.
"He went through the '50s, '60s and '70s, very interesting, an interesting time of the country," Daley said.
The elder Daley died in office on Dec. 20, 1976. The Daley family went to a Mass on Monday in his memory, and the mayor said he thanked his father for his commitment to the city.
Daley was joined at the building dedication by his son, Patrick, and daughter Nora, along with his brothers and wife. While two of his brothers are also in politics, the mayor said he would not encourage his children to follow him into politics, insisting people need to find their own paths in life.
"They have to make their own decision. My dad never encouraged me," he said. "My dad said 'You make your own decision if you want to go into it.' Never push your kids into something they don't want to do."

description.hltext_display: Al White to head Colorado Tourism Office, resign state Senate seat
description.content:
Blog about this Blog about this page on your steamboatpilot.com blog.
Steamboat Springs — State Sen. Al White accepted an appointment Tuesday by Gov.-elect John Hickenlooper to become director of the Colorado Tourism Office. White will assume his duties Jan. 11.
White, a Hay­den Republican, will submit his resignation from the General Assembly today. That resignation will be effective Jan. 1.
After championing the promotion of tourism during his 10-year state House and Senate career, White said Hickenlooper, a Democrat, approached him with the idea that his administration would work to create a dedicated, consistent and reliable funding source to promote Colorado’s tourism industry.
“The strength that I bring to business is knowing and understanding budget situations and process,” said White, a member of the Joint Budget Committee from 2006 to this year. “I look forward to working on legislation that will provide that stable funding source.”
White, an Army veteran who owned several businesses in Winter Park before moving to Hayden, was first elected to the State House in 2000. He was elected in 2008 to represent state Senate District 8, which includes Moffat, Routt, Jackson, Rio Blanco and Eagle counties and part of Garfield County.
When he was the representative for House District 57, White and former state Sen. Jack Taylor, R-Steamboat Springs, were two of the authors of a 2006 bill created to divert gaming tax revenue to the promotion of tourism. The bill eventually became law and about $20 million was dedicated to promote tourism. That was cut to $15 million in 2009 and stayed at that level this year.
Taylor said Tuesday night that White served as the house appointee to the state Tourism Board but his experience on the Joint Budget Committee would be more important in his new role. Taylor said keeping that annual tourism promotion funding from being cut would be White’s biggest challenge.
“This is not the time to be cutting back,” he said. “I don’t think there’s any area of state government that has the return on investment as tourism. … I think he’ll keep that in the forefront in his continued promotion of tourism.”
White said he and his wife, Jean, aren’t sure whether they will make a permanent move to Denver.
Steamboat Springs Deputy City Manager Wendy DuBord said the city is sad to lose White as a legislator.
“He’s been a great voice for Northwest Colorado and, of course, Steamboat Springs. In that way, we will miss him,” she said. She expects White to continue to be an advocate for tourism in Steamboat Springs and Routt County.
Routt County Commissioner Diane Mitch Bush said “no one knows more about tourism than Al White.” She agreed that White’s appointment would be an asset for the region.
“It’s a bonus for us because he’ll represent the interests of the Western Slope in regards to tourism,” Mitch Bush said. “Moreover, he knows the importance of tourism in Northwest Colorado. He’s always said tourism is an economic catalyst. I think he’ll do a great job representing the interests of tourism throughout the state, Western Slope and Northwest Colorado.”
The Denver Post reported that a Republican vacancy committee would meet Jan. 3 to elect White’s replacement in the state Senate.
— To reach Jack Weinstein, call 871-4203 or e-mail jweinstein@steamboatpilot.com

description.hltext_display: 沈海复线高速公路莆田段昨开工 凸显后
description.content:
[用户网]2010年度工程机械行业"企业品牌指数"调查
12月20日上午，仙游县大济镇蒲峰村彩旗招展，锣鼓喧天。沈海复线高速公路莆田段项目开工仪式在这里隆重举行。市政协主席杨鹏飞宣布开工。市委副书记蔡尔申，市委常委、宣传部长李飞亭，市政协副主席宋一然等出席开工仪式。
沈海复线高速公路莆田段是海西高速公路路网布局“三纵八横三环三十三联”中二纵“沈海复线”的重要组成部分，也是泛珠江三角洲综合交通规划福州至广州干线公路的重要组成部分。项目全线均位于仙游县境内，主线全长50.332公里，概算总投资约50.124亿元，建设总工期3年。起点位于仙游县游洋镇五星村，与沈海复线福州段顺接，终点在仙游县龙华镇松柏洋，与沈海复线泉州段顺接，全线横跨仙游县游洋、石苍、菜溪、钟山、社硎、书峰、榜头、大济、鲤城、龙华等10个乡镇(街道)、35个行政村。
杨鹏飞在开工仪式上致辞。他说，沈海复线高速公路莆田段项目是全省“五大战役”的重点攻坚项目之一，也是今年我市“十大确保开工项目”之一。项目的建设将进一步完善海西高速公路网和我市干线公路网布局，改善我市的公路交通条件，极大地促进我市与福州、广州等地的联系。进一步推动我市实现“跨越发展、宜居港城”目标。
杨鹏飞指出，全市各级各部门要充分认识该项目建设对我市经济社会发展的重大意义，为项目建设提供最佳投资环境、最高效率服务，确保“无障碍施工”，确保按进度完成各项工作。他希望莆田沈海复线高速公路有限责任公司严格实行计划管理和目标管理，全面推行“标准化管理”，确保建设质量、安全、工期、投资、环保等多重目标同步实现。同时希望广大建设者以高度的责任感和使命感，发扬艰苦奋斗的优良作风，加强团结协作，精心组织施工，把该项目建成一个精品工程、示范工程、环保工程、廉政工程。 （朱金山）

description.hltext_display: "Lo que nos interesa a nosotros es cargarnos a Ana"
description.content:
Rafael Pastor (edil del PP): "Esto hay que tumbarlo en pleno".
Felicidad Peñalver (aún edil del PP): "Claro porque está contraviniendo parte de un acuerdo plenario".
R. P.: "Lo primero que hay que saber es qué opina de esto el resto de la oposición, es decir, no tenemos garantizado que el resto de la oposición apoyara lo que estamos haciendo".
F. P.: "No sé, tú eres la que ha hablado".
María del Carmen García Guillém (Toplabi): "Sí y Yolanda lo tiene muy claro".
R. P.: "Y Basseta y Nicolás".
M. C. G. G.: "Con Basseta y Nicolás no he hablado pero bueno, supongo que É".
R. P.: "Claro es que tenemos seis, ocho y luego nosotros tenemos que tener más apoyos, eso significa queÉ".
José Campoy (entonces, edil del PP): "No, yo estaba pensando que solo por empezar a mejorar o cambiar tienes la presidencia y la secretaríaÉ"
R. P.: "Y yo ya tengo mis dudas hasta en el sistema porque después de la encerrona, cuando nos trasladamos allí el viernes, se están moviendo mucho a nivel de afiliar gente para controlar el partido"
M. C. G. G.: "¡Pero Rafa! Y ¿vais a consentir que toda esta gentuza siga haciendo esto?"
R. P.: "Este es el tema en el que nosotros necesitamos empezar a controlar el partido".
M. C. G. G.: "Y no tirar "pa lante""
R. P.: "El intentar controlar el partido lo tenemos pensado, lo que pasa ahora es que se retrasa, todas las elecciones todos los ..."
F. P.: "No, se van a abril. A mí me lo dijo el otro día Carlos Mazón".
R. P.: "Pero han dicho de paralizar todo hasta después de las elecciones"
R. P.: "Pero las elecciones no son en marzo las Europeas. Carlos Mazón estuve yo hablando el viernes y me dijo que para abril, en cualquier caso yo lo veo complicado estando el tema como está"
J. O.: "El tema de controlar el partido depende de los finales de Mayte y Ana"
R. P.: "Lo que nos interesa a nosotros es cargarnos a Ana (Sarabia, ahora ex concejala), porque es la línea de flotación de Mayte, entonces si conseguimos eso creo que lo tenemos todo prácticamente"
F. P.: "Pero independientemente de eso en este asunto Ana no tiene nada que ver"
R. P.: "No en eso puede que no, pero es su línea de flotación, es que la única forma que tiene de dar el paso para tras Mayte es que Ana no esté, y no tenga con quién ampararse, porque no le queda con quién ampararse, porque ¿Miguel Ángel (Agüera, primer teniente de alcalde) sabes cómo lo tiene? A Miguel Ángel lo tiene pillado con algo porque por eso da una opinión aquí y luego cambia de opinión y Mayte lo tiene pillado con alguna cosa, con algo lo tiene que haber pillado porque no puede ser que hoy mantenga una postura y a continuación otra..."
J. O.: "Antes se ponía a hablar de tú a tú con Mayte y se la llevaba al huerto, hace ya meses que no"...
J. O.: "Miguel Ángel dice. Yo no se por qué estáis acojonados, que yo no tengo nada que esconder, entonces Ana (Sarabia) tiene más que perder. Habla con ella y convéncela"
R. P.: "Por eso te digo que el único concejal que le sirve de apoyo a Mayte es Ana. En el momento que le quitemos a Ana de enmedio, se queda desarbolada"...
Ángel García Guillém Toplabi): "Ya pero hay cosas para escarbar"
R. P.: "Ya, pero esa labor no nos corresponde a nosotros. En teoría, es la oposición de mierda esta que tenemos es la que tendría que estar haciendo el trabajo".

description.hltext_display: Balean y machetean a jóvenes
description.author: Noroeste / Redacción
description.content:
Dos jóvenes fueron agredidos con una pistola y con un machete en diferentes hechos
Noroeste / Redacción
NOTAS RELACIONADAS
Balean a vecino de Imala
Matan a dueño de un taller
Balean a vecino de Costa Rica
CULIACÁN._Dos jóvenes fueron agredidos con una pistola y con un machete en diferentes hechos en esta ciudad la tarde-noche del lunes, reportaron las fuerzas de seguridad.
De acuerdo con informes de la Dirección de Seguridad Pública Municipal, en el primer hecho registrado a las 17:29 horas en la sindicatura Eldorado, resultó herido José Antonio González Terán, de 20 años, con domicilio en la colonia Cuchilla, en esa comunidad.
El joven dijo a los uniformados que cuando se encontraba en su domicilio, se presentaron dos personas de estatura baja, de tez morena, quienes lo agredieron con un tubo, con las manos y con un machete, provocándole una herida en la mano izquierda, además de golpes en distintas partes del cuerpo.
Los sujetos huyeron del lugar, mientras que González Terán fue llevado en un vehículo particular a un hospital en Eldorado, donde quedó internado
Alrededor de las 23:14 horas las autoridades policiacas recibieron un reporte en el que les alertaban sobre una persona herida de bala en las instalaciones de la Cruz Roja, en el Centro.
El lesionado fue identificado como Moisés Márquez Rojo, de 25 años, con domicilio en la colonia Libertad.

description.hltext_display: Nuova Toyota Yaris
description.author: borgomeo
description.content:
Grandi novità per la Yaris che si appresta a debuttare anche sul nostro mercato con un modello completamente nuovo. “Il modello della riscossa” come lo hanno definito alla stessa Toyota, facendo riferimenti – neanche troppo velati – al macello successo con i richiami.
La macchina è stata appena presentata in mondovisione a Yokohama dal quartier generale della Toyota e i colleghi giapponesi sono rimasti davvero impressionati. Non tanto per il nuovo look (ormai nessuno si emoziona più per nulla), ma soprattutto “per la qualità percepita che appare su un altro pianeta rispetto al passato”. In Giappone, si sa, la Yaris si chiama Vitz, ma le macchine sono identiche e questa particolare attenzione per la qualità appare un chiaro segnale del fatto che Toyota abbia intenzione di spingere al massimo le vendite in Europa. Un mercato ricco dove qualità e finiture sono di fondamentale importanza per “sfondare”.
Da segnalare anche il prezzo che in Giappone è stato annunciato in appena 1.060 Yen, quasi un record visto che siamo ben al di sotto del listino del vecchio modello. Probabile quindi che anche da noi la nuova Yaris costerà meno della precedente versione.
Ma torniamo alla macchina: il design propone una fiancata e una coda che riprendono gli stilemi delle vecchie Yaris, ma il frontale è invece completamente rivisto, ora molto più squadrato e aggressivo, con alcuni elementi comuni con la Aygò e la Urban Cruiser: il family feeling è assicurato, ma anche quella necessaria immagine di novità che i clienti si aspettano dalla piccola Toyota.
Inediti anche gli interni, l’elettronica di bordo e le sospensioni, mentre per quanto riguarda i motori non è ancora certo quale unità monteranno le versioni destinate al mercato europeo. Vedremo. description.hltext_display: Santa makes an epic journey - to Nepal
description.content:
Kathmandu - Four years after the Hindu kingdom of Nepal became a secular republic where Christians no longer face state persecution, guess who is making an epic journey here this Christmas? It's good old Santa Claus.
Santa Claus has exchanged his reindeer-drawn sleigh for a boat, tractor, rickshaw and all the other indigenous contraptions that ply on Nepal's roads and lakes, and his sack contains unusual gifts: an artificial leg, a wheelchair and a physiotherapist.
Santa comes to Nepal courtesy International Nepal Fellowship (INF), Nepal's longest-serving international non-governmental organisation that works among people with HIV/AIDS, TB, leprosy and disabilities.
The Christian mission, which began working in Nepal from 1952 after a pro-democracy movement made the kingdom open its borders to the world, has created a three-minute video film, "Santa visits INF in Nepal".
The film celebrates the spirit of Christmas - that it is more blessed to give than receive - and promotes worldwide the unusual INF gift catalogue, that is available online.
For as little as $8, you can buy a "life-changing" gift and make an enormous difference to some one's life: like a walking frame made of local material that will help a differently abled Nepali child to walk. For $65, you can gift two piglets to a leprosy or HIV survivor, who can battle social stigma by becoming economically independent through pig-farming.
Other gifts are artificial legs, self-care kits for leprosy patients, materials for a toilet, and even transport from remote mountainous areas to hospital for medical care.
The Santa film was conceived and made by Matt Watson, a 32-year-old New Zealander currently working in INF's graphics division in Kathmandu. It shows Santa's epic journey by boat, tractor, microlite, Land Rover, bicycle, car, 'tuk-tuk' and rickshaw to reach Kathmandu, from where he proceeds to INF's Green Pastures Hospital in Pokhara, the first hospital in western Nepal, and the nearby INF Primary Study Centre.
On the way, he faces great challenges, especially from a herd of buffaloes who see red at his attire. However, he overcomes all obstacles to deliver his gifts: nutritious food to patients at the hospital, an artificial leg and a wheelchair.
"The film is being seen on YouTube and the INF web site," says Marin Hickey, INF's communications director. "It has also been shown in different places around the world, including churches in Australia, New Zealand, Canada and the UK and in a school in Finland. It has been shared by many people on Facebook."
Shot in Kathmandu and in and around Pokhara, the Santa film has two Nepali men playing the gift-giver. During the shooting, Hickey says everyone had a lot of fun.
"People stopped the crew in the street to take photos of Santa Claus with themselves (and) the clients involved (also) thoroughly enjoyed themselves, as is clear in the video," he adds.
Before it was allowed to enter Nepal, INF worked among the Nepali diaspora in India. Hickey says it became a registered organisation in India in 1943, when it was involved in health work among Nepalis in Nautanwa in Uttar Pradesh.
Despite the tight rein on Christian organisations till the second pro-democracy movement in Nepal in 1990, he says INF enjoyed a very positive relationship with Nepal's government.
"INF works in Nepal with the agreement of the government's Social Welfare Council, and the agreement is re-negotiated every five years," he says. "INF's relationship with Nepal's government was positive before 2006 (when Nepal became secular) and has remained positive."

description.hltext_display: Hvid jul kan give trafikbøvl
description.author: Pauli Andersen
description.content:
Snestorm gør julen hvid og udsigterne til julebesøg sorte. Efter nogle dages usikkerhed om prognoserne, er meteorologerne nu så godt som sikre. Et lavtryk går øst om Danmark og reder op til kulde, kuling og dynetykke snemængder under den danske jul. Dermed kan meteorologerne notere en ny vejrrekord i de tykke bøger over det danske vejr. For første gang siden vejrmålingerne startede i 1870, får danskerne hvid jul to år i træk.
Sneen, der ledsages af hård vind og fygning, rammer først og fremmest det østlige Danmark, hvor bornholmerne kan vente helt op til 20 centimeter tør frostsne, mens sjællænderne kun får lidt mindre. Snefaldet sætter ind natten til torsdag, fortsætter hele torsdagen og tager først af natten til fredag. Det bliver mindre omfattende for indbyggerne i landets nordvestlige dele, og i Vendsyssel er det ikke sikkert, der falder noget overhovedet.
Men det englehvide lys over landskabet og det veltimede grundlag for juleferiekælkere og skiløbere kan få vejtrafikken til at glide lidt for glat, for sneen falder i bunker netop på en af landets helt store rejsedage, nemlig på torsdag - lillejuleaften. Og prognoserne om det massive snefald og udbredt fygning har allerede fået Vejdirektoratet til at råde danskere, der skal på julebesøg, til at tage af sted så tidligt på ugen, det kan lade sig gøre. Direktoratet advarer om, at snevejret på torsdag generelt kan gøre betingelserne for bilisterne meget vanskelige.
»Det er vigtigt at høre trafikmeldinger og læse på nettet, så man ved, hvad der venter, og om det er forsvarligt at køre ud. Måske skal man i stedet blive hjemme eller tage toget, siger vagtchef Majbritt Strojek fra direktoratet til Ritzau.
Flere med tog
Noget tyder på, at mange danskere allerede har overvejet den mulighed. I hvert fald kan DSB notere flere reservationer på afgangene i perioden op til og efter jul og nytår. 36 procent af pladserne i juletogene er reserverede mod 29 procent for samme periode sidste år. Lillejuleaften har danskerne reserveret 55 procent af de 43.000 pladser, der er i togene mellem landsdelene, oplyser DSB, der har aflyst enkelte regionaltoge men til gengæld indsat ekstra tog mellem København og Århus 22. december.
Også SAS er parat til at transportere julegæster, der fravælger bilturen.
»Vi er fortrøstningsfulde og regner med at flyve nogenlunde normalt. Det er gået fornuftigt indtil nu, men vejret kan jo blive så voldsomt, at det kan give os nogle store udfordringer med at undgå forsinkelser. Og alene den uregelmæssige flytrafik fra London til Kastrup kan få afsmittende effekt på indenrigsafgangene,« siger kommunikationschef i SAS, Mikkel Thrane.
Han opfordrer passagerer til at følge den aktuelle situation på SAS.dk eller SAS på Facebook.
Mens sneen kan gøre livet surt for de, der skal køre langt tegner julevejret bedre for folk, der skal rende langt. Københavns Skiklub melder om optimalt glatte veje for de langrendsløbere, der måtte tilbringe en del af juleferien på præparerede løjper i Gribskov, Jonstrup Vang, Rudeskov eller andre af de langrendsspor, klubben har banet i det nordsjællandske.

description.hltext_display: PKK'nın eski kara kutusundan şok iddia
description.content:
Nizamettin Taş, PKK'nın 2004 yılından sonra bilerek ya da bilmeyerek Ergenekon'un hizmetine girdiğini iddia etti.Habertürk'ten Zülfikar Ali Aydın'ın sorularını yanıtlayan Taş, çarpıcı iddialarda bulundu. Gazete Taş'ın 'PKK Kürtler'den özür dilemeli' sözünü manşetine çekti.HÜKÜMETİ ZOR GÜNLER BEKLİYORHükümeti zor bir dönem beklediğini söyleyen Taş, hükümetin Mart ayına kadar örgütün söylemini boşa çıkaracak adımlar atmazsa PKK silah kullanarak hükümeti düşürmek isteyeceğini savundu.
Nizamettin Taş kimdir?Kuzey Irak'ta Erbil kentinde yaşayan PKK'nın eski yöneticisi Nizamettin Taş, yaklaşık 30yıl önce katıldığı PKK içinde 20 yıl örgütün silahlı gruplarını yönetti. 2004 yılında silahı reddederek örgütten ayrıldı ve PKK'nın birkaç eski yöneticiyle Yurtsever Demokratik Parti'yi (PWD) kurdu.
İNANDIRICI DEĞİLLEREski örgütüne ağır sözlerle yüklenen Taş,'ın şu sözleri dikkat çekiciydi: "30 yıl PKK içinde kaldım. "Aykırı bir kelime edersem başıma ne gelir" diye düşünüyorsam, böyle bir örgütün özgürlük isteği inandırıcı olamaz. PKK'nın ve Öcalan'ın önce Kürtler'den sonra da Türklerden özür dilemesi lazım.""2004'teki PKK kongresinde normal olmayan şeylerin yaşandı ve PKK savaş kararı aldı" diyen Taş, şu iddiası çok konuşulacak:"O dönemde AK Parti Ergenekon denilen derin devlet arasında çatışma vardı. AK Parti'nin tasfiyesi için PKK devreye sokuldu. PKK'nın savaş kararı alması otomotik olarak PKK'yı AK Parti'ye karşı Ergenekon'un darbe girişiminin aracısı haline getirdi.KANDİL'E ASKERİ HELİKOPTERİki avukatı kongre sürecini Öcalan'ın talimatıyla belirledi. Bizzat tanık olduğum şeyler var. Öcalan'ın avukatlarını bir seferinde Kandil'e askeri helikopter getirdi. Örgüt içinde de biliniyor. O iki avukatla birlikte bir çok avukat, örgütteki görüş ayrılığı nedeniyle aylarca kamplarda kaldılar. Musul ve Bağdat'ta benimle ve karşı taraftaki isimlerle görüştüler. Örgüt içindeki çelişkiler çıkınca, örgütten ayrılmadım ama Musul ve Bağdat'a gittim. Öcalan'ın iki avukatı benimle görüşmek için Musul'a geldi. Diğerleriyle (Murat Karayılan, Cemil Bayık) görüşmek için de Kandil'e gittiler. Öcalan'ın "Görüş ayrılığı olabilir. İki hizip olsun ama bana bağlı kalsınlar" mesajını getirdiler. Örgüt yapısı bize yakın olduğu için kaldım. Öcalan'ın iki avukatıyla beraber araçla Musul'dan Kandil'e döndük. Sonra avukatlar yeniden Kandil'e geldi.DANIŞIKLI DÖVÜŞÖcalan'ın talimatını getirdiler. "Örgüt yönetimini dondurdum. Tek yetkili avukatlarımdır" diyordu. Avukatlar yetkileri aldı. Bütün birlikleri va kampları gezerek toplantı yapmaya başladılar. Örgüt kadrolarına neden savaş kararı alınması gerektiğini anlattılar. Bu yaklaşık iki ay sürdü. O toplantılardan sonra PKK kongresi yapıldı. Savaş kararına karşı çıktık. Bir avukat "Burada başkanı temsil ediyorum. Başkanın kararıdır" dedi. O karar çıktıktan sonra kongre tutanaklarıyla çektiğimiz görüntüleri alıp devlete teslim ettiler.Sonra bu olay için "Habur'dan geçerken daha önce bizi hiç aramıyorlardı. Bu sefer aradılar ve görüntülere el koydular" dediler.

description.hltext_display: 県対ガン協会に検診車
重庆黔恩高速公路重庆段正式开工
Ana Sarabia denuncia en Fiscalía a tres ediles del PP por "intentar pactar una contrata"
description.content:
Ana Sarabia, ex concejala del PP de Ibi, presentó ayer una denuncia ante la Fiscalía de Alicante para que se investigue la actuación de tres concejales de su partido, Rafael Pastor, José Antonio Onsurbe y Felicidad Peñalver, al considerar que urdieron una trama con directivos de la constructora Toplabi para que se le otorgara un plan parcial que se le había retirado. Sarabia, que ahora milita en el CDL, ha aportado a la Fiscalía la grabación de una conversación entre los tres ediles y María del Carmen García Guillén y Ángel García Guillém, propietarios de la citada promotora.
Sarabia cree que esta grabación, que está aportada en otro proceso judicial, supone la prueba "del montaje que se montó para tirarme a mí, y creo que es una prueba importante". En concreto, la ex edil, que tuvo que dimitir por su gestión como concejal de Deportes en el Polideportivo -por la que está imputada en el juzgado-, entiende que los tres ediles pueden haber cometido delitos de tráfico de influencias, coacciones y revelación de secretos.
La grabación, que explica ha sido obtenida "anónimamente", recoge conversaciones mantenidas por los tres concejales citados en enero de 2009, justo en la época en que Peñalver fue cesada en sus funciones y expulsada del grupo del PP; más tarde, Rafael Pastor -que es primo de la alcaldesa Mayte Parra- sería destituido de sus delegaciones, y recientemente José Antonio Onsurbe fue igualmente relevado tras ser denunciado por extorsión por un empresario.
En la reunión, los tres ediles y la dirección de Toplabi trataron de buscar fórmulas para conseguir revocar la retirada del plan parcial NPR-3, que le había sido adjudicada, pero luego revocada por el gobierno de Mayte Parra tras una sentencia del TSJ. Hay que significar que Peñalver era la abogada de la constructora.
Según el texto de la denuncia, en la conversación se hace referencia a que ante la imposibilidad de que "claudicaran los técnicos del Ayuntamiento y la alcaldesa Mayte Parra", se urdió "un plan perfectamente concertado para obtener una resolución injusta a sabiendas, pero favorable a la promotora y conseguir mediante "amaños políticos o de otro orden con la oposición", una coyuntura favorable a sus propios intereses".
El escrito entregado a la Fiscalía, y a cuyo contenido ha tenido acceso este diario, refiere que en la aludida conversación se estudió "intentar llevar la propuesta a un pleno extraordinario, que no necesitara la mayoría absoluta en el orden del día, a petición si fuera necesario de la oposición, donde no asistirían los interlocutores, con la consiguiente minoría del Grupo Popular y la aprobación como agente urbanizador de T0plabi, así como instar una manifestación de presuntos afectados, con el objeto de que Mayte Parra no tenga otra opción que aceptar la propuesta".
La denuncia también recoge que estas cinco personas intentaron "si fuera posible, instar la destitución de Mayte Parra, con el objeto de poder obtener todos los beneficios que otorga el poder, así como articular frente a la dicente una denuncia a la Fiscalía, incluso con conocimiento por parte de Felicidad Pañalver, de que los hechos podrían no ser constitutivos de delito", extremo que forma parte de la grabación.
Ante esto, Sarabia afirma en su escrito que "ante la imposibilidad de que la señora alcaldesa ni los técnicos del Ayuntamiento cambien su criterio, se diseña por los empresarios y por su letrado-concejal en su propio beneficio, con la colaboración activa de otros concejales, un plan para alterar una resolución municipal, valiéndose de información privilegiada, proponiendo incluso "llegar a las masas" para que éstas presionen a la alcaldesa, sobre el nombramniento de Promociones Toplabi como agente urbanizador".
Por todo ello, solicita a la Fiscalía que investigue y esclarezca los hechos, por si fueran constitutivos de delito. En la denuncia, se ha aportado la grabación, que forma parte del sumario de una denuncia contra varios técnicos municipales y que tramita un juzgado de Ibi, así como documentación con acuerdos municipales.

description.hltext_display: Fiat 500 TwinAir
description.content:
Fiat's new 500 TwinAir is powered by a technologically advanced, low consumption 875cc two-cylinder engine.
The TwinAir is the cleanest quantity production petrol engine in the world. Yet it still manages to combine a rev-happy fun appeal with significantly more power than larger capacity four cylinder units. The 85bhp version of this engine debuts under the bonnet of the Fiat 500. Installing a two-cylinder engine in a 500 might seem like paying homage to the original 13 bhp model of 1957, but this decision is not primarily a sentimental one.In complete compliance with the essential requirements of the 21st Century car owner, the TwinAir engine offers an attractive means of downsizing while substantially reducing fuel consumption and exhaust emissions, but without sacrificing power or driver enjoyment.Combined with the Fiat 500's many other attributes, this impressive powertrain is expected to appeal to a wide variety of customers including many who may not have considered Fiat before. Those who care about the environment will find the TwinAir's low CO2 figure appealing, as will owners who are keen to keep costs down. Consequently more than a fifth of future Fiat 500 sales are forecast to be TwinAir versions.Weighing just 85kg, and with figures of 95g/km of CO2, this ground-breaking engine has the lowest emissions of any quantity production petrol engine. However its 85bhp makes the among the most powerful mainstream A segment vehicles on sale. And with its 145Nm of torque at a relatively low 1900rpm, it's a responsive and fun-to-drive engine too. This combination of cleanliness and power even compares favourably with many rivals' diesel engines.Compared with Fiat's best-selling 1.2-litre petrol engine in the Fiat 500, the TwinAir delivers 23 per cent more power yet combines this with a 15 per cent reduction in CO2 emissions and fuel consumption.Combining MultiAir with a turbocharger helps to optimise performance at low revs while reductions in weight and size help boost performance and responsiveness. In addition, the timing chain drastically cuts engine running costs because it is maintenance-free. Finally, a balancing countershaft reduces vibrations to give the smoothness and refinement of a four-cylinder.This technology comes in a Fiat 500 that is already firmly established on the motoring landscape. And it features all the assets that have made this car such a hit. There's a choice of slick-shifting manual change five-speed gearboxes alongside the Dualogic robotised manual. This allows drivers who want automatic shifting to prompt changes simply by pushing or pulling the gear lever.There's an extensive list of standard equipment including the all-important safety suite of ABS anti-lock brakes and Electronic Brakeforce Distribution, which along with seven airbags, have helped the Fiat 500 become EuroNCAP crash safety five-star rated.The high-tech Fiat 500 TwinAir is also competitively priced, costing from 10,665 in Pop specification.

description.hltext_display: El Congreso tumba la ley antidescargas
description.author: Otr-Press
description.content:
Internautas contrarios a la norma Sinde atacaron masivamente a las webs del Congreso y la SGAE
Otr-Press, Madrid 22/12/2010
Comente esta noticia
Enviar Imprimir A+ A-
Congreso. Zapatero y Rubalcaba, ayer en la Cámara
La Comisión de Economía y Hacienda del Congreso rechazó la disposición final segunda de la Ley de Economía Sostenible, conocida como ‘ley Sinde, que permitiría cerrar páginas webs por vulnerar derechos de propiedad intelectual. El PSOE no encontró apoyos entre los distintos grupos parlamentarios para aprobar el texto, que ha desaparecido del proyecto. La votación fue aplazada hasta ayer martes por la noche, después del pleno del Congreso, por problemas en el cuardernillo de votación. La ministra de Cultura, Ángeles González-Sinde, defendió la disposición de nuevo ayer por la mañana en el Senado, mientras que ya por la tarde apeló, sin éxito, al “buen criterio de los políticos” para su aprobación. Además, las protestas continuaron en forma de ataques masivos contra las ‘webs’ del Congreso y la SGAE. La página del PSOE, sin embargo, era la única que resistía a los bloqueos y, de hecho, cambió su portada para explicar la disposición.
La ‘ley Sinde’ se cayó de la Ley de Economía Sostenible gracias a los 20 votos de la oposición frente a los 18 del PSOE. Tras nueve horas de retraso sobre la hora fijada de votación y negociaciones ‘in extremis’, el PSOE se quedó solo finalmente, ni CIU ni tampoco los nacionalistas canarios y vascos, sus socios parlamentarios, apoyaron a los socialistas en el Congreso. El proyecto de Ley irá ahora al Senado, en donde se debatirá el próximo 18 de enero, primer pleno de la Cámara Alta.
CiU, PNV y el PP ya anunciaron por la mañana en el Congreso de los Diputados que rechazarían la Disposición adicional segunda de la Ley de Economía Sostenible, conocida como la Ley Sinde que permitiría cerrar páginas ‘web’ por vulnerar derechos de propiedad intelectual. Nacionalistas catalanes y vascos, además del PP, se aseguraron que sumarían al rechazo de ERC-IU-ICV.
Por su parte, CiU explicó que para su formación lo relevante es “buscar el equilibrio” entre la defensa de la propiedad intelectual y que sea “compatible” con las nuevas tecnologías. Al respecto, el portavoz del PNV, Josu Erkoreka, aseguró que su grupo pediría por “separado” la votación de la Ley de Economía Sostenible y la disposición sobre la Ley Sinde, sobre esta última se muestran “negativamente” ante esta medida “por motivos de forma y fondo” y porque la solución del Ministerio de Cultura, “no es la idónea”.
En este sentido, precisó que era necesario “reflexionar mucho más sobre la convergencia de las nuevas tecnologías con la defensa de la propiedad intelectual, ambos bienes dignos de ser protegidos por el ordenamiento jurídico”. Además, hace un año se constituyó una subcomisión “con la misión de estudiar por parte de los grupos parlamentarios la reforma integral de la ley de propiedad intelectual a efectos de adaptarla a los requerimientos de la sociedad del conocimiento”.
Finalmente, el PP, a través de su portavoz en la Cámara Baja, Soraya Sáenz de Santamaría, señaló que el primer partido de la oposición no apoyaría la Ley Sinde si la enmienda que registró a ese texto era rechazada. De hecho, presentaron una alternativa “equilibrada” porque protege la propiedad intelectual y aboga por buscar un procedimiento que dé todo tipo de garantías a los internautas.
La ministra de Cultura, Ángeles González Sinde, volvía a defender ayer durante una comparecencia en el Senado que España es “el único país de nuestro entorno que vive en la era de internet con la misma legislación que hace 20 años se empleaba para el consumo analógico, y el único que tiene un ADSL potente y unas reglas de juego enclenques e inexistentes, y eso es insostenible”.
Así, declaró que quien sostiene que la Disposición Segunda de la Ley de Economía Sostenible ataca a la libertad de expresión, “o no sabe lo que es la libertad de expresión, o no conoce la ley”. Por ello, pidió a los miembros de la cámara que contribuyeran a combatir esa “demagogia” y que ayudaran a proteger los derechos de los creadores, porque “ahí estará la verdadera libertad de expresión”.

description.hltext_display: Lehman-Pleite: Ernst & Young wird verklagt
description.content: Die Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft Ernst & Young muss sich für ihre laschen Kontrollen bei der pleitegegangenen US-Investmentbank Lehman Brothers verantworten. Mehr als zwei Jahre nach dem Zusammenbruch von Lehman hat die New Yorker Staatsanwaltschaft Anklage gegen die Prüfer erhoben.

description.hltext_display: NCB네트웍스, SiC·사파이어잉곳 장비 시장 진출
description.content: 광고 [지디넷코리아]NCB네트웍스(대표 허대영)는 사파이어와 차세대 소재인 탄화규소(SiC) 잉곳 장비를 생산하기 위해 싱가포르 인텔로그와 계약을 체결했다고 22일 발표했다. 이번 계약은 장비를 생산하기 위해 NCB네트웍스와 인텔로그가 각 300만 달러를 출자해 자본총액 600만 달러 규모(지분 5대5)의 조인트 벤처를 설립한다. 2011년 3월부터 생산을 시작, 국내외에 사파이어 잉곳 성장 장비를 우선 공급할 예정이다. 인텔로그는 러시아 국영연구소(EZAN)와 공동으로 초코라스키 공법과 키로플러스 공법의 장점만을 취해 반자동화 장비를 개발했다. 이 장비는 30kg(4인치), 60kg(6인치)급으로 개발했으며, 향후 완전자동화를 추진할 계획이다. 러시아 국영연구소(EZAN)는 1973년 러시아 국영 연구소 겸 공장으로 설립됐다. 사파이어 잉곳 제조 장비를 설립 초기부터 공급했다. 최근에는 탄화규소(SiC) 잉곳 제조장비를 개발했다. SiC 소재는 지식경제부에서 미래시장을 선점할 10대 핵심소재로 선정된 것으로 실리콘과 탄소의 화학 반응으로 만들어지기 때문에 고효율 및 대용량 고전압에 쓸 수 있다. 또한 고온에서도 기존 형태를 유지하기 때문에 전기적 신호를 전달할 때 안전해서 '꿈의 반도체 소재'라고 불려지고 있지만 현재 100% 수입에 의존하고 있는 실정이다. NCB네트웍스는 이번 계약으로 주요 핵심소재 부문의 제조장비 부문에 진출할 수 있게돼 기존의 LED와 AMOLED 광학 검사장비부문과 함께 소재 장비 부문이 새로운 캐시카우 역할을 할 것으로 기대하고 있다. [관련기사]☞ ☞ ☞ 이설영 기자 (ronia@zdnet.co.kr)▶ 글로벌 IT의 중심 언론 메가뉴스▶ IT뉴스는 , 게임트렌드는 게임스팟코리아▶ 스마트폰으로 읽는 실시간 IT뉴스 모바일지디넷[저작권자ⓒ메가뉴스 & ZDNet & CNET. 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Çocuklarda parmak emme normal mi?
description.content:
Uzmanlara göre bebeklerde ‘parmak emme’ olağan bir durum. Ancak 4 yaş sonrasında devam ederse psikolojik bir soruna da işaret edebiliyor
Parmak emme çocuklarda psikolojik bir etken olmaksızın 3-4 yaşa kadar görülen ve olağan kabul edilen bir durum. Sanıldığı gibi beslenmeye bağlı veya açlık kaynaklı değil. Ağızdan haz alındığı için parmak emme, psikolojik doyum da sağlıyor.
Bu nedenle 1 yaş civarı çocukların neredeyse yarısı parmaklarını emiyor. 18’inci ayda parmak emme sıklaşıyor ve 3-4 yaşına kadar normal kabul ediliyor. Acıbadem Fulya Hastanesi Çocuk Sağlığı ve Hastalıkları Uzmanı Dr. Demet Matben, “Çocuğunuz 4-5 yaşlarına geldiğinde parmak emme alışkanlığı devam ettiği takdirde ona bu davranışının çocukça olduğunu anlayabileceği bir dille anlatmanız gerek. Ancak eğer 5-6 yaş sonrasında sorun devam ediyorsa hayatında ne gibi kaygı etmenleri bulunduğunu iyi araştırın ve gerekirse bir uzmandan yardım alın” uyarısında bulunuyor.
Bebeklerin bu alışkanlığı genelde anne karnında başlıyor. Dr. Matben, “Bebek yaşamak için emmek zorunda. 4-5 aylık oluncaya kadar sadece emerek besleniyor. Anne babalar parmak emmenin bir hastalık olmadığını bilmeli. Önlemek için uygun pozisyonda besleyin. Emzirirken veya biberonla beslerken göğsünüzün sıcaklığını duyacak şekilde kendinize yaklaştırın. Memeden erken kesmemeye çalışın. Batıl fikirlerle korkutmayın. Parmağını ağzına götürdüğü zaman zararsız acı mayi sürülebilir veya ellerine eldiven takabilirsiniz.

description.hltext_display: きょうは冬至 ゆず湯
Causan baja 30 agentes por falla confianza y por drogas
description.author: Manuel Laguna
description.content:
CULIACÁN._Treinta de los 190 agentes de la Secretaría de Seguridad Pública y Tránsito Municipal que durante esta administración han causado baja, es porque no aprobaron los exámenes de control de confianza o dieron positivo en las pruebas toxicológicas, dio a conocer el General de División en retiro, Antelmo Jiménez Jiménez.
En la actualidad, dijo el titular de la SSPyTM, en la Comisión de Honor y Justicia se manejan ocho casos de antidoping de tránsitos y policías preventivos.
"Cuando estos elementos son dados de baja, inmediatamente quedan registrados en el Sistema de Seguridad Pública a nivel nacional, por lo tanto, automáticamente ese elemento ya no puede causar alta en ninguna corporación del país".
Tras ser cuestionado sobre la incidencia de asaltos bancarios, afirmó que el aspecto de la seguridad ha sido un tema conversado con los gerentes de bancos, donde la DSPM está al pendiente de cualquier situación, sin embargo, las alertas no están llegando a tiempo.
"Es un problema que tenemos, o bien cuando pasa algo no nos permiten ingresar al lugar, pero también existe otra situación, la cual tiene que ver con las políticas de las instituciones bancarias, sobre todo de no colocar las famosas puertas de exclusa, ya que cuando menos eso minimizaría al delincuente".
En ese sentido, Jiménez Jiménez dijo desconocer la razón por la cuál esas instituciones operan bajo ese tipo de políticas.
RECONOCEN A TRÁNSITOS
Un total de 37 agentes de la Dirección de Tránsito Municipal fueron reconocidos por 15, 20 y más de 25 años de servicio en la corporación vial, y se entregaron otros 27 reconocimientos especiales a 27 agentes ya jubilados.

description.hltext_display: Sam Donnellon: How Vick's trainer helped rejuvenate his career
description.author: Sam Donnellon
description.content:
When Anderson first began training Michael Vick last February, Vick had been a plodding, doubting, ex-starting quarterback, unable to shake off 17 months of prison life and natural aging, unsure he ever would. For most of their time together, Vick saw Anderson as a nice and well-meaning guy - "very spiritual," Vick said - but with some wacky exercise ideas.
And then it happened. "The cone drill," Vick said. "All of a sudden, it was there again. That's when I got myself back." "It was a Sunday," said Anderson. "He comes toward me and I pushed the pads to my right. He went by me and I looked to see where he was and it was like 10 yards down. Literally, a blur. "I turned to my wife, who knew nothing about sports. And I said, 'Lisa, did you see that?' "And she said, 'Did you see that?' "He walked back and said, 'Coach, I'm starting to feel like me now.' "And I said, 'Pow pow. Gotcha.' " Tom Anderson is a pow, pow, gotcha kind of guy. Wiry and well-fit, sentences dart from his mouth as if part of his workouts, as if you could work on ballistics and plyometrics and all of his other training concepts through cadence, too.
Originally from Ardmore, he is 48 and a highly successful high school track coach at Landstown High School in Virginia Beach. He's also an assistant to head football coach Tom Reamon, who was once Vick's high school coach in nearby Newport News.
A former NFL player and, briefly, a coach, Reamon runs a successful football camp that has, over the years, attracted some big names. But when Vick's agent, Joel Segal, called looking for names after last season had ended, Reamon aimed him toward Anderson rather than better known - and more expensive - trainers such as Tom Shaw. "I've been around all those guys," Reamon said. "I've seen talented people. None better than Tom. He comes right at you. And he's got a tremendous work ethic." Anderson had a resume. It just wasn't lengthy or full of big names. The biggest was Percy Harvin, the Vikings wide receiver and last year's NFL rookie of the year. Harvin played and ran for Anderson at Landstown, and it was Anderson who helped the oft-injured receiver strengthen himself into a running back during his years at the University of Florida.
A Baptist deacon, Anderson also has helped Harvin grow up. Raised by his mother and sister, Harvin had anger-management issues in high school, incurring suspensions in football and technicals in basketball until he was finally barred from competing in track his senior year. Then came the positive marijuana test at the NFL combines, which dropped Harvin down in the draft, all the way to 22.
He has been trouble-free since. "Not a bad kid," Anderson said. "He just needed to control his emotions. And make better decisions." Anderson came to a similar conclusion about Vick after their first meeting. A self-described "dog lover" who had a German Shepherd as a kid and owns a Labrador Retriever now, he, like many, was grossed out reading about the torture of dogs by Vick and others at the Bad Newz Kennels. Anderson said his own mother at first was angry with him when she learned he would be working with him. "My concern was this," he said. "If you did these kind of things to animals, what kind of human being are you?" Through a long, soul-searching and heart-wrenching first meeting, and subsequent conversations after that, Anderson said he found out: Vick's regret is genuine, he believes, as is his resolve toward the future. "I wasn't a great kid either," Anderson said. "My upbringing was full of mistakes that just weren't made public. And I told him that. I told him, 'Mike, everyone has made bad decisions.' The Bible is full of those people. But God is using you now. The gifts that you have, you can reach an audience of people that other people can't." Anderson said he was arrested once, had the cuffs put on, once ducked under his father's fist as it blew a hole in the wall behind him after getting disciplined at Lower Merion. The late Tom Anderson Sr. was the track coach there for more than 20 years, and what he told his son that day has carried with him throughout the rest of his life. "That's my name," he said. "That's your name. Don't you ever embarrass it again." It's a point he has made with Harvin, and Vick as well - especially after a birthday party for Vick ended with one of his co-defendants being shot in the parking lot. Although Vick left before that, he was involved in an altercation that potentially could have ended his comeback before Anderson's impact could be seen. "Sometimes we get selfish," said Anderson. "Sometimes we think of ourselves and in the moment. Think about your little girls. Think about your son. When you're hurting out there, and things are difficult, take it away from yourself and think about them." At first, Vick said, he wasn't quite sure about Anderson. He had never seen some of these exercises, and at least some of them seemed silly and unproductive. "We had to learn to trust in each other," Vick said, but really, he had to learn to trust Anderson.
Anderson spent much of the first session calling him out. And the next and the next and the next. There were between 15 and 20 sessions over a 3-month period. At other times, in Philadelphia and in Virginia Beach, Vick worked out on his own, but when he and Anderson got together, the workouts became increasingly exhausting, designed to mimic the rigors of a 65-play football game, in which Vick had not participated in more than 3 years. "The thing that I got to respect about Tom is that he wasn't afraid," said Vick. "Wasn't afraid to tell me what to do and what not to do. You know, a lot of people I've worked with in the past kind of felt intimidated and wouldn't tell me what they really thought. They wanted to always make sure they could salvage the relationship - tell you what you wanted to hear not what you needed to hear." Anderson explained every exercise, or at least tried to. He had designed what he called "a salad," a program that tried to increase balance and strength as it increased speed. In one, Vick high-stepped through sand, repeatedly threw a medicine ball over his head, then finished by repeatedly banging on a truck tire with a sledgehammer. "Then do plyometrics, then a donkey kick back and forth," Anderson said. "And it's grueling. I would see him and he would want to stop and I would say this isn't about you. This is about your kids. This is about that next contract. "I remember we were doing hurdle work. And working on his hip flexors, which were tight in their mobility. He struggled. He would hit hurdles. At first I had to make him go back and do it again. But it got to the point where he would tell me, 'I'm going back to do it again.' " Some exercises were given names. Some became fodder to lighten the mood. When Anderson attached bands from one leg to another for a core drill one day, Vick feigned psychological fear, joked that they felt too much like prison shackles. "We got close," Anderson said. "So we could kid around like that." "He understood the big picture," Vick said. "And that was making me a better player. Restoring my strength, my speed, my abilities and bringing them back to the surface. He had a game plan." It worked, of course. Vick is again squirting out of trouble and creating it for opponents. He's never been smarter, or more accurate, or, as Sunday's comeback against the Giants underlines, more resilient.
Anderson said he could see the difference right from the beginning, in the first-game loss to Green Bay. But he admits his jaw dropped a few times when the Eagles pounded Washington in mid-November, and his texts to his pupil and friend have become shorter and less analytical as this off-the-charts season has progressed. "Wow!" he texted him after that Redskins game. "All our hard work paid off," was Vick's response. "I just know everything we did pretty much was efficient, effective and still helps me to this day," Vick said. "I really look forward to working with him this offseason." Send e-mail to donnels@phillynews.com.
For recent columns, go to
http://go.philly.com/donnellon.

description.hltext_display: Long-Hebel: OMV-Call mit 153% Tradingchance
description.content:
Long-Hebel OMV-Call mit 153% Tradingchance
Autor: Walter Kozubek
Ausgewählte Long-Hebelprodukte können bereits bei einem relativ geringen Kursanstieg der OMV-Aktie für einen Gewinn von mehr als 150% sorgen.
Laut Analyse von X-pressTrade, dem täglich erscheinenden Newsletter für Trader, könnte der Kurs der OMV-Aktie über beträchtliches Kurspotenzial verfügen. Hier die Analyse:
„Versorger zählten 2010 zu den Underperformern, so auch OMV. Doch der Blick auf den Wochenchart verspricht Besserung, denn Anfang Dezember 2010 wurde der langfristige Aufwärtstrend bestätigt. Zudem bewährte sich die 40-Wochen-Linie als Unterstützung. Nach dem Anstieg über das Zwischenhoch bei 29,35 Euro hat die Aktie nun Luft bis zum Widerstand bei 32,20/32,74 Euro. Ein Ausbruch über diese Barriere würde Aufwärtspotenzial bis zum Widerstandsbereich um 40,00 Euro eröffnen. Stopps bieten sich um 25,80 Euro an.“
Auch zu Beginn des heutigen Handelstages legte die OMV-Aktie zu. Wenn sich der Aktienkurs, der sich zurzeit bei 30,72 Euro befindet, wirklich auf den Weg zur 40 Euro-Marke begibt, dann wird sich der Einsatz von Long-Hebelprodukten rechnen.
Beispiel Call-Optionsschein:
Der HSBC-Call-Optionsschein auf die OMV-Aktie mit Strike bei 32 Euro, Laufzeit bis 10.6.11, ISIN: DE000TB8FXG6, BV 0,1, wurde beim Aktienkurs von 30,72 Euro mit 0,13 – 0,15 Euro gehandelt.
Wenn der Aktienkurs innerhalb des nächsten Monats auf 35 Euro zulegen kann, dann wird sich der handelbare Preis des Calls etwa bei 0,38 Euro (+153 Prozent) befinden.
Beispiel Turbo-Call:
Der DZ Bank-Open End-Turbo-Call auf die OMV-Aktie mit Basispreis und KO-Marke bei 25,016 Euro, BV 0,1, ISIN: DE000DZ26U44, wurde beim Aktienkurs von 30,72 Euro mit 0,58 – 0,60 Euro zum Handel angeboten.
Bei einem bald einsetzenden Kursanstieg auf 35 Euro wird der innere Wert des Turbos auf 0,99 Euro (+65 Prozent) ansteigen.
Dieser Beitrag stellt keinerlei Empfehlung zum Kauf oder Verkauf der OMV-Aktie oder von Hebelprodukten auf die OMV-Aktie dar. Für die Richtigkeit der Daten wird keine Haftung übernommen.
Walter Kozubek ist Experte für Hebelprodukte und Anlagezertifikate. Er ist Herausgeber der kostenlosen PDF-Newsletter HebelprodukteReport (www.hebelproduktereport.de) sowie ZertifikateReport (www.zertifikatereport.de).

description.hltext_display: 兴安至阳朔二级路改建工程开工
description.content:
[用户网]2010年度工程机械行业"企业品牌指数"调查
兴安至阳朔公路二级路改建工程12月14日正式开工，桂林公路管理局、灵川、阳朔、兴安三县及雁山区政府有关领导出席开工仪式。
兴安至阳朔公路二级路起于兴安县乐满地主题公园附近，途经兴安县崔家、高尚，灵川县海洋、潮田，雁山区草坪，阳朔县兴坪、福利，终于阳朔县福利镇北与省道305线阳朔至二塘公路相接，全长113.58公里，总投资 4.48亿元，按二级公路标准改建，全线为沥青混凝土路面，计划工期24个月。
兴安至阳朔公路属于县级公路，是广西公路网的重要组成部分，该公路与桂林境内的国道321、国道322线基本平行，同呈南北走向。该项目建成后，将兴安、灵川、阳朔县的多处风景旅游区连接起来，尤其是连接美丽的漓江风景区，对发展桂林旅游事业、带动相关产业发展和促进地方经济都将具有重要意义。同时，将减少国道主通道、桂林市区的交通压力。
（来源：桂林日报）

description.hltext_display: Is i hela östra skärgården
description.content: Nu förbinds Åland med riket av is. Men isarna är fortfarande både tunna och förrädiska och man skall veta vad man gör innan man beger sig ut på dem.

description.hltext_display: El Gordo reparte 2.320 millones de euros en premios
description.content:
Ya tenemos el primero de los premios, el más madrugador. Un quinto premio: 75.869 con 50.000 euros a la serie. Ha sido el más madrugador de todo y ha templado los nervios de los asistentes al sorte.
Un Sorteo Extraordinario de Navidad ha comenzado esta mañana a las 9.19 horas, con unos minutos de retraso. Este año se repartirán 2.320 millones de euros en premios.
En torno a las 8.00 horas se han abierto las puertas para las personas que acuden a ver el sorteo en el salón, y que hacían cola frente a la puerta desde la madrugada, pudieran entrar. Como ya es tradicional, parte del público ha llegado vestido de todo tipo de disfraces, desde grupos de Papa Noel hasta un hombre disfrazado de Belén Esteban.
Poco después llegaron al edificio de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado los niños del colegio de San Ildefonso, encargados de repartir la suerte, que han desayunado en una sala del propio Palacio de Congresos.
Posteriormente, se procedió a la presentación de liras al público, para que los espectadores menos 'confiados' pudieran comprobar de forma efectiva, previa petición, que la bola con su número estará en el bombo.
A las 8.58 horas se comenzaron a volcar las bolas de los números en la tolva para ser traspasada a su respectivo bombo, y posteriormente, a las 9.09 horas, comenzó a procederse al llenado de los bombos, operación que duró apenas cuatro minutos.
Luego, las bolas de los premios de pedrea y los premios mayores fueron proclamadas según categorías por un funcionario del LAE ante la mesa que preside el sorteo antes de introducirlas tras varias comprobaciones en el bombo pequeño, escena que fue seguida con creciente expectación por el público.
A las 9.17 se concluía esta labor entre la creciente expectación del público y aparecían los niños de San Ildefonso para comenzar de inmediato el sorteo.

description.hltext_display: Miles de pasajeros, bloqueados en los aeropuertos europeos
description.author: EFE
description.content:
EFE, Heathrow 22/12/2010
Comente esta noticia
Enviar Imprimir A+ A-
heathrow. Pasajeros atrapados durmiendo en la terminal 3 del aeropuerto londinense - REUTERS
En vísperas de Navidad, miles de pasajeros seguían ayer atrapados en los aeropuertos europeos por culpa de la nieve, si bien el número de cancelaciones se redujo a 1.000 en todo el continente, la tercera parte de las registradas el lunes. Fuentes de Eurocontrol señalaron a Efe que la considerable mejora con respecto ayer, cuando se quedaron en tierra cerca de 3.000 vuelos de los 26.000 que se operan en Europa habitualmente a diario, no está garantizada para los próximos días ya que se desconoce cómo evolucionará la situación.
La Comisión Europea consideró ayer inaceptable que se cancelen vuelos por la nieve y pidió que se refuerce la preparación para poder seguir operando en condiciones meteorológicas adversas sin poner en riesgo la seguridad.
“Es inaceptable y no debería repetirse”, indicó en un comunicado el comisario europeo de Transporte, Siim Kallas, quien aseguró que está muy preocupado por la magnitud de los trastornos que ha ocasionado el temporal y que tiene previsto reunirse en los próximos días con los responsables de los aeropuertos para pedirles explicaciones.
El aeropuerto de Fráncfort, presentaba una situación similar a la de anteayer con cancelaciones y retrasos de hasta cinco horas; lo mismo ocurría en el de Londres-Heathrow, donde hubo escasa actividad y retrasos de más de seis horas.
La normalidad regresó en cambio progresivamente a los aeródromos de Amsterdam, París y Bruselas, donde se registraron únicamente algunos retrasos, según Eurocontrol.

description.hltext_display: Motorcykler og veteranbiler ødelagt i brand
description.content:
Harley Davidson-motorcykler og veteranbiler udbrændte i en lagerbygning i Søborg ved København. Et endnu ukendt antal Harley Davidson-motorcykler og veteranbiler blev ødelagt i en brand i en lagerbygning i Søborg ved København natten til onsdag.
Det lykkedes dog at redde cirka 40 motorcykler samt nogle biler ud fra det brændende lager.
Det er uvist, hvordan branden opstod i den 100 meter lange bygning på Sydmarken i Søborg, oplyser Københavns Vestegns Politi. Omkring 400 kvadratmeter af det 1500 kvadratmeter store lager udbrændte.
Der er sket skader for et millionbeløb.
/ritzau/
